translated: by another valid cognition,

original: ji srid don med par nges 'dzin //
analyzed: ji srid don med par nges 'dzin //
translated: it is ascertained as non-existent.

original: der ni shes gzhan skye ba yin //
analyzed: der ni shes gzhan skye ba yin //
translated: Then another cognition arises,

original: rgyu gzhan la ni bzhes pa yin //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan la ni bzhes pa yin //
translated: but it is not accepted as a cause.

original: zhes smos so //
analyzed: zhes smos so //
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: de'i phyir ring por lon pa yang dang po pa bzhin du yongs su gcod pa tsam ni tshad ma nyid kyi bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir ring por lon pa yang dang po pa bzhin du yongs su gcod pa tsam ni tshad ma nyid kyi bya ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, even a distant object, like the first, is merely ascertained, and that is the function of valid cognition.

original: tshad ma nyid kyi shes pa phyi ma gzhan snga ma las bye @14b brag tu byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma nyid kyi shes pa phyi ma gzhan snga ma las bye @14b brag tu byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The subsequent consciousness that is valid knowledge does not make a distinction from the former.

original: don byed pa la gnod pa med pa'i shes pa bzhin du nges par byed pa'i shes pa yang rang nyid las kho na bzhin du tshad ma yin te bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don byed pa la gnod pa med pa'i shes pa bzhin du nges par byed pa'i shes pa yang rang nyid las kho na bzhin du tshad ma yin te bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as the consciousness that is unimpaired with regard to a functioning thing is valid knowledge in regard to itself, so too is the consciousness that ascertains. There is no difference.üîΩAnd also:

original: de yang / gang tshe rang las tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: de yang / gang tshe rang las tshad ma nyid //
translated: When it is valid knowledge in regard to itself,

original: de tshe gzhan nyid tshol min te //
analyzed: de tshe gzhan nyid tshol min te //
translated: then it is not seeking to be different from itself.

original: skyon rig pa las bcad med par ;
analyzed: skyon rig pa las bcad med par ;
translated: Without eliminating the awareness of the fault,

original: / brdzun pa nyid ni rtog par 'gyur //üîΩzhes smos so //
analyzed: / brdzun pa nyid ni rtog par 'gyur // zhes smos so //
translated: one will conceive of it as false.

original: nya phyis la dngul du shes pa yang snga ma'i rnam par shes pa dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba tshogs pa gzhan la ltos pa las byung ba phyin ci log pa'i yul can yang de nyid la nges pa can gzhan la ltos pa yin la /
analyzed: nya phyis la dngul du shes pa yang snga ma'i rnam par shes pa dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba tshogs pa gzhan la ltos pa las byung ba phyin ci log pa'i yul can yang de nyid la nges pa can gzhan la ltos pa yin la /
translated: The consciousness that apprehends nacre as silver arises from a different collection of causes and conditions than the former consciousness. It is a consciousness that is in error with regard to its object. It is also a consciousness that ascertains that very object.

original: des na ldog pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir gzhan las yin par bstan te /
analyzed: des na ldog pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir gzhan las yin par bstan te /
translated: Therefore, because it is a consciousness that is in error with regard to its object, it is taught to be different from the former consciousness.

original: de yang / rang don tshad ma min pa yang //üîΩtshad ma bzhin du blta bar bya //
analyzed: de yang / rang don tshad ma min pa yang // tshad ma bzhin du blta bar bya //
translated: One‚Äôs own purpose is not a valid cognition.

original: zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes smos pa'o //
translated: It should be regarded as like a valid cognition.

original: dper na yul phyi ma rtog pa tsam du byed pa'i tshad ma bzhin du snga ma yang de dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: dper na yul phyi ma rtog pa tsam du byed pa'i tshad ma bzhin du snga ma yang de dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: For example, just as a valid cognition that makes the subsequent object merely a conceptual thought, so also is the prior one.

original: cig shos ni rang las des pa ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni gzhan las ltos pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cig shos ni rang las des pa ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni gzhan las ltos pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The other is not of a nature that is inferior to that, and the meaning of ‚Äúit is dependent on another‚Äù is that it is dependent on another.

original: rig byed las byung ba'i shes pa ni dngul gyi shes pa bzhin du 'di yang 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rig byed las byung ba'i shes pa ni dngul gyi shes pa bzhin du 'di yang 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The consciousness that arises from the Veda is not like the consciousness of silver that arises from a mother-of-pearl.

original: brdzun pa skyed par byed pa las de bzhin pa'i don nyid la nges pa'i shes pa bden pa gzhan yod pa ma yin zhing skyon gyi shes pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: brdzun pa skyed par byed pa las de bzhin pa'i don nyid la nges pa'i shes pa bden pa gzhan yod pa ma yin zhing skyon gyi shes pa yang ma yin te /
translated: From a cause that produces a false effect, there is no other true object that is ascertained in the same way, nor is there a consciousness of a fault,

original: skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not produced by a person.

original: rang du rtogs pa'i sgra nyid ni sor mo'i rtse mo la sogs pa'i ngag bzhin du don ji lta ba ma yin pa'i shes pa skyes pa'i skyon yang med do //
analyzed: rang du rtogs pa'i sgra nyid ni sor mo'i rtse mo la sogs pa'i ngag bzhin du don ji lta ba ma yin pa'i shes pa skyes pa'i skyon yang med do //
translated: The sound itself, which is realized as the self, is not a fault that produces a consciousness that is not the meaning, like the tip of the finger, etc.

original: lan cig kyang de'i rang bzhin las de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa shes par mi rigs te /
analyzed: lan cig kyang de'i rang bzhin las de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa shes par mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable that the nature of that is not the nature of that even once.

original: de las res 'ga' zhig don ji lta ba rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de las res 'ga' zhig don ji lta ba rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Sometimes, from that, the meaning is realized as it is.

original: bden yang 'byung la de lta ma yin yang 'byung zhes gang smras pa la /
analyzed: bden yang 'byung la de lta ma yin yang 'byung zhes gang smras pa la /
translated: Although it is true, it is said that it arises from that, even though it is not so.

original: brdzun pa skyed par byed pa las bden pa mi 'byung la /
analyzed: brdzun pa skyed par byed pa las bden pa mi 'byung la /
translated: From a false producer, the true does not arise.

original: 'byung du zin kyang de las sgra rang nyid skyon can ma yin te /
analyzed: 'byung du zin kyang de las sgra rang nyid skyon can ma yin te /
translated: Even if it arises, from that, the sound itself is not faulty.

original: 'on skyes bu'i 'dus pa la yin la /
analyzed: 'on skyes bu'i 'dus pa la yin la /
translated: But it is in the combination of the person.

original: skyes bu yang blo sngon du 'gro ba'i tshig gi rim pa gzhan du yang byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skyes bu yang blo sngon du 'gro ba'i tshig gi rim pa gzhan du yang byed pa'i phyir /
translated: And the person also makes the sequence of words preceded by the mind in another way.

original: gcig pu slu bar byed pa yin gyi sgra ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig pu slu bar byed pa yin gyi sgra ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the person who is the deceiver, not the sound.

original: rig byed la ni skyes bu med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rig byed la ni skyes bu med pa'i phyir /
translated: In the Veda, because there is no person,

original: des byas pa'i rim pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des byas pa'i rim pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is not a process that is created by that.

original: slu bar dogs par mi bya ste /üîΩde yang / re zhig sgra @15a * //
analyzed: slu bar dogs par mi bya ste / de yang / re zhig sgra @15a * //
translated: Therefore, one should not suspect that it is deceptive.üîΩMoreover,

original: las skyon byung ba //
analyzed: las skyon byung ba //
translated: First, the fault arises from the sound.

original: smra ba po la ltos nas yin //
analyzed: smra ba po la ltos nas yin //
translated: It depends on the speaker.

original: zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes smos pa'o //
translated: This is what is said.

original: de nyid ni gzhan la ltos pa'i tshad ma nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyid ni gzhan la ltos pa'i tshad ma nyid yin gyi /
translated: That itself is the valid cognition that depends on another,

original: 'jig rten dang rig byed du yang tshad ma rnam par gzhag par 'gyur ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: 'jig rten dang rig byed du yang tshad ma rnam par gzhag par 'gyur ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: but it is not the case that valid cognition is established in the world and in the Vedas.

original: de la tshad ma'i mtshan nyid spyir ston pa ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de la tshad ma'i mtshan nyid spyir ston pa ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In response to this, he says, ‚ÄúThe definition of valid cognition is taught in general.‚Äù

original: 'dis mtshon par bya ba yin pas na mtshan nyid de rang las sam gzhan las kyang rung ba'i tshad mar brtag par bya ba ni 'di'i don to //
analyzed: 'dis mtshon par bya ba yin pas na mtshan nyid de rang las sam gzhan las kyang rung ba'i tshad mar brtag par bya ba ni 'di'i don to //
translated: The meaning of this is that it is to be examined as valid cognition either from itself or from another, because it is defined by this.

original: tshad ma nyid ni yon tan gyis bskyed par bya ba yin zhes smras pa la /
analyzed: tshad ma nyid ni yon tan gyis bskyed par bya ba yin zhes smras pa la /
translated: When it is said that valid cognition is produced by a quality,

original: bud shing la sogs pa'i grogs la ltos pa'i me la sogs pa ni du ba la sogs pa skyed par byed par snang la /
analyzed: bud shing la sogs pa'i grogs la ltos pa'i me la sogs pa ni du ba la sogs pa skyed par byed par snang la /
translated: fire and so on, which depend on the assistance of fuel and so on, are seen to produce smoke and so on.

original: de bzhin du shes pa yang grogs la ltos pa yin dang / skad cig ma ji ltar ltos pa nyid yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes pa yang grogs la ltos pa yin dang / skad cig ma ji ltar ltos pa nyid yin /
translated: Likewise, consciousness also depends on a companion, and how does a moment depend on a companion?

original: me la sogs pa yang mtshungs pa'i phyir cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: me la sogs pa yang mtshungs pa'i phyir cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Because fire and so on are similar, it does not exist in the least.

original: rgyun gyi dngos po la gcig pa nyid du zhen pas rgyu yin no //
analyzed: rgyun gyi dngos po la gcig pa nyid du zhen pas rgyu yin no //
translated: It is the continuum that is the cause, since it is conceived to be a single thing.

original: grogs byed pa'i phyir dang phan pa byed pa'i phyir me'i ltos pa shing yin par rigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: grogs byed pa'i phyir dang phan pa byed pa'i phyir me'i ltos pa shing yin par rigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it reasonable that the companion of fire is wood because it assists and benefits it?

original: shes pa yang yul nges pa'i phyir gzhan phan pa byed pa can yin no //
analyzed: shes pa yang yul nges pa'i phyir gzhan phan pa byed pa can yin no //
translated: Also, since consciousness ascertains an object, it is a benefit.

original: shes pa ni yul rtogs pa'i ngo bo kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: shes pa ni yul rtogs pa'i ngo bo kho na ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt consciousness the nature of the realization of an object?

original: de lta ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin la ;
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin la ;
translated: It is the nature of the realization of its own nature.

original: de yang rang nyid las tshad ma yin te /üîΩde yang shes pa thams cad kyi rung mong yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang rang nyid las tshad ma yin te / de yang shes pa thams cad kyi rung mong yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Also, it is valid knowledge in regard to itself.

original: shes pa thams cad tshad mar 'gyur te gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa thams cad tshad mar 'gyur te gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Also, since it is common to all consciousnesses, all consciousnesses would be valid knowledge because they are not undermined.

original: de yang ser po 'ang dngul du mi snang ba'i phyir gnod par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang ser po 'ang dngul du mi snang ba'i phyir gnod par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Moreover, it would be invalidated because silver does not appear as yellow.

original: 'di lta bu'i tshad ma'i dbang du byas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i tshad ma'i dbang du byas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not the case for a valid cognition.

original: de'i yang phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ni tshad ma nyid yin la /
analyzed: de'i yang phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ni tshad ma nyid yin la /
translated: The connection of the result of contact is itself valid knowledge.

original: de yang rang gi ngo bo rtogs pas bcas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rang gi ngo bo rtogs pas bcas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is not established by the understanding of its own nature,

original: gzhan nyid las rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan nyid las rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is to be understood from something else.

original: gcig la gcig brten pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig la gcig brten pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it mutually dependent,

original: 'di la 'di'o zhes don rtogs pa kho na tshad ma nyid yin te rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di la 'di'o zhes don rtogs pa kho na tshad ma nyid yin te rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mere understanding of the object as ‚Äúthis‚Äù is itself valid knowledge, because it is understood.

original: 'dis ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir gsal ba yin la /
analyzed: 'dis ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir gsal ba yin la /
translated: This clarifies that it is because there is no purpose.

original: phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu rtogs par yang rang nyid la kho na las ngo bo bzhin du the tshom med pa yin no //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu rtogs par yang rang nyid la kho na las ngo bo bzhin du the tshom med pa yin no //
translated: And the understanding of the result of contact is also free from doubt regarding itself, just like its nature.

original: de dang 'brel pa ni ma rtogs te /
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa ni ma rtogs te /
translated: The connection with that is not understood,

original: dmigs pa dang ma dmigs dag @15b las khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang ma dmigs dag @15b las khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: but should be understood from the observed and the unobserved.

original: 'bras bu rtogs pa tsam tshad ma ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'bras bu rtogs pa tsam tshad ma ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the mere realization of the effect the valid cognition?

original: de bzhin snga ma la yang cis mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin snga ma la yang cis mi 'gyur //
translated: Why is it not so in the same way with the prior [moment]?

original: ji tsam du rtogs pa de tsam du rang nyid kho na las yin par ni bden na /
analyzed: ji tsam du rtogs pa de tsam du rang nyid kho na las yin par ni bden na /
translated: To the extent that there is realization, to that extent it is from itself alone.

original: 'bras bu la 'brel pa ni ma rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu la 'brel pa ni ma rtogs pa yin no //
translated: But the connection with the effect is not realized.

original: bskyed bya 'am skyed byed du yang cis ma rtogs /
analyzed: bskyed bya 'am skyed byed du yang cis ma rtogs /
translated: Why is it not realized as the produced or the producer?

original: bden te / skyed byed dam bskyed byar ni rtogs na /
analyzed: bden te / skyed byed dam bskyed byar ni rtogs na /
translated: It is true, but if it is realized as the producer or the produced,

original: de kho na nyid kyis ni ma yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pa la sogs par rgal ba ni nam mkha' ltad pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyis ni ma yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pa la sogs par rgal ba ni nam mkha' ltad pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: then the objection that there would be an infinite regress, etc., is like a show in the sky.

original: tshad ma nyid kyi shes pa las phyi ma yongs su gcod pa ni snga ma las bye brag med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma nyid kyi shes pa las phyi ma yongs su gcod pa ni snga ma las bye brag med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The subsequent determination from the cognition of validity is not without distinction from the prior [moment],

original: de'i tshe bye brag mthong ba las dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe bye brag mthong ba las dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because at that time the object is posited from seeing the distinction.

original: de lta na rig byed las sgrub byed mchod sbyin las bsgrub bya mtho ris thob par bya bar shes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na rig byed las sgrub byed mchod sbyin las bsgrub bya mtho ris thob par bya bar shes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
translated: Thus, because it is known that heaven is to be obtained from the performance of sacrifice, which is to be accomplished, the Veda is a means of valid knowledge.

original: 'phrad pa'i phyir 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phrad pa'i phyir 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But it does not engage in activity because of contact.

original: goms pa las phrad par bya ba nges pa yin na mngon sum las ji ltar 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: goms pa las phrad par bya ba nges pa yin na mngon sum las ji ltar 'jug pa yin /
translated: If it is certain that contact is due to practice, how does it engage in activity on the basis of perception?

original: nges pa rtogs pa'i don du 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: nges pa rtogs pa'i don du 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault, because it engages in activity for the sake of understanding certainty.

original: nges pa tsam 'di la yang rtogs pa khong du chud pa med do zhe na nges pa med do //
analyzed: nges pa tsam 'di la yang rtogs pa khong du chud pa med do zhe na nges pa med do //
translated: But even in this case, there is no understanding of certainty.

original: khyed la yang ci las nges /
analyzed: khyed la yang ci las nges /
translated: What is certain for you?

original: phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu la rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu la rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the result of contact is the apprehension of its own nature.

original: phrad par bya ba'i rang gi 'bras bu'i rang gi ngo bo ni 'di la yang ngo //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba'i rang gi 'bras bu'i rang gi ngo bo ni 'di la yang ngo //
translated: The nature of the result of contact is also this.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: thob par bya ba ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyis de'i 'bras bu nyid shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thob par bya ba ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyis de'i 'bras bu nyid shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object to be obtained is beyond the senses, its result is not known.

original: thob par bya ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa ni rab rib can gyi shes pa bzhin du skyon las byung ba yin la rig byed la ni skyon med de /
analyzed: thob par bya ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa ni rab rib can gyi shes pa bzhin du skyon las byung ba yin la rig byed la ni skyon med de /
translated: The cognition of the result to be obtained is like the cognition of one with eye disease, and arises from a fault.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'o na rab rib can nam /
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro // 'o na rab rib can nam /
translated: But the Vedas are not like that, because they have no author.

original: gzhan yang rung ba'i mi bslu ba dang / slu ba yang nye bar dmigs pas tha dad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzhan yang rung ba'i mi bslu ba dang / slu ba yang nye bar dmigs pas tha dad pa ma yin nam /
translated: Well, then, is it not the case that the Vedas are not different from the non-Vedas, since both are perceived by the non-deluded and the deluded alike?

original: de ni 'di la med de thob par bya ba ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyis de gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'di la med de thob par bya ba ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyis de gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not the case, because the result to be obtained is beyond the senses, and therefore neither of those two is possible.

original: slu ba ni skyon gyis bskyed pa ma yin nam /üîΩde dag kyang skyes bu dang 'brel pa las yin gyi /
analyzed: slu ba ni skyon gyis bskyed pa ma yin nam / de dag kyang skyes bu dang 'brel pa las yin gyi /
translated: But is not the deluded cognition produced by a fault?

original: rang nyid las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang nyid las ni ma yin te /
translated: And that is due to the person, not to itself.

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i ngo bor nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i ngo bor nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of cause and effect is definite.

original: de med na skyed bu'i bya ba tshig gi rim pa ci ltar rigs /
analyzed: de med na skyed bu'i bya ba tshig gi rim pa ci ltar rigs /
translated: If that is not so, how can the activity of the person be the sequence of words?

original: de lta yin du zad mdo ce na /
analyzed: de lta yin du zad mdo ce na /
translated: If that is so, what is the problem?

original: skyon dang des @16a * //
analyzed: skyon dang des @16a * //
translated: The fault and the person

original: byas pa'i slu ba yang ci'i phyir glo bur du ma yin te mtshungs so //
analyzed: byas pa'i slu ba yang ci'i phyir glo bur du ma yin te mtshungs so //
translated: Why is the deception of what is done not also adventitious? It is the same.

original: rig byed kyi rim pa gzhan nyid yin te /
analyzed: rig byed kyi rim pa gzhan nyid yin te /
translated: It is a different stage of the Vedas.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there is no agent.

original: de'i skyon rnams kyang yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i skyon rnams kyang yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Its faults also do not exist.

original: shes pa yang skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir slu ba ma yin te byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa yang skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir slu ba ma yin te byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because it generates cognition, it is not deceptive, because it is not an agent.

original: thob par bya ba'i shes pa la ni mig gi rnam par shes pa bzhin du byed pa'i skyon med par shin tu nges pa yin la /
analyzed: thob par bya ba'i shes pa la ni mig gi rnam par shes pa bzhin du byed pa'i skyon med par shin tu nges pa yin la /
translated: In the cognition to be obtained, like the eye consciousness, there is no fault of being an agent, and it is very certain.

original: gzhan du yang byed pa po med pa la ni sgra rang nyid la skyon yod pa'am gzhan las sam zhes bya ba'i dogs pa ldog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du yang byed pa po med pa la ni sgra rang nyid la skyon yod pa'am gzhan las sam zhes bya ba'i dogs pa ldog pa ma yin no //
translated: And in other cases, in the absence of an agent, the doubt does the sound have a fault in itself or from another? is not eliminated.

original: rang nyid skyon can yin na nam du yang ji ltar bden pa nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: rang nyid skyon can yin na nam du yang ji ltar bden pa nyid du 'gyur /
translated: If it has a fault in itself, how could it ever be true?

original: skyes bus byas pa ni de'i yon tan las bden pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa ni de'i yon tan las bden pa nyid yin la /
translated: What is produced by a person is true from its good qualities.

original: yon tan rnams la ni skyon yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba gtam tsam yin te /
analyzed: yon tan rnams la ni skyon yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba gtam tsam yin te /
translated: The statement ‚Äúthere are no faults in the virtues‚Äù is mere talk.

original: tshad ma med pa'i phyir phyin ci log par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad ma med pa'i phyir phyin ci log par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because there is no valid cognition, it follows that the statement is false.

original: gang zhig gang las byung bar snang ba de las byung ba yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang zhig gang las byung bar snang ba de las byung ba yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because whatever appears to arise from something is arisen from that,

original: yon tan las bden pa nyid dang / skyon las brdzun pa nyid du ni rig pa yin no //
analyzed: yon tan las bden pa nyid dang / skyon las brdzun pa nyid du ni rig pa yin no //
translated: it is known that truth arises from the virtues and falsity arises from the faults.

original: de ltar yang tshad mar gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa der rgyas par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang tshad mar gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa der rgyas par bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is explained extensively in the passage beginning with ‚ÄúBecause it is valid cognition.‚Äù

original: rig byed la ni skyes bu med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rig byed la ni skyes bu med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there is no person in the Vedas,

original: yon tan las byung ba ma yin la /
analyzed: yon tan las byung ba ma yin la /
translated: they do not arise from the virtues.

original: des na byed ba med pa'i phyir bden pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: des na byed ba med pa'i phyir bden pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: And because they are not produced, they are not true.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: shes pa phyi ma ni rang gi ngo bo kho na 'dod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: shes pa phyi ma ni rang gi ngo bo kho na 'dod pa yin gyi /
translated: The later cognition is asserted to have only its own nature as its object,

original: de las gzhan pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pa ma yin la /
translated: and not anything else. Therefore there is no infinite regress.

original: snga ma ni de'i thabs yin pa nyid kyis rang gi ngo bo las ma yin te /
analyzed: snga ma ni de'i thabs yin pa nyid kyis rang gi ngo bo las ma yin te /
translated: The former is not from its own nature, since it is just the means to that.

original: rang nyid las rang gi ngo bo shes pa yin yang /
analyzed: rang nyid las rang gi ngo bo shes pa yin yang /
translated: Although one knows one's own nature,

original: de'i thabs nyid yin pas du ba bzhin du gzhan la nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i thabs nyid yin pas du ba bzhin du gzhan la nges pa yin no //
translated: one is certain of another, like smoke, since it is just the means to that.

original: rig byed ni rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa yin yang de'i 'dod pa rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rig byed ni rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa yin yang de'i 'dod pa rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Although one understands the nature of the Vedas, one does not understand their meaning.

original: de ma rtogs pa las na rang gi ngo bo ni de'i thabs nyid kyis rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ma rtogs pa las na rang gi ngo bo ni de'i thabs nyid kyis rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: Since one does not understand that, one does not understand one's own nature, since it is just the means to that.

original: de nyid skyon med par nges pa yang med la so sor snang ba bzhin du skyes bu med pa'i nges pa yang med de /
analyzed: de nyid skyon med par nges pa yang med la so sor snang ba bzhin du skyes bu med pa'i nges pa yang med de /
translated: One is also not certain of that faultlessness, nor is one certain that there is no person as it appears.

original: rang nyid kyi skyon yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid kyi skyon yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is one's own fault.

original: shes pa'i 'bras bu ni don la nges pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: shes pa'i 'bras bu ni don la nges pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is the result of knowledge not certainty about the object?

original: de ni de nyid kyi tshe yod pa yin la /
analyzed: de ni de nyid kyi tshe yod pa yin la /
translated: That exists at that time.

original: don du gnyer ba po rnams ni de'i rgyu mtshan la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: don du gnyer ba po rnams ni de'i rgyu mtshan la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Those who seek it engage in its reason.

original: 'o na @16b gzhan du nges pas ci'i phyir 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: 'o na @16b gzhan du nges pas ci'i phyir 'jug pa yin /
translated: Well, why do they engage in certainty about another?

original: thob par bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: thob par bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: for the purpose of obtaining.

original: thob pa ni lag pa la sogs pas nye bar thob pa nyid do //
analyzed: thob pa ni lag pa la sogs pas nye bar thob pa nyid do //
translated: Obtaining is the very obtaining by means of the hand, etc.

original: de ni snga ma nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ni snga ma nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that this is the former ascertainment,

original: de'i cha ji ltar nges pa yin zhing 'jug pa yang yin /
analyzed: de'i cha ji ltar nges pa yin zhing 'jug pa yang yin /
translated: how is that part ascertained and also engaged?

original: nges pa ni yod kyang de ches don du gnyer ba ma yin te ;
analyzed: nges pa ni yod kyang de ches don du gnyer ba ma yin te ;
translated: Even though there is ascertainment, it is not that which is most desired,

original: thob zin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: thob zin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it has already been obtained.

original: de lta na 'di ni snga nas thob par bya ba dang 'brel pa can nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta na 'di ni snga nas thob par bya ba dang 'brel pa can nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: In that case, it should be understood that this is connected with what is to be obtained beforehand.

original: bden te phrad par bya ba la sogs pa'i shes pa la thug pa med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bden te phrad par bya ba la sogs pa'i shes pa la thug pa med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is true that the cognition of contact, etc. is not endless,

original: mngon par 'dod pa nyid kyi tshad ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa nyid kyi tshad ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: because it is the very valid cognition of what is manifestly desired. This will be explained.

original: de ltar 'gyur na ni shes pa kho na tshad ma yin par mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur na ni shes pa kho na tshad ma yin par mi rigs te /
translated: If it were to be so, it would not be reasonable that cognition alone is valid cognition,

original: dbang po ma tshang pa nyid du gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po ma tshang pa nyid du gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be defective in the sense faculties.

original: 'o na ni dbang po ni yul thams cad la thun mong yin pa'i phyir thams cad la mtshungs pa kho nar 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni dbang po ni yul thams cad la thun mong yin pa'i phyir thams cad la mtshungs pa kho nar 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur te /
translated: But if that is so, then since the sense faculty is common to all objects, it would produce an effect in regard to all objects in exactly the same way.

original: shes pa ni gang gi rnam pa yin pa de'i yul can kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa ni gang gi rnam pa yin pa de'i yul can kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: And consciousness would be the subjective aspect of whatever is its object.

original: de'i phyir dbang po ni tshad ma ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po ni tshad ma ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore the sense faculty is not a valid cognition,

original: 'on kyang tshad ma skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang tshad ma skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: but it is the producer of valid cognition.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: dbang po ni 'bras bu skyed par byed pa la bye brag med par kho bo cag gi phyogs la ji ltar 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyed kyi la yang tshad ma skyed par byed pa yin par bye brag med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po ni 'bras bu skyed par byed pa la bye brag med par kho bo cag gi phyogs la ji ltar 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyed kyi la yang tshad ma skyed par byed pa yin par bye brag med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: because just as the sense faculty is not distinguished in terms of producing an effect in our system, so too in your system it is not distinguished in terms of producing valid cognition.üîΩAnd that is stated:

original: de yang / ji ltar tshad ma nyid yin pa //
analyzed: de yang / ji ltar tshad ma nyid yin pa //
translated: How could it be valid cognition?

original: thams cad la 'bras 'byin 'gyur ba //üîΩtshad ma skyed byed nyid la yang //
analyzed: thams cad la 'bras 'byin 'gyur ba // tshad ma skyed byed nyid la yang //
translated: It would produce an effect in regard to all.üîΩAnd in producing valid cognition,

original: de bzhin tshad ma skyed byed 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin tshad ma skyed byed 'gyur //
translated: it would produce valid cognition.

original: zhes smos pa'o zhes zer ba 'di la /
analyzed: zhes smos pa'o zhes zer ba 'di la /
translated: This is what is said.

original: de yod na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de yod na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúIf it exists‚Äù means:

original: dbang po yod na yang yul la 'jal ba nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dbang po yod na yang yul la 'jal ba nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: Even if the sense faculty exists, it does not measure the object.

original: shes pa yod na de la nges par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: shes pa yod na de la nges par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If consciousness exists, it would definitely be so.

original: des na shes pa kho na sgrub par byed pa dam pa yin gyi dbang po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: des na shes pa kho na sgrub par byed pa dam pa yin gyi dbang po ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, consciousness alone is the true establisher, not the sense faculty.

original: bskal pa yin pa'i phyir khyab ches par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: bskal pa yin pa'i phyir khyab ches par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it that it is too broad because it is too general, since it is specific.

original: yang na tshad ma ni rang la yod pa bye brag tu gtogs pas yul bye brag byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: yang na tshad ma ni rang la yod pa bye brag tu gtogs pas yul bye brag byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Or, a valid cognition is a specific object because it is included in what is specific to itself.

original: dbang pos ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang pos ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the sense faculty,

original: dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is beyond the sense faculty.

original: nye ba tsam gyis kyang bye brag tu byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: nye ba tsam gyis kyang bye brag tu byed pa ma yin la /
translated: It is not that it is specific merely through proximity.

original: bye brag yod du zin kyang bye brag med par 'gyur ro //üîΩskyed par byed pa ni bye @17a * //
analyzed: bye brag yod du zin kyang bye brag med par 'gyur ro // skyed par byed pa ni bye @17a * //
translated: Even if there is a difference, there would be no difference.

original: brag ma rtogs par yang nye ba tsam las nges par skyed par byed pa de ltar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brag ma rtogs par yang nye ba tsam las nges par skyed par byed pa de ltar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even without understanding the difference, it is seen that a producer definitely produces merely through proximity.

original: des mtshungs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des mtshungs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not the same for that.

original: de yod na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de yod na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If it exists, then,

original: shes pa yod na yul yongs su gcod pa yin gyi dbang po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa yod na yul yongs su gcod pa yin gyi dbang po ni ma yin te /
translated: if consciousness exists, then the object is discerned, but not the sense faculty,

original: der rtogs pa'i bye brag mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der rtogs pa'i bye brag mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the sense faculty is not understood to be a specific realization.

original: shes pa la ltos pa mang par yang skyed par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa la ltos pa mang par yang skyed par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The sense faculty is the cause of the production of consciousness, and consciousness is the cause of the discernment of the object.

original: dbang po yang brgyud pas de nyid la bya ba byed pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin nam /
analyzed: dbang po yang brgyud pas de nyid la bya ba byed pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the sense faculty a valid cognition because it indirectly performs a function on the object?

original: de ni bden te /
analyzed: de ni bden te /
translated: That is true,

original: de nyid kyis na de'i nye bar btags pa tsam yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na de'i nye bar btags pa tsam yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: but it is taught that it is merely figuratively designated as a valid cognition:

original: dbang po dang don zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po dang don zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The sense faculty and the object are valid cognitions.

original: slu ba med pa can nyid ni 'dod pa'i don la ma 'khrul pa nyid kyi shes pa dang don dag 'brel pa ma yin nam /üîΩde yang 'brel pa can ma bzung na mi 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: slu ba med pa can nyid ni 'dod pa'i don la ma 'khrul pa nyid kyi shes pa dang don dag 'brel pa ma yin nam / de yang 'brel pa can ma bzung na mi 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the connection between consciousness and the object nondeceptive because consciousness is not mistaken with regard to the desired object?üîΩThat is also the case, but if the connection is not apprehended, it is not apprehended.

original: ma bzung bas ni de la 'jug pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: ma bzung bas ni de la 'jug pa ma yin pas /
translated: If it is not apprehended, then it is not engaged.

original: de bzung ba'i don du dang por don bzung ba yod na de nyid las 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzung ba'i don du dang por don bzung ba yod na de nyid las 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the object is apprehended first, in order to apprehend it, then it is engaged in that.

original: 'on te don 'di nyid ces nges pa med na des ni de 'dzin pa la ltos pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te don 'di nyid ces nges pa med na des ni de 'dzin pa la ltos pa yin gyi /
translated: But if there is no certainty that this is the object, then it depends on the apprehension of that.

original: phan tshun rten par thal bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //üîΩma 'khrul ba can nyid bzung ba las don bzung ba yin la /
analyzed: phan tshun rten par thal bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no // ma 'khrul ba can nyid bzung ba las don bzung ba yin la /
translated: But it does not follow that they are mutually dependent.üîΩThe apprehension of the nonerroneous is the apprehension of the object, and the apprehension of that is the apprehension of the nonerroneous.

original: de bzung ba las kyang ma 'khrul pa can nyid bzung pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i skyon rnams kyis skyon can yin pa'i phyir slu ba med pa can nyid tshad ma nyid du mi rigs so //
analyzed: de bzung ba las kyang ma 'khrul pa can nyid bzung pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i skyon rnams kyis skyon can yin pa'i phyir slu ba med pa can nyid tshad ma nyid du mi rigs so //
translated: Because of the faults such as these, it is not reasonable that the nondeceptive is valid knowledge, because it is faulty.

original: gnod pa med pa'i rtogs pa nyid ni rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa'i rtogs pa nyid ni rigs pa yin te /
translated: It is reasonable that the nondeceptive is valid knowledge,

original: skyon can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyon can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not faulty.

original: de yang shes pa skyes pa'i dus su gnod pa can ma byung bar nges pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag yin no //
analyzed: de yang shes pa skyes pa'i dus su gnod pa can ma byung bar nges pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag yin no //
translated: Moreover, the certainty that the nondeceptive is not arisen at the time of the arising of the consciousness is a factor of engagement.

original: de yang skyon med par go bar mtshungs par shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang skyon med par go bar mtshungs par shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is understood to be similar to the nonerroneous.

original: mtshungs par go ba ni gnod pa med par rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mtshungs par go ba ni gnod pa med par rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The understanding of sameness is the understanding of non-harm.

original: 'di la mi slu ba don du gnyer ba zhes smos te /
analyzed: 'di la mi slu ba don du gnyer ba zhes smos te /
translated: Here, it is said that one who seeks non-deception

original: 'jig rten pa'i don gyi tha snyad kyi yan lag la ni skyon yod pa srid kyang /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i don gyi tha snyad kyi yan lag la ni skyon yod pa srid kyang /
translated: In the branches of worldly conventions, there is the possibility of error.

original: dor ba'i yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: dor ba'i yan lag ma yin te /
translated: But it is not a branch to be rejected,

original: tha snyad chad par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad chad par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that conventions would be cut off.

original: skyon rnams la yang lan gad ba pa ni /
analyzed: skyon rnams la yang lan gad ba pa ni /
translated: As for the replies to the errors,

original: tha snyad kyang dpyad par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: tha snyad kyang dpyad par bya ba yin te /
translated: conventions are to be analyzed.

original: gnod pa med pa nyid la don du gnyer ba'i skyes bu 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa nyid la don du gnyer ba'i skyes bu 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that a person who seeks non-harm engages in it,

original: de ni skyes bu'i don ma yin pa'i phyir te shes pa @17b skyes pa'i dus nyid du thob pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'on te gnod pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ba don du gnyer ba yin pa de lta na ni /
analyzed: de ni skyes bu'i don ma yin pa'i phyir te shes pa @17b skyes pa'i dus nyid du thob pa'i phyir ro // 'on te gnod pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ba don du gnyer ba yin pa de lta na ni /
translated: because that is not the purpose of a person, since it is obtained at the time of the arising of the cognition.

original: sngar ma rtogs pa ji ltar 'jug pa'i yan lag yin /
analyzed: sngar ma rtogs pa ji ltar 'jug pa'i yan lag yin /
translated: But if it is that one who seeks to be non-harmful, then how is that which was not previously understood a branch of engagement?

original: des na de bzhin du skyon gnas so //
analyzed: des na de bzhin du skyon gnas so //
translated: Therefore, the error remains as before.

original: de'i phyir 'jig rten ni skyes bu'i don du gnyer bas 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro ;üîΩ/'jig rten pa ni de dang 'brel pa can nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jig rten ni skyes bu'i don du gnyer bas 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro ; /'jig rten pa ni de dang 'brel pa can nyid yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the world is engaged in the pursuit of human goals.üîΩThe world is related to that, but it is not non-erroneous.

original: gnod pa med pa can nyid ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //üîΩde'i phyir / mi bslu yon tan rnam shes la //
analyzed: gnod pa med pa can nyid ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o // de'i phyir / mi bslu yon tan rnam shes la //
translated: This is the intended meaning.üîΩTherefore,

original: lhag par mngon 'dod su zhig yin //üîΩde la dang po'i rag las par //
analyzed: lhag par mngon 'dod su zhig yin // de la dang po'i rag las par //
translated: who would desire a consciousness that has the quality of non-deception?üîΩThe first is dependent on the power

original: gang gi stobs kyis 'gyur ba yin ;
analyzed: gang gi stobs kyis 'gyur ba yin ;
translated: by which it comes to be.

original: / zhes bya bas gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: / zhes bya bas gsal ba yin no //
translated: This is made clear.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur na /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur na /
translated: If it were so,

original: 'jig rten na dam bcas pa'i don dang phrad par byed pa la ni mi bslu ba yin gyi dam bcas pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten na dam bcas pa'i don dang phrad par byed pa la ni mi bslu ba yin gyi dam bcas pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: then in the world, that which causes one to encounter the object of a thesis is non-deceptive, not just the thesis itself.

original: de bzhin du shes pa yang bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes pa yang bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: In the same way, consciousness is either itself,

original: gzhan la yang rung ba'i 'jug pa'i yul gyi don nye bar bstan pa dang phrad par byed pa ni mi bslu ba can yin gyi shes pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la yang rung ba'i 'jug pa'i yul gyi don nye bar bstan pa dang phrad par byed pa ni mi bslu ba can yin gyi shes pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: or else it is non-deceptive when it causes one to encounter the object that is the domain of engagement that is presented to it, but not mere consciousness.

original: de yang 'jug par byed pa na zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'jug par byed pa na zhes smos pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is said, ‚Äúwhen it engages.‚Äù

original: 'jug pa'i yul ni sreg pa la sogs pa'i don byed pa can gyi shes pa'i yul yin gyi /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul ni sreg pa la sogs pa'i don byed pa can gyi shes pa'i yul yin gyi /
translated: The object of engagement is the object of a consciousness that performs the action of burning, etc.,

original: skad cig gam sgro btags pa yang rung bas shes pas bzung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul ji ltar yul yin /
analyzed: skad cig gam sgro btags pa yang rung bas shes pas bzung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul ji ltar yul yin /
translated: but it is not the object of a consciousness that apprehends a moment or a continuum, whether real or imagined.

original: bden te snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig dag gcig pa nyid du zhen pa nyid kyis 'jug pa'i yul 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: bden te snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig dag gcig pa nyid du zhen pa nyid kyis 'jug pa'i yul 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: It is true that the object of engagement is apprehended by the conception of the sameness of the prior and subsequent moments.

original: de yang yongs su bcad nas zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: de yang yongs su bcad nas zhes smos pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is said, ‚Äúhaving delimited it.‚Äù

original: de ltar yang me la spyin sreg byas pas mtho ris thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rig byed las byung ba'i shes pa dang / dung la ser po la sogs pa'i yul can gyi shes pa tsam tshad ma yin par smras par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yang me la spyin sreg byas pas mtho ris thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rig byed las byung ba'i shes pa dang / dung la ser po la sogs pa'i yul can gyi shes pa tsam tshad ma yin par smras par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it would follow that the consciousness that arises from the Vedic statement, ‚ÄúOne attains heaven by offering a fire sacrifice,‚Äù and the consciousness that has as its object the yellow color of a conch, etc., are valid cognitions.

original: 'jug pa'i yul du nye bar bstan pa de dang phrad par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul du nye bar bstan pa de dang phrad par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not contact the object that is indicated as the object of engagement.

original: the tshom las dang ma yin pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: the tshom las dang ma yin pa las kyang ngo //
translated: and from doubt and from non-error.

original: phrad par byed pa ni tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: phrad par byed pa ni tshad ma yin te /
translated: The instrument is that which causes contact.

original: yongs su bcad pa'i yul la yang 'jug pa na /
analyzed: yongs su bcad pa'i yul la yang 'jug pa na /
translated: When the object is delimited, it is engaged,

original: phrad par snang ba'i phyir yongs su gcod par byed pa ni 'jug pa dang phrad pa de dag gi rgyu mtshan yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phrad par snang ba'i phyir yongs su gcod par byed pa ni 'jug pa dang phrad pa de dag gi rgyu mtshan yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it appears to be in contact. The cause of the engagement and contact is the instrument, and not anything else.

original: yongs su gcod pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: yongs su gcod pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na tshad ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the instrument is the nature of that which causes delimitation.

original: @18a * // de nyid kyis na snga rol nyid du yongs su bcad pa ni rgyu yin no //
analyzed: @18a * // de nyid kyis na snga rol nyid du yongs su bcad pa ni rgyu yin no //
translated: And because of that, the cause is the prior delimitation.

original: de nyid kyis na yongs su bcad pa na tshad ma'i bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na yongs su bcad pa na tshad ma'i bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: And because of that, when there is delimitation, all the activity of the instrument is completed.

original: de yang don rtogs pa ni 'bras bu yin zhes bya bas bstan to //
analyzed: de yang don rtogs pa ni 'bras bu yin zhes bya bas bstan to //
translated: And that is the effect, the understanding of the object.

original: de ltar yang mi bslu ba la sogs pa'i shes pa gzhan la ltos pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yang mi bslu ba la sogs pa'i shes pa gzhan la ltos pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa yin te /
translated: Thus, it is shown that non-deception and so on do not depend on any other cognition.

original: gang gi phyir de nyid kyis phrad pa'i bar gyi don rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de nyid kyis phrad pa'i bar gyi don rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Because of that, the meaning of contact is understood.

original: mi bslu ba'i shes pas ni dgos pa med de bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi bslu ba'i shes pas ni dgos pa med de bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But if it is nondeceptive, then there is no need for it, because it is not distinguished.

original: de nyid kyi yul yongs su gcod pa na tshad ma'i bya ba rdzogs pa yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi yul yongs su gcod pa na tshad ma'i bya ba rdzogs pa yin la /
translated: When it determines its object, the function of valid knowledge is complete.

original: rang nyid kyis rtogs pa la gzhan yang yin nam zhes bya bar phyis byung ba yin par the tshom za bas de la gnod par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis rtogs pa la gzhan yang yin nam zhes bya bar phyis byung ba yin par the tshom za bas de la gnod par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: If it is understood by itself, then later on there is doubt, thinking, ‚ÄúIs it also for others?‚Äù So it is not harmed by that.

original: des na phyi rol du gyur pa'i phyir dang / rnam grangs kyis nges par 'dzin pa'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: des na phyi rol du gyur pa'i phyir dang / rnam grangs kyis nges par 'dzin pa'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: Therefore, because it is external and because it is ascertained by enumeration, it is also conceptual thought.

original: de yang de dang ldan pa rnams de sa bsdus pa'i phyir nges par rtog pa yang yin zhes gsungs pa dang / yang gang dang gang rab tu dbye ba yod pa dag ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin la /
analyzed: de yang de dang ldan pa rnams de sa bsdus pa'i phyir nges par rtog pa yang yin zhes gsungs pa dang / yang gang dang gang rab tu dbye ba yod pa dag ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin la /
translated: And it is said that it is also conceptual thought because those who possess it are included in that level, and that which has distinctions is the cause of doubt.

original: de dag gis ni dngos po thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir dang / de dag gcig par yang nges pa med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: de dag gis ni dngos po thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir dang / de dag gcig par yang nges pa med pa'i phyir la /
translated: Because they include all things, and because it is not certain that they are one.

original: de'i phyir the tshom gyi yan lag yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir the tshom gyi yan lag yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is a limb of doubt.

original: gal te de yang phung po gzhan du 'gyur ba de lta na yang bdag med pa nyid med nas nges par bdag dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: gal te de yang phung po gzhan du 'gyur ba de lta na yang bdag med pa nyid med nas nges par bdag dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur grang na /
translated: If that is another aggregate, then even if there is no self, it is certain that there is a self.

original: rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba yang srid pa'i phyir nges pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba yang srid pa'i phyir nges pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is possible that it changes in another way, it is not certain.

original: gnyis po dag las kyang rnam pa gcig tu nges pa med par mthong na the tshom du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gnyis po dag las kyang rnam pa gcig tu nges pa med par mthong na the tshom du 'gyur gyi /
translated: If one sees that it is not certain in one way or another, then it is doubt.

original: gzhan du na ni ma rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du na ni ma rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Otherwise, it is non-comprehension.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang me mthong bar nges na gzhan du mthong ba'i phyir the tshom gyis tshad ma'i byad par nges pa la gnod par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang me mthong bar nges na gzhan du mthong ba'i phyir the tshom gyis tshad ma'i byad par nges pa la gnod par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, if one sees that fire is certain, then because it is seen in another way, doubt does not harm the certainty of the valid cognition.

original: de la gnod pa yin na rang nyid med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnod pa yin na rang nyid med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it harms that, then it itself would not exist.

original: de yang 'dir byung ba gang gi phyir zhes ldog par 'gyur /
analyzed: de yang 'dir byung ba gang gi phyir zhes ldog par 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, here the term ‚Äúbecause‚Äù would be the contrapositive.

original: de'i phyir de tsam ni gzhan la ltos pa'i tshad ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir de tsam ni gzhan la ltos pa'i tshad ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, that alone is a valid cognition that depends on something other,üîΩbut it is not a valid cognition that ascertains its own object.

original: rang gi yul la nges pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bsam pas 'phangs pas mi slu ba can nyid de'i zhes zer ba la 'di la lan du /
analyzed: rang gi yul la nges pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bsam pas 'phangs pas mi slu ba can nyid de'i zhes zer ba la 'di la lan du /
translated: Since this is the intended meaning, the response to the statement that ‚Äúnondeceptive‚Äù is that very [valid cognition] is as follows:

original: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid //
translated: The nature of consciousness

original: ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ste /
translated: is not a valid cognition.

original: sngon po'i shes pa ni sngon po'i rang gi ngo bo yin la /
analyzed: sngon po'i shes pa ni sngon po'i rang gi ngo bo yin la /
translated: The consciousness of blue is the nature of blue,

original: de rtogs @18b pa yang de la tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de rtogs @18b pa yang de la tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: and the realization of that is not a valid cognition in regard to that,

original: dung la ser po'i shes pa yang de nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //üîΩdung la ser po'i shes pa la phrad par bya ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dung la ser po'i shes pa yang de nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // dung la ser po'i shes pa la phrad par bya ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: because it follows that the consciousness of yellow in regard to a conch would be that.

original: de rtogs pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de rtogs pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable to say that the consciousness of yellow in regard to a conch does not realize that because there is no contact with it.

original: cig shos la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cig shos la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the same would apply to the other [consciousness].

original: gcig par zhen par byed pa ni ser po'i shes pa la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: gcig par zhen par byed pa ni ser po'i shes pa la yang mtshungs so //
translated: The apprehension of singularity is the same for the consciousness of yellow.

original: de ltar zhen pas phrad par bya ba'i ser po med pa'i phyir der 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar zhen pas phrad par bya ba'i ser po med pa'i phyir der 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: Since there is no yellow to be perceived in that way, it is an error.

original: gzhan la ni phrad par bya ba yod pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la ni phrad par bya ba yod pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
translated: In the other case, it is valid knowledge because there is something to be perceived.

original: 'di la yang phrad par bya ba yod pa'i tshad ma ci zhig yod /
analyzed: 'di la yang phrad par bya ba yod pa'i tshad ma ci zhig yod /
translated: What is the valid knowledge here that there is something to be perceived?

original: zhen pas yin no //
analyzed: zhen pas yin no //
translated: It is the conception.

original: 'di ni gzhan la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni gzhan la yang mtshungs so //
translated: This is the same in the other case.

original: de la med par shes pa gzhan gyis dus phyis rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de la med par shes pa gzhan gyis dus phyis rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The later cognition that knows it to be nonexistent is different.

original: 'di la yang der zhen pa phrad par bya ba med par yang mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di la yang der zhen pa phrad par bya ba med par yang mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: Here too, the conception of it as existent is seen to be nonexistent.

original: yod pa dang med par zhen pa thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir the tshom yin no //
analyzed: yod pa dang med par zhen pa thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir the tshom yin no //
translated: Since the conception of existence and nonexistence is not shared, it is doubt.

original: de ni nges pa dang 'gal ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni nges pa dang 'gal ba can ma yin te /
translated: It is not contradictory to certainty,

original: rim gyis nges pa'i ngo bo mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim gyis nges pa'i ngo bo mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of gradual certainty is seen.

original: the tshom dang nges pa dag tu mi 'gal zhes zer ba'i shes rab ma nor ba can gyi btsun pa nyon mongs so //
analyzed: the tshom dang nges pa dag tu mi 'gal zhes zer ba'i shes rab ma nor ba can gyi btsun pa nyon mongs so //
translated: The venerable one who is not mistaken about wisdom says that doubt and certainty are not contradictory.

original: the tshom la yang yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid du nges pa yin pa 'di la 'jig rten shin tu gcod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: the tshom la yang yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid du nges pa yin pa 'di la 'jig rten shin tu gcod par byed pa yin te /
translated: Also, with regard to doubt, there is ascertainment of existence or nonexistence, and the world is very much engaged in this.

original: 'jig rten ni nges pa ma bzung ba'i bdag nyid can gyi shes pa la the tshom zhes zer te /
analyzed: 'jig rten ni nges pa ma bzung ba'i bdag nyid can gyi shes pa la the tshom zhes zer te /
translated: The world says that a consciousness that does not apprehend a definite object is doubt.

original: sdod dum mam me zhes bya ba'i nges pa ma bzung ba'i phyogs gnyis kyi snang ba las the tshom za ba'i lam gyi sgras brdar byas pa'i don ni ma nges pa la mngon par dpyod pa yin te /
analyzed: sdod dum mam me zhes bya ba'i nges pa ma bzung ba'i phyogs gnyis kyi snang ba las the tshom za ba'i lam gyi sgras brdar byas pa'i don ni ma nges pa la mngon par dpyod pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of the term doubt, which is a path of analysis, is that it is an analysis of an object that is not ascertained from the appearance of two possibilities, such as ‚Äúit is‚Äù or ‚Äúit is not‚Äù or ‚Äúit abides‚Äù or ‚Äúit does not abide.‚Äù

original: shes pa gnyis po de dag rim gyis skye ba'am ;
analyzed: shes pa gnyis po de dag rim gyis skye ba'am ;
translated: Whether those two consciousnesses arise sequentially or

original: rim pa las gzhan par skye yang rung ba'i shes pa ni rim gyis dngos po gnyis su ma nges pa la dpyod pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rim pa las gzhan par skye yang rung ba'i shes pa ni rim gyis dngos po gnyis su ma nges pa la dpyod pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: not, the consciousness that arises either sequentially or otherwise is an analysis of an object that is not ascertained as two things.

original: mthong ba nges pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba nges pa can ma yin te /
translated: It is not a definite perception.

original: rim gyis sam gzhan du yang rung ste the tshom zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gyis sam gzhan du yang rung ste the tshom zhes bya'o //
translated: Whether it arises sequentially or otherwise, it is called doubt.

original: rim pa dang rim pa ma yin par 'byung bar nges pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i rigs pa rnams ni the tshom nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim pa dang rim pa ma yin par 'byung bar nges pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i rigs pa rnams ni the tshom nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The reasonings of the certainty of the occurrence of blue and so forth in stages and not in stages are reduced to doubt.

original: de'i phyir phrad par bya ba sngon por zhen pa'i nges pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir phrad par bya ba sngon por zhen pa'i nges pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because there is no cause for the certainty of the conception of the object of contact as blue,

original: cha shas gcig par zhen pa yang rig byed bzhin du gzhan pa nyid du dogs pa ma bsal ba'i phyir the tshom nyid yin par rang nyid las tshad ma ma @19a * //
analyzed: cha shas gcig par zhen pa yang rig byed bzhin du gzhan pa nyid du dogs pa ma bsal ba'i phyir the tshom nyid yin par rang nyid las tshad ma ma @19a * //
translated: the conception of the object as a single part, like the Vedas, is not cleared of the doubt of being different, and therefore it is itself reduced to doubt.

original: yin no // de lta yin na ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: yin no // de lta yin na ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: If that is so, how does it engage?

original: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because it is not a valid cognition.

original: zhugs nas kyang shes pa gzhan nyid kyis nges par rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: zhugs nas kyang shes pa gzhan nyid kyis nges par rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: Even though it engages, it is ascertained by another cognition.

original: snga ma nyid ni de la tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: snga ma nyid ni de la tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: The former is not a valid cognition in regard to that.

original: snga mas kyang yul gyi nges pa ma bzung la /
analyzed: snga mas kyang yul gyi nges pa ma bzung la /
translated: The former does not apprehend the ascertainment of the object,

original: shes pa phyi ma'i dus su yang rang bzhin mi 'dor bas yul nges pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa phyi ma'i dus su yang rang bzhin mi 'dor bas yul nges pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and at the time of the later cognition, because it does not relinquish its nature, it does not become an ascertainment of the object.

original: the tshom ni phyis nges pa dang phrad pa can bzung bar 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: the tshom ni phyis nges pa dang phrad pa can bzung bar 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: Doubt is not held to be the apprehension of what is to be grasped later on when certainty is encountered.

original: de'i phyir gang dang gang gi 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang dang gang gi 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin /
translated: So what is it that holds the connection?

original: dus kyis kyang de dang 'dra ba mthong ba las 'jug pa ji ltar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: dus kyis kyang de dang 'dra ba mthong ba las 'jug pa ji ltar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: And how can one engage in activity on the basis of seeing something similar to what was seen before?

original: sngon rol du nges pa bzung ba yin na de dag gi 'brel pa 'dzin pas de dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su dpag pas 'jug pa thams cad mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon rol du nges pa bzung ba yin na de dag gi 'brel pa 'dzin pas de dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su dpag pas 'jug pa thams cad mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: If it is held that certainty is grasped beforehand, then all inferences that engage in activity on the basis of holding the connection between what is seen and what is similar to it are the same.

original: bden te / phyi ma 'ba' zhig nyid ni de'i tshe don med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis gzung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: bden te / phyi ma 'ba' zhig nyid ni de'i tshe don med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis gzung ba yin gyi /
translated: It is true that only the latter is held to be the reason for the occurrence of the former, since it is the case that the latter does not occur without the former.

original: sngar gyi ni ma yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: sngar gyi ni ma yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: But since the former is not the reason for the occurrence of the latter, there is no error.

original: de dang ldan pa rnams des bsdus pa'i phyir zhes kyang gang smras pa la phung po gzhan med par bstan pas the tshom gyi yul dag gi gcig med na cig shos ma yin zhes bya ba ni don gyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa rnams des bsdus pa'i phyir zhes kyang gang smras pa la phung po gzhan med par bstan pas the tshom gyi yul dag gi gcig med na cig shos ma yin zhes bya ba ni don gyi nges pa'o //
translated: As for the statement that those who possess the latter are included in the former, since it is taught that there is no other aggregate, the meaning of the statement that if one of the objects of doubt does not exist, the other does not exist is that the latter is included in the former.

original: phung po gzhan nyid yod na ni de ltar mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: phung po gzhan nyid yod na ni de ltar mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i don du ste /
translated: If there were another collection, it would not be so.

original: de ltar ma nges pa 'dzin pa la the tshom za bar rig pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar ma nges pa 'dzin pa la the tshom za bar rig pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is known that doubt is the apprehension of that which is not ascertained.

original: de yang gnas ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa tsam ste /
analyzed: de yang gnas ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa tsam ste /
translated: Moreover, it is mere adherence to what is not a basis.

original: phung po gzhan med par bstan pa na the tshom gyi yan lag yin gyi /
analyzed: phung po gzhan med par bstan pa na the tshom gyi yan lag yin gyi /
translated: When it is taught that there is no other collection, it is a limb of doubt.

original: nges pa'i yan lag ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa'i yan lag ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not a limb of ascertainment.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: Thus, it is said:

original: tshad ma rnam par nges pa las /
analyzed: tshad ma rnam par nges pa las /
translated: In the Ascertainment of Valid Cognition,

original: bdag yod pa dang rnam par bcad pa dag gis thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag yod pa dang rnam par bcad pa dag gis thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir /
translated: it is said that since the existence of the self and its negation include everything,

original: thams cad khongs su gtogs pa ma yin par mi rigs te /
analyzed: thams cad khongs su gtogs pa ma yin par mi rigs te /
translated: it is not reasonable that everything is not included.

original: the tshom za ba yin no zhes kyang smos so //
analyzed: the tshom za ba yin no zhes kyang smos so //
translated: It is also said that it is doubtful.

original: phung po gzhan med pa'i phyir ma rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: phung po gzhan med pa'i phyir ma rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Since there is no other collection, it is not understood.

original: de yang rtogs pa ni gnyi ga rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rtogs pa ni gnyi ga rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, understanding is not the understanding of both,

original: the tshom gyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: the tshom gyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: because it has the nature of doubt.

original: de gnyi ga las phyi rol du gyur pa yin na ji ltar de'i khongs su gtogs pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de gnyi ga las phyi rol du gyur pa yin na ji ltar de'i khongs su gtogs pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: If it is external to both, how can it be included in either?

original: de bstan pa ni gnyi ga las phyi rol du gyur pa ni med par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni gnyi ga las phyi rol du gyur pa ni med par shes par bya ste /
translated: It is taught that it should be understood as external to both.

original: de med pa'am gnyi ga'i ngo bor the tshom za ba yin la /
analyzed: de med pa'am gnyi ga'i ngo bor the tshom za ba yin la /
translated: It is either non-existent or it is doubted that it is the nature of both.

original: de dag @19b las gcig med par nges pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de dag @19b las gcig med par nges pa yin gyi /
translated: It is ascertained that one of those two does not exist.

original: yul gyi nges ba ma bzung ba'i the tshom gyi shes pa nyid ni gcig gi ngo bo la nges par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul gyi nges ba ma bzung ba'i the tshom gyi shes pa nyid ni gcig gi ngo bo la nges par mi 'gyur te /
translated: But a doubt consciousness that does not apprehend a definite object will not ascertain the nature of one of those two.

original: de ma gtogs pa nyid ni phung po gzhan med pa la the tshom du 'gyur bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma gtogs pa nyid ni phung po gzhan med pa la the tshom du 'gyur bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it would follow that it would be a doubt that the other aggregates do not exist.

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not because they are contradictory,

original: the tshom za ba la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: the tshom za ba la yang mtshungs so //
translated: then it is the same for doubt.

original: de bas na dngos po gcig la nges pa'i phyir shes ba gzhan yin par bstan gyi the tshom nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na dngos po gcig la nges pa'i phyir shes ba gzhan yin par bstan gyi the tshom nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore it is taught that it is a different consciousness because it is ascertained with regard to one thing, but it is not doubt.

original: phyi ma nyid ni don med na ni 'byung ba'i phyir tshad ma yin gyi snga ma ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi ma nyid ni don med na ni 'byung ba'i phyir tshad ma yin gyi snga ma ni ma yin no //
translated: The latter is valid knowledge because it arises when the object does not exist, but the former is not.

original: de yang ma yin te snga ma bzhin du phyi ma yang gcig pa nyid du zhen pa can yin yang /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te snga ma bzhin du phyi ma yang gcig pa nyid du zhen pa can yin yang /
translated: This is not so, because as before, even though the latter is conceived to be the same,

original: nges pa can ma yin pas gzhan pa nyid du rtogs pa nyid ma bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: nges pa can ma yin pas gzhan pa nyid du rtogs pa nyid ma bsal ba yin no //
translated: it is not ascertained, and so the realization of difference is not eliminated.

original: 'di la snga ma las bye brag ci zhig yod /
analyzed: 'di la snga ma las bye brag ci zhig yod /
translated: What is the difference between this and the former?

original: rab rib can gyi yang phyi ma la tshad mar thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab rib can gyi yang phyi ma la tshad mar thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: It follows that even the latter is valid knowledge for one with eye disease,

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: because in that case,

original: gcig la shes pa gnyis tshad ma ma yin par mi rigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang phan tshun rten pa dang / thug pa med pa la sogs snga ma dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: gcig la shes pa gnyis tshad ma ma yin par mi rigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang phan tshun rten pa dang / thug pa med pa la sogs snga ma dang mtshungs so //
translated: the mutual dependence, the infinite regress, and so on, are the same as before.

original: de lta yin na mi slu ba nyid ji ltar yin /
analyzed: de lta yin na mi slu ba nyid ji ltar yin /
translated: If that is so, how can it be nondeceptive?

original: smras pa / sreg pa la sogs par gtogs pa ni skyes bu'i don yin la /
analyzed: smras pa / sreg pa la sogs par gtogs pa ni skyes bu'i don yin la /
translated: It is said: The purpose of a person is to engage in burning and so on.

original: rang gi ngo bos ni de nyid kyang phrad par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ni de nyid kyang phrad par bya ba yin te /
translated: By its own nature, that itself is to be engaged.

original: de'i don du yang skyes bu 'jug pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i don du yang skyes bu 'jug pa yin gyi /
translated: and for that purpose, a person engages in the means of knowing it.

original: phrad par 'dod pa'i phyir de las phyi ma tshol ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phrad par 'dod pa'i phyir de las phyi ma tshol ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that he seeks the latter means because he desires the former.

original: de dang ma phrad pa yin na de 'dod pas de'i thabs don du gnyer ba yin no //
analyzed: de dang ma phrad pa yin na de 'dod pas de'i thabs don du gnyer ba yin no //
translated: If he does not know the latter, then he desires it and seeks the means of knowing it.

original: shes pa snga ma ni rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa yin yang phyi ma'i thabs nyid don du gnyer bar byed pa yin gyi rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa snga ma ni rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa yin yang phyi ma'i thabs nyid don du gnyer bar byed pa yin gyi rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin te /
translated: Although the former cognition knows its own nature, it seeks the means of knowing the latter, but not its own nature,

original: skyes bu'i don ma yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: skyes bu'i don ma yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: because it is not for the sake of a person.

original: 'di'i rang gi ngo bo ni du ba dang 'dra ba nges pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i rang gi ngo bo ni du ba dang 'dra ba nges pa yin no //
translated: And its own nature is ascertained like smoke.

original: de'i thabs nyid ni goms pa med na du ba kho na bzhin du gzhan las nges par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i thabs nyid ni goms pa med na du ba kho na bzhin du gzhan las nges par bya ba yin la /
translated: If there is no practice of the means of knowing the latter, it is to be ascertained from another, like smoke itself.

original: goms pa yin na ni de nyid kho na las so //
analyzed: goms pa yin na ni de nyid kho na las so //
translated: But if there is practice, it is from that itself.

original: de'i 'bras bu yin par phyir de dang gcig pa nyid du zhen pa sa de dang yul mtshungs pa nyid dam /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu yin par phyir de dang gcig pa nyid du zhen pa sa de dang yul mtshungs pa nyid dam /
translated: Because it is the result of that, it is conceived to be the same as that, so it has the same object as that,

original: de snga ma'i yul nyid yin yang rung /
analyzed: de snga ma'i yul nyid yin yang rung /
translated: or it is the object of the former.

original: dung la ser po'i shes pa ni phrad par bya ba'i thabs nyid dam /
analyzed: dung la ser po'i shes pa ni phrad par bya ba'i thabs nyid dam /
translated: The cognition of yellow in a conch is not a means of ascertaining the object to be contacted,

original: de dang gcig pa nyid du nges par byed pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang gcig pa nyid du nges par byed pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: nor is it a means of ascertaining that it is the same as that.

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam ni me mthong ba po la du ba la nges pa lta bur nges par @20a * //üîΩbyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam ni me mthong ba po la du ba la nges pa lta bur nges par @20a * // byed pa ma yin no //
translated: For, the mere nature of the object is not ascertained by the cognition of fire, as is smoke.

original: des na tshad ma ma yin pa dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir dang / nges pa skyes pa'i phyir the tshom za ba ma yin te /
analyzed: des na tshad ma ma yin pa dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir dang / nges pa skyes pa'i phyir the tshom za ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, because it is not a means of valid cognition and because it is not a means of ascertaining the object, it is not a means of ascertaining the object.

original: me'i shes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: me'i shes pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the cognition of fire.

original: rang gi ngo bo ni dang po mngon sum gyis nges pa dang goms pa yang yod pa las de dang 'brel pa can nyid dam ;
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni dang po mngon sum gyis nges pa dang goms pa yang yod pa las de dang 'brel pa can nyid dam ;
translated: The nature of the object is ascertained by direct perception at first, and it is ascertained by that which is related to it or by that itself through habituation.

original: de nyid la nges par byed pa'i phyir mngon sum tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid la nges par byed pa'i phyir mngon sum tshad ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is a means of valid cognition.

original: snga ma ni goms pa med pa la yang gi ngo bo nges pa yin te /
analyzed: snga ma ni goms pa med pa la yang gi ngo bo nges pa yin te /
translated: The former is the ascertainment of the nature of the object even without habituation.

original: phrad par bya ba la the tshom za ba ni de rtogs na phrad par bya ba la the tshom za ba ldog pa yin la /
analyzed: phrad par bya ba la the tshom za ba ni de rtogs na phrad par bya ba la the tshom za ba ldog pa yin la /
translated: When there is doubt about the object to be contacted, then doubt about the object to be contacted is eliminated when it is realized.

original: de log na rang gi ngo bo la nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de log na rang gi ngo bo la nges pa yin te /
