translated: When that is eliminated, there is certainty about its own nature.

original: phrad par bya ba rtogs pa dang 'brel pa can nyid kyis nges par byed do //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba rtogs pa dang 'brel pa can nyid kyis nges par byed do //
translated: It is ascertained by the very connection with the realization of the object to be contacted.

original: don 'dzin pa la the tshom za ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: don 'dzin pa la the tshom za ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because there is doubt about apprehending the object.

original: tshad ma ma yin yang shes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin yang shes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Even though it is not a valid cognition, it is the nature of consciousness.

original: phyi ma yang snga ma las bye brag med pa'i phyir 'brel pa rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi ma yang snga ma las bye brag med pa'i phyir 'brel pa rig pa ma yin no //
translated: The latter is not related to the former, because there is no difference from the former.

original: de'i phyir yang don byed pa'i byed pa po nyid ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang don byed pa'i byed pa po nyid ma yin mod kyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not a valid cognition.

original: 'on kyang grub pa ste bdag nyid thob pa la mi bslu ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang grub pa ste bdag nyid thob pa la mi bslu ba'o //
translated: However, it is established, i.e., it obtains its own nature, and is non-deceptive with regard to that.

original: de dang 'brel pa can snga ma tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa can snga ma tshad ma yin te /
translated: The former, which is connected with that, is a valid cognition.

original: phrad par byed pa skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo'i de kho na nyid du rtogs pa de 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: phrad par byed pa skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo'i de kho na nyid du rtogs pa de 'bras bu ste /
translated: The realization of the reality of the nature of the producer of the contact is the result.

original: don rtogs pa ni 'bras bu'o zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: don rtogs pa ni 'bras bu'o zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: The realization of the object is the result.

original: de ltar yang de la ma 'khrul pa can gyi ngo bo de nyid kyis rtogs par byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ltar yang de la ma 'khrul pa can gyi ngo bo de nyid kyis rtogs par byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Thus, it is because it causes the realization of that very nature which is non-erroneous with regard to that.

original: de nyid kyis de ltar rtogs pa ni tshad ma nyid yin gyi de nyid kyi rgyu ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis de ltar rtogs pa ni tshad ma nyid yin gyi de nyid kyi rgyu ni ma yin te /
translated: The realization of that by means of that is valid knowledge, but it is not the cause of that.

original: me'i de ma thag pa'i du ba'i shes pa ni me'i shes pa yin pa de bzhin du phrad par bya ba la ma 'khrul pa can nyid kyi shes pa ni phrad par bya ba'i shes pa yin te /
analyzed: me'i de ma thag pa'i du ba'i shes pa ni me'i shes pa yin pa de bzhin du phrad par bya ba la ma 'khrul pa can nyid kyi shes pa ni phrad par bya ba'i shes pa yin te /
translated: Just as the cognition of smoke immediately after fire is the cognition of fire, so the cognition of contact by means of that which is non-erroneous with regard to contact is the cognition of contact.

original: ma 'khrul pa can nyid rtogs pa po tshad ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ma 'khrul pa can nyid rtogs pa po tshad ma yin gyi /
translated: The non-erroneous cognition is valid knowledge,

original: rtogs par byed pa po nyid ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa po nyid ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: but it is not the agent of realization. This is the meaning.

original: de yang 'di'i don dang 'dra ba ni tshad ma nyid yin no zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'di'i don dang 'dra ba ni tshad ma nyid yin no zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: And that is similar to the meaning of this, namely, that it is valid knowledge. This is what is said.

original: phrad par bya ba dang 'dra ba phrad par bya ba la ma 'khrul pa can gyi ngo bo nyid kyi yul nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba dang 'dra ba phrad par bya ba la ma 'khrul pa can gyi ngo bo nyid kyi yul nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the object is ascertained as having the nature of not being mistaken about what is to be contacted, which is similar to what is to be contacted.

original: de rtogs pa nyid ni phrad par bya ba phrad par bya ba rtogs pa yin la //
analyzed: de rtogs pa nyid ni phrad par bya ba phrad par bya ba rtogs pa yin la //
translated: The understanding of that is the understanding of what is to be contacted as what is to be contacted.

original: rtogs pa yod na 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa yod na 'jug pa yin te /
translated: When there is understanding, there is engagement.

original: rtogs pa dang 'jug pa dag ni rgyu dang rgyu can yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad phyogs 'di la rigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rtogs pa dang 'jug pa dag ni rgyu dang rgyu can yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad phyogs 'di la rigs pa yin gyi /
translated: Understanding and engagement are cause and effect, and so on. All of this reasoning applies to our position,

original: khyed kyi phyogs la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khyed kyi phyogs la ni ma yin te /
translated: but not to your position,

original: @20b de mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @20b de mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is impossible.

original: don yang so sor snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: don yang so sor snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: And don't the objects appear individually?

original: bden te / de la nges pa'i rgyu med ba'i phyir the tshom can yin no //
analyzed: bden te / de la nges pa'i rgyu med ba'i phyir the tshom can yin no //
translated: That is true, but because there is no cause for ascertaining them, they are uncertain.

original: de de lta yin na rang gi ngo bo'i phyogs la yang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de de lta yin na rang gi ngo bo'i phyogs la yang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: If that is so, then it is the same for the position of intrinsic nature.

original: mtshungs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not the same,

original: de ni rang nyid rigs pas nges pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang nyid rigs pas nges pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is ascertained by reasoning itself.

original: 'di la yang don la nges pa'i dus phyis skyes pa'i the tshom ni de dang 'gal ba can ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la yang don la nges pa'i dus phyis skyes pa'i the tshom ni de dang 'gal ba can ma yin no //
translated: And in this case, too, doubt that arises after the time of ascertainment of the object is not contradictory to that ascertainment.

original: de lta na ni sgra las byung ba yang nges pa'i dus phyis de dang 'gal ba can ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni sgra las byung ba yang nges pa'i dus phyis de dang 'gal ba can ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then even that which arises from verbal testimony would not be contradictory to ascertainment after the time of ascertainment.

original: de nyid ni nges pa'i rgyu mtshan can ma skyes pa'i phyir gzhan nyid du the tshom za ba ma bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni nges pa'i rgyu mtshan can ma skyes pa'i phyir gzhan nyid du the tshom za ba ma bsal ba yin no //
translated: Since it is not generated from the very same cause of ascertainment, the doubt about its being different is not removed.

original: de ni 'di la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de ni 'di la yang mtshungs so //
translated: This is the same in the case of the visual consciousness.

original: de bzhin du phyi ma la yang bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi ma la yang bshad par bya'o //
translated: The same explanation applies to the subsequent [moments of visual consciousness].

original: shes pa phyi ma ni don la nges par byed pa can yin te /
analyzed: shes pa phyi ma ni don la nges par byed pa can yin te /
translated: The subsequent cognition ascertains the object,

original: de ma thag tu don byed pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ma thag tu don byed pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: because it generates the performance of the object‚Äôs function immediately after [the initial visual cognition].

original: don la nus pa can gyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don la nus pa can gyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it has the characteristic of being capable with regard to the object.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de'i tshe nus pa mi shes pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i tshe nus pa mi shes pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because at that time, the capability is not known.

original: gzugs nyid mthong ba na nges pa skyes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs nyid mthong ba na nges pa skyes pa ma yin te /
translated: When form is seen, ascertainment does not arise.

original: snga ma bzhin du the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: Doubt, as before, arises.

original: don byed pa'i shes pa ni don dang don byed pa yang rig pa yin zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: don byed pa'i shes pa ni don dang don byed pa yang rig pa yin zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable to say that a cognitive act that performs a function is aware of an object and performs a function,

original: cig car ba ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: cig car ba ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it is not instantaneous.

original: rim pa med pa la rim pa dang ldan par rigs pa ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: rim pa med pa la rim pa dang ldan par rigs pa ni mi rigs so //
translated: It is not reasonable to say that what is not sequential is sequential.

original: don byed pa dang rjes su mthun pa tsam 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir don no //
analyzed: don byed pa dang rjes su mthun pa tsam 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir don no //
translated: We accept that the object is merely consistent with the performance of a function.

original: bden pa dang mi bden pa 'byed par byed na ni thug pa med pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bden pa dang mi bden pa 'byed par byed na ni thug pa med pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were to distinguish the true and the false, there would be an infinite regress, and so on.

original: nges pa can las skyes pa yang glo bur du du ba las me'i shes pa gang yin pa gang 'brel pa nges pa med na tshad ma ma yin te ;
analyzed: nges pa can las skyes pa yang glo bur du du ba las me'i shes pa gang yin pa gang 'brel pa nges pa med na tshad ma ma yin te ;
translated: Moreover, the cognition of fire from smoke that arises from a definite relation is valid knowledge, but not the cognition of fire from smoke that arises from an indefinite relation.

original: de yang ches nges pa can ma yin pa las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang ches nges pa can ma yin pa las byung ba yin no //
translated: And that also arises from a very definite relation.

original: rjes su dpag pa la ni nges pa can las skyes pa nyid la sogs pa nges pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyis mngon sum la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la ni nges pa can las skyes pa nyid la sogs pa nges pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyis mngon sum la ni ma yin te /
translated: In inference, it arises from a definite relation, and so on, but not in perception, because

original: de ni mthong ba nyid kyis don la nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni mthong ba nyid kyis don la nges pa yin no //
translated: that is definite with regard to the object by mere seeing.

original: dung la ser po la sogs pa shes ba'i yang mthong ba yod la /üîΩnges pa can las skyes pa nyid las gzhan pa'i bye brag ni med do //
analyzed: dung la ser po la sogs pa shes ba'i yang mthong ba yod la / nges pa can las skyes pa nyid las gzhan pa'i bye brag ni med do //
translated: There is also seeing of a conch as yellow, etc.

original: de yang / don med na ni mi 'byung phyir //üîΩmngon sum la yang tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: de yang / don med na ni mi 'byung phyir // mngon sum la yang tshad ma nyid //
translated: But there is no difference between the two except that one is produced from a valid cognition and the other is not.

original: ces gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: ces gsungs pa ste /
translated: And it is said:üîΩBecause it does not occur if the object does not exist,

original: don ni phrad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: don ni phrad par bya ba'o //
translated: perception is a valid cognition.üîΩThe object is that with which the cognition comes into contact.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig phrad par bya ba mi 'khrul ba can nyid @21a * //üîΩdu 'dzin pa de tshad ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig phrad par bya ba mi 'khrul ba can nyid @21a * // du 'dzin pa de tshad ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, that which is nonerroneous with regard to contact is a valid cognition.

original: gzhan ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: The other is not a valid cognition.

original: phyi rol gyi don du smra ba bzhin du rigs pas bstan pa las tshad ma rnam par gzhag pa ci yang med par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don du smra ba bzhin du rigs pas bstan pa las tshad ma rnam par gzhag pa ci yang med par nges pa yin no //
translated: Just as in the case of the external object, it is certain that there is no valid cognition whatsoever that is established by reasoning.

original: sngon po'i shes pa ni don byed pa'i shes pa la sogs pa bzhin du sngon por rtogs pa byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sngon po'i shes pa ni don byed pa'i shes pa la sogs pa bzhin du sngon por rtogs pa byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the cognition of blue the cause of the understanding of blue, just like the cognition of a causal object?

original: de las gzhan pa rnam par gcod par byed par yang ma 'dres par so sor snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa rnam par gcod par byed par yang ma 'dres par so sor snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it appears distinctly and individually as the exclusion of that which is other than it.

original: de yang de yongs su gcod par byed cing de las gzhan pa rnam par gcod par byed pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang de yongs su gcod par byed cing de las gzhan pa rnam par gcod par byed pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is said that it determines that and excludes what is other than that.

original: de las gzhan pa rnam par gcod pa dang gzhan nyid la the tshom med pa can gyi yul rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa rnam par gcod pa dang gzhan nyid la the tshom med pa can gyi yul rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: It is a cognizer that comprehends an object that is not other than that and is not doubted.

original: rtogs par byed pa nyid spyir btang ba can gyi tshad ma nyid dmigs kyis bsal ba nyid dang 'gal ba can yin pas gsal ba'i phyir gzhan las tshad ma nyid yin zhes zer te /
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa nyid spyir btang ba can gyi tshad ma nyid dmigs kyis bsal ba nyid dang 'gal ba can yin pas gsal ba'i phyir gzhan las tshad ma nyid yin zhes zer te /
translated: Since the mere cognizer that is a general topic is a valid knowledge that is an exception, it is clarified that it is a valid knowledge in regard to other.üîΩThat is also taught:

original: de yang / de phyir rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: de yang / de phyir rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can //
translated: Therefore, the nature of a cognizer

original: gnyis kyis rtogs pa tshad mar 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis kyis rtogs pa tshad mar 'gyur //
translated: is a valid knowledge in regard to two.

original: gzhan min nyid rgyu las skyes pa'i //üîΩskyon shes pa las des bzung byed //
analyzed: gzhan min nyid rgyu las skyes pa'i // skyon shes pa las des bzung byed //
translated: It is not other than that which arises from a cause,

original: ces bstan to //
analyzed: ces bstan to //
translated: and it is apprehended by the one who knows the fault.

original: dmigs kyis bsal ba med na sgrub pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: dmigs kyis bsal ba med na sgrub pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
translated: If there is no exception, it is a valid knowledge because it is the nature of a proof.

original: rtogs pa'i spyi ni ma yin te the tshom yin te 'gal ba can gyis sgrub pas bsal ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i spyi ni ma yin te the tshom yin te 'gal ba can gyis sgrub pas bsal ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not a general cognition, because it is doubt, since it is a cognition of a contradiction, and because it is a cognition of a contradiction.

original: bsal ba can ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bsal ba can ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: A cognition of a contradiction does not exist,

original: rang gi ngo bo rig pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo rig pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because it would follow that it would be a cognition of its own nature.

original: smras pa / nges pa can gyi rgyu mtshan las byung ba'i shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa bzhin du 'di lta bu yin gyi /
analyzed: smras pa / nges pa can gyi rgyu mtshan las byung ba'i shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa bzhin du 'di lta bu yin gyi /
translated: Objection: A cognition that arises from a sign of ascertainment is like an inference, but a cognition that arises from a sign of non-ascertainment is not like that.

original: cig shos cha shas gcig tu nges pa can yang de lta bu ma yin no //
analyzed: cig shos cha shas gcig tu nges pa can yang de lta bu ma yin no //
translated: The other, which is ascertained in part, is not like that.

original: gang la the tshom mam phyin ci log pa yang rang nyid skyes pa yin na de 'di lta bu yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no ma yin te /
analyzed: gang la the tshom mam phyin ci log pa yang rang nyid skyes pa yin na de 'di lta bu yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no ma yin te /
translated: If doubt or error arises in regard to it, it is like that, but not otherwise.

original: de la yang bye brag ma mthong na rang nyid kho na skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang bye brag ma mthong na rang nyid kho na skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If one does not see a difference in it, it arises in regard to itself alone.

original: bye brag kyang 'dir nges pa can las skyes pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: bye brag kyang 'dir nges pa can las skyes pa nyid yin la /
translated: And the difference is produced from ascertainment in this case.

original: der des na nges pa yin la /
analyzed: der des na nges pa yin la /
translated: And it is ascertained by that.

original: de la ma nges na the tshom za'am gzhan yang rung ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de la ma nges na the tshom za'am gzhan yang rung ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: If one is not certain about that, then one has doubt or something else, which is a division.üîΩBy that,

original: des ni / ma skyes pa la'ang gnod pa can //
analyzed: des ni / ma skyes pa la'ang gnod pa can //
translated: one is harmed even with respect to what is not produced.

original: tshol ba'i rmongs pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: tshol ba'i rmongs pa gang yin pa //
translated: That which is the delusion of seeking

original: de ni tha snyad thams cad la //
analyzed: de ni tha snyad thams cad la //
translated: is with respect to all conventions

original: yid gnyis ngo bos zad de 'gro //
analyzed: yid gnyis ngo bos zad de 'gro //
translated: the going of doubt exhausted by nature.

original: zhes zer ba de bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes zer ba de bsal ba yin te /
translated: That is removed.

original: gang gi @21b phyir bye brag tu mthong ba ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin gyi rmongs pa ni de'i rgyu ma yin te thal ches ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi @21b phyir bye brag tu mthong ba ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin gyi rmongs pa ni de'i rgyu ma yin te thal ches ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because seeing a distinction is the cause of doubt, but delusion is not its cause, because that is too broad.

original: sdong dum mam zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bye brag ma mthong ba'i rgyu nyid las byung ba'i the tshom yin no //
analyzed: sdong dum mam zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bye brag ma mthong ba'i rgyu nyid las byung ba'i the tshom yin no //
translated: Also, a stump, etc., is doubt that arises from the cause of not seeing a distinction.

original: rig byed las byung ba'i shes pa ni nges pa can las skyes pa nyid du nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rig byed las byung ba'i shes pa ni nges pa can las skyes pa nyid du nges pa ma yin no //
translated: Knowledge that arises from the Vedas is not ascertained as arising from certainty.

original: 'on te tshig rnams dang / de'i don rnams dang / de dang 'brel pa yang brtag pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on te tshig rnams dang / de'i don rnams dang / de dang 'brel pa yang brtag pa yin te /
translated: Or, the words, their meanings, and their connection are imagined.

original: skyes bus byas pa nyid du mi dran pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa nyid du mi dran pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one does not remember that it was made by a person.

original: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba la the tshom za ba yin na /
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba la the tshom za ba yin na /
translated: If one doubts that the word is the signified of the word cow,

original: de'i brda'i tshig 'phel ba dang / aa las aeer gyur pa dang 'dra bar dran par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i brda'i tshig 'phel ba dang / aa las aeer gyur pa dang 'dra bar dran par byed pa yin no //
translated: one is reminded of it by the word‚Äôs etymology, as in the case of the word ai

original: ba lang zhes bya ba 'di la don gang yin zhes the tshom za ba la lkog shal la sogs pa'i khyad par can gyi gzugs can yin no zhes smras pa la sogs pa dran par byed pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: ba lang zhes bya ba 'di la don gang yin zhes the tshom za ba la lkog shal la sogs pa'i khyad par can gyi gzugs can yin no zhes smras pa la sogs pa dran par byed pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: If one doubts what the word cow means, one is reminded of it by the statement, ‚ÄúIt is the form that has a dewlap, etc.‚Äù

original: gsal ba la sogs pa mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i gzugs can ni brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gsal ba la sogs pa mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i gzugs can ni brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the signified is the form that has a particular nature, such as being manifest, etc.

original: dag nyid kyang brdar byed pa po yin no //
analyzed: dag nyid kyang brdar byed pa po yin no //
translated: The one who makes the sign is the one who makes the convention.

original: de la drang srong ba ni yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la drang srong ba ni yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the ·πõ·π£is are the ones who make the sign,

original: gzhan la yang rgad po kha cig dang bye brag med do //
analyzed: gzhan la yang rgad po kha cig dang bye brag med do //
translated: then there is no difference between them and some old men.

original: rang bzhin las byung ba la ni don gyi 'brel pa yod na du ba bzhin du tshig las kyang mi bslu par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin las byung ba la ni don gyi 'brel pa yod na du ba bzhin du tshig las kyang mi bslu par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the meaning is related to the nature of the words, then like smoke, it would be nondeceptive with respect to the words.

original: ba lang rdzi'i bum pa'i du ba slu ba can yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ba lang rdzi'i bum pa'i du ba slu ba can yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: The smoke of the pot of the cowherd is deceptive.

original: sor mo'i rtse mo la sogs pa'i tshigs kyang de dag tsam gyi sgra las byung ba yang tshad ma ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sor mo'i rtse mo la sogs pa'i tshigs kyang de dag tsam gyi sgra las byung ba yang tshad ma ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, the joints of the fingers and so on, which arise from the mere sound of those words, are not valid cognitions.

original: du ba gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: du ba gzhan bzhin no //
translated: They are like other smoke.

original: du ba gzhan ni don las nges pa yin no //
analyzed: du ba gzhan ni don las nges pa yin no //
translated: Other smoke is ascertained from the meaning.

original: 'dir yang tshig rnams ni tshig gi don rnams la nges pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang tshig rnams ni tshig gi don rnams la nges pa yin te /
translated: Here, the words are ascertained from the meaning of the words.

original: rang nyid nye ba las don nye bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: rang nyid nye ba las don nye bar byed pa yin la /
translated: They themselves, being proximate, make the meaning proximate.

original: de nyid kyang gcig la gcig 'brel pa yod pa yin na dag gi don yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyang gcig la gcig 'brel pa yod pa yin na dag gi don yin no //
translated: And that itself is the meaning of the words when they have a mutual connection.

original: lan du smras pa /
analyzed: lan du smras pa /
translated: In response, it is said:

original: gang gi phyir du ba ni rang gi rgyus 'phangs pa'i rang gi don la nges par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir du ba ni rang gi rgyus 'phangs pa'i rang gi don la nges par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Because smoke is ascertained from its own meaning, which is projected by its own cause,

original: tshig rnams ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: tshig rnams ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: but the words are not like that.

original: skyes bu'i 'dod pas bsdu ba byas pa'i tshigs rnams ni ngag gi don gyi rgyu mtshan yin gyis gcig gis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu'i 'dod pas bsdu ba byas pa'i tshigs rnams ni ngag gi don gyi rgyu mtshan yin gyis gcig gis ni ma yin te /
translated: The words that are put together by the desire of a person are the reason for the meaning of the sentence, not just one of them.

original: bsdus pa yang 'di las 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsdus pa yang 'di las 'di yin te /
translated: And the collection is not from this one,

original: 'di las ni 'di ma yin no zhes pa'i phyir skyes bus byas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di las ni 'di ma yin no zhes pa'i phyir skyes bus byas pa yin no //
translated: but from that one, because it is not from this one. Therefore, it is a human product.

original: tshig gzhan rnams nyid la ni re res so //
analyzed: tshig gzhan rnams nyid la ni re res so //
translated: The other words are from each one.

original: tshig gi don ni don gzhan dang @22a * //
analyzed: tshig gi don ni don gzhan dang @22a * //
translated: The meaning of the words is connected with another meaning.

original: ldan pa yin par smra ba'i phyir bsdus pa ni don rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: ldan pa yin par smra ba'i phyir bsdus pa ni don rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the collection is not a part of the understanding of the meaning.

original: de rnams kyang brtags pa dang don dang 'brel pa can rnams ni skyes bus mngon par gsal bar byas pa 'ba' zhig yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyang brtags pa dang don dang 'brel pa can rnams ni skyes bus mngon par gsal bar byas pa 'ba' zhig yin no //
translated: And those are only made manifest by a person, because they are connected with the imagined meaning.

original: de lta na yang tshig rnams ni du bzhin du rang dbang can ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang tshig rnams ni du bzhin du rang dbang can ma yin te /
translated: In that case, the words are not independent, like smoke,

original: 'dod pa'i gzhan dbang yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i gzhan dbang yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are under the control of desire.

original: mngon par gsal ba ma yin pa'i tshig gam de bsdus pa yang rung ste /
analyzed: mngon par gsal ba ma yin pa'i tshig gam de bsdus pa yang rung ste /
translated: Whether the words are not manifest or are collected,

original: yod pa tsam gyis ni rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin la /
analyzed: yod pa tsam gyis ni rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin la /
translated: It is not a part of the understanding merely by its existence.

original: de'i mngon par gsal ba yang skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i mngon par gsal ba yang skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis yin gyi /
translated: And its manifestation is due to the will of the person.

original: du ba mngon par gsal ba lta bu ni ma yin te /
analyzed: du ba mngon par gsal ba lta bu ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not like the manifestation of smoke,

original: rang gi rgyu'i dbang nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu'i dbang nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is due to the power of its cause itself.

original: bden te du ba ni don gyi dbang nyid kyis de la nges pa can yin gyi /
analyzed: bden te du ba ni don gyi dbang nyid kyis de la nges pa can yin gyi /
translated: True, smoke is restricted to that by the power of the object.

original: 'dod pa'i dbang gis mngon par gsal ba can gyi sgra ni don la nges pa can yin par mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dbang gis mngon par gsal ba can gyi sgra ni don la nges pa can yin par mi rigs te /
translated: But it is not reasonable that a word, whose manifestation is due to the will, be restricted to the object.

original: de'i rang dbang can ma yin pa de la nges pa can yin zhes bya ba ni log par sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang dbang can ma yin pa de la nges pa can yin zhes bya ba ni log par sgrub pa yin no //
translated: It is a false proof to say that it is restricted to that, since it is not independent.üîΩIf you say that it is restricted to that by its very expression, since it is permanent and independent,

original: rtag pa nyid dang rang dbang can yin pa nyid kyis de'i dbang du gyur pa ma yin pa ni de rjod par byed pa nyid kyis kyang de la nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid dang rang dbang can yin pa nyid kyis de'i dbang du gyur pa ma yin pa ni de rjod par byed pa nyid kyis kyang de la nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is restricted to that by its very expression, since it produces the understanding of that.

original: rjod par byed pa nyid ni de rtogs pa skyed par byed pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa nyid ni de rtogs pa skyed par byed pa nyid yin la /
translated: The expression is the producer of the understanding of that.

original: de ltar na de nyid kyang sdod dum mam zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin du ma nges pa'i rgyu mtshan skyed par byed pa nyid sgra las byung ba la the tshom gyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na de nyid kyang sdod dum mam zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin du ma nges pa'i rgyu mtshan skyed par byed pa nyid sgra las byung ba la the tshom gyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because the reason for uncertainty is produced from the word.

original: de ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: That is not a valid cognition,

original: rang dbang can yang yin la nges pa can yang yin pa ni rigs pa chen po can yin no //üîΩrang dbang can ni 'dod pa'i dbang nyid mngon par gsal ba'i don du ma yin nam rang gi ngo bo'i don du ni ma yin no bden te /
analyzed: rang dbang can yang yin la nges pa can yang yin pa ni rigs pa chen po can yin no // rang dbang can ni 'dod pa'i dbang nyid mngon par gsal ba'i don du ma yin nam rang gi ngo bo'i don du ni ma yin no bden te /
translated: because it is a great logical fallacy to be both independent and certain.üîΩIsn‚Äôt it that which is independent just the desire to manifest the object? It is not for the sake of its own nature.

original: mngon par gsal bzhin pa'i ngo bo las gzhan par mi mthong ba'i phyir dang / de yang gzhan nyid yin pas ngo shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i dbang nyid kyis yin no //
analyzed: mngon par gsal bzhin pa'i ngo bo las gzhan par mi mthong ba'i phyir dang / de yang gzhan nyid yin pas ngo shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i dbang nyid kyis yin no //
translated: That is true, but it is for the sake of the desire to manifest, because it is not seen as different from the nature that is being manifested, and because that is different, it is not recognized.

original: ngo shes pa nyid yin na yang 'dod pa'i dbang gis mngon par gsal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i dbang nyid de chog go //
analyzed: ngo shes pa nyid yin na yang 'dod pa'i dbang gis mngon par gsal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i dbang nyid de chog go //
translated: If it is recognized, it is still only the manifestation of desire, so desire is enough.

original: yang rang gi ngo bo la mngon par gsal ba'am mngon par brjod pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang rang gi ngo bo la mngon par gsal ba'am mngon par brjod pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, it does not depend on the manifestation of its own nature or on verbal expression.

original: de'i dbang gis ma yin pa dang / don gzhan du khrid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dbang gis ma yin pa dang / don gzhan du khrid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not due to that, and because it leads to a different object.

original: rjod par byed pa nyid ni @22b rtogs pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa nyid ni @22b rtogs pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan nyid yin gyi /
translated: The mere cause of understanding is the expression itself.

original: tshad ma'i yan lag ma yin par bstan to //
analyzed: tshad ma'i yan lag ma yin par bstan to //
translated: It is taught that it is not a part of valid cognition.

original: des na shes pa tsam las don la nges pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: des na shes pa tsam las don la nges pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, there is no ascertainment of the object from mere cognition,

original: nges par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not cause ascertainment.

original: brjod par bya ba rnams la skyes bu'i dbang byed pas 'jug pa can rnams ni dngos po mthong ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba rnams la skyes bu'i dbang byed pas 'jug pa can rnams ni dngos po mthong ba can ma yin te /
translated: Those who engage in expressions due to the power of a person over objects are not those who see things as they are.

original: ji ltar goms pa'i rnam par rtog pa sad pa'i rgyus 'jug par sems pa yin na /
analyzed: ji ltar goms pa'i rnam par rtog pa sad pa'i rgyus 'jug par sems pa yin na /
translated: They think that engagement is due to the cause of the awakening of conceptual thoughts as they are habituated.

original: rang gi ngo bo la nges pa yin gyi de dag tsam gyis mgu ba ni min te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo la nges pa yin gyi de dag tsam gyis mgu ba ni min te /
translated: But this is not enough to satisfy us,

original: rmi lam la sogs pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rmi lam la sogs pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because such a cognition can also occur in dreams, etc.

original: phrad par bya ba dang 'brel ba can du nges pa yod na de nyid tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba dang 'brel ba can du nges pa yod na de nyid tshad ma yin no //
translated: If there is a cognition that ascertains the object to be attained, then that is a valid cognition.

original: phrad par bya ba nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo la nges par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: phrad par bya ba nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo la nges par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: It ascertains the object to be attained as having the nature of being an object to be attained,

original: phrad par bya ba dang 'brel pa can nyid kyis ni ma yin no bden te /
analyzed: phrad par bya ba dang 'brel pa can nyid kyis ni ma yin no bden te /
translated: but not as being related to the object to be attained.

original: phrad par bya ba ma yin pa yang de'i 'bras bu ni de nyid las rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: phrad par bya ba ma yin pa yang de'i 'bras bu ni de nyid las rtogs pa yin te /
translated: To this we reply: Even if something is not an object to be attained, it can be understood as the effect of that cognition.

original: nag pa'i bu la nag par shes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: nag pa'i bu la nag par shes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, when one knows that a person is the son of Devadatta, one understands that person to be the grandson of Yaj√±adatta.

original: rnam pa mang po mthong pa nas rgyu la 'bras bu nyid du'am /
analyzed: rnam pa mang po mthong pa nas rgyu la 'bras bu nyid du'am /
translated: When one sees many instances of a cause, one superimposes the effect on the cause,

original: 'bras bu nyid la de nyid du sgro 'dogs pa ni 'dra ba las yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid la de nyid du sgro 'dogs pa ni 'dra ba las yin te /
translated: or one superimposes the cause on the effect, due to similarity.

original: mtshe ma dag la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: mtshe ma dag la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, when one sees twins, etc.

original: 'di la yang phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu nyid la de nyid du'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu nyid la de nyid du'o //
translated: Here too, one superimposes the effect of the object to be attained on the object to be attained itself.

original: de lta yin na 'di'i don dang 'dra ba ni tshad ma yin no zhes ci'i phyir gsungs /
analyzed: de lta yin na 'di'i don dang 'dra ba ni tshad ma yin no zhes ci'i phyir gsungs /
translated: If that is so, why did he say, ‚ÄúThat which is like its object is valid cognition‚Äù?

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid kyi ngo bo ni de nyid dang 'dra ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid kyi ngo bo ni de nyid dang 'dra ba yin te /
translated: The nature of the result itself is like that.

original: don gyi dngos nyid ma spangs pa zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: don gyi dngos nyid ma spangs pa zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: It is called ‚Äúnot devoid of the nature of the object itself.‚Äù

original: 'dir de nyid brjod pa las 'di don dang 'dra ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir de nyid brjod pa las 'di don dang 'dra ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is said to be that itself because it has the nature of being like its object.

original: 'di la yang 'dra ba can kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di la yang 'dra ba can kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is only similar to that,

original: bsreg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa rnams ni me dad 'dra ba nyid ma yin la /
analyzed: bsreg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa rnams ni me dad 'dra ba nyid ma yin la /
translated: then burning, cooking, and so on are not similar to fire.

original: de nyid 'bras bu nyid ni yin pa'i phyir phrad par bya ba'i don gyi ngo bo 'bras bu nyid gang gi yin pa'i don de nyid kyi ngo bo yin pa de lta na /
analyzed: de nyid 'bras bu nyid ni yin pa'i phyir phrad par bya ba'i don gyi ngo bo 'bras bu nyid gang gi yin pa'i don de nyid kyi ngo bo yin pa de lta na /
translated: Since it is the result itself, the object that is the nature of the result to be contacted is that itself, the nature of the object.

original: de kho na nyid rtogs pa 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: de kho na nyid rtogs pa 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The result is the realization of thatness.

original: de kho na nyid ni de rtogs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid yin no //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni de rtogs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid yin no //
translated: Thatness is valid cognition because it is the cause for positing the realization of thatness.

original: 'jig rten na yang dam bcas pa'i don dang phrad par byed pa ni mi slu par byed pa po ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'jig rten na yang dam bcas pa'i don dang phrad par byed pa ni mi slu par byed pa po ma yin nam /
translated: In the world, too, when one encounters the object of a promise, is it not the nondeceptive one who encounters it?

original: dam bcas pa tsam ni ma yin zhing gzhan dang phrad par byed pa po yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dam bcas pa tsam ni ma yin zhing gzhan dang phrad par byed pa po yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not mere promise, nor is it the one who encounters another.

original: de bzhin du shes pa yang bde ba la sogs pa mi bslu ba can yin gyi /üîΩrtogs pa tsam ma rtogs nas gzhan @23a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du shes pa yang bde ba la sogs pa mi bslu ba can yin gyi / rtogs pa tsam ma rtogs nas gzhan @23a * //
translated: In the same way, consciousness is nondeceptive with respect to pleasure, etc.

original: dang phrad par byed pa po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dang phrad par byed pa po ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not mere understanding, nor is it the one who encounters another.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it, then?

original: rtogs nas phrad par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rtogs nas phrad par byed pa yin te /
translated: It is the one who encounters after understanding.

original: rtogs pa'i skad cig ma nyid dang phrad par bya ba rtogs pa yin par gcig pa nyid du zhen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i skad cig ma nyid dang phrad par bya ba rtogs pa yin par gcig pa nyid du zhen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the very moment of understanding that encounters what is understood, it is conceived to be the same.

original: rtogs pa yod na phrad pa yod pa'i phyir rtogs pa nyid tshad ma yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa yod na phrad pa yod pa'i phyir rtogs pa nyid tshad ma yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
translated: Since when there is understanding there is encountering, understanding itself is valid knowledge, not another.

original: gzhan las ma yin zhes bya de lta ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan las ma yin zhes bya de lta ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not another.

original: phrad par bya ba don du gnyer ba de dang 'brel pa can kho na'i ngo bo tshad ma yin gyi rtogs pa tsam ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba don du gnyer ba de dang 'brel pa can kho na'i ngo bo tshad ma yin gyi rtogs pa tsam ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: The nature of a valid cognition is the cognition that is related to the object that is sought to be contacted. Mere knowledge is not a valid cognition.

original: de yang rtogs pa ma yin pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa ni de la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang rtogs pa ma yin pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa ni de la ltos pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, since it is not knowledge, it is not a component of engagement. Knowledge depends on it.

original: phrad par bya ba dang 'brel pa can gyi shes pa'i ngo bo yang rjes su dpag pa'i ngo bo bzhin du rang nyid kyis shes pa yin no //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba dang 'brel pa can gyi shes pa'i ngo bo yang rjes su dpag pa'i ngo bo bzhin du rang nyid kyis shes pa yin no //
translated: The nature of the cognition that is related to the object that is sought to be contacted is known by itself, just as the nature of inference is known by itself.

original: de nyid shes pa yin gyi de dang 'brel pa can ni ma yin no ma yin te nag pa'i bu la nag pa'i shes pa bzhin du de nyid shes pa'i yul ni 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: de nyid shes pa yin gyi de dang 'brel pa can ni ma yin no ma yin te nag pa'i bu la nag pa'i shes pa bzhin du de nyid shes pa'i yul ni 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro//
translated: It is not the case that it is knowledge of that, but not related to it, because, like the cognition of a black man, the object of knowledge of that is related to it.

original: des na de nyid ni tshad ma yin la de shes pa ni 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: des na de nyid ni tshad ma yin la de shes pa ni 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is a valid cognition, and the knowledge of that is its effect.

original: de yang don dang 'dra ba ni tshad ma yin la don rtogs pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no zhes kyang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang don dang 'dra ba ni tshad ma yin la don rtogs pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no zhes kyang gsungs pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is said that that which is similar to the object is a valid cognition, and the knowledge of the object is the effect of the valid cognition.

original: de'i phyir shes pa'i ngo bo la sgro btags pas 'jug pa yin gyi phyi rol la 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa'i ngo bo la sgro btags pas 'jug pa yin gyi phyi rol la 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is applied by superimposing the nature of cognition, and it is not applied to external objects.

original: phyi rol la yang shes pa'i ngo bor sgro btags pa yin na /
analyzed: phyi rol la yang shes pa'i ngo bor sgro btags pa yin na /
translated: If external objects are also superimposed as the nature of cognition,

original: mi 'jug pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: mi 'jug pa kho na yin te /
translated: then it would not be applied at all,

original: don du gnyer ba ni su yang ma yin no //
analyzed: don du gnyer ba ni su yang ma yin no //
translated: because no one would seek the object.

original: shes pa'i ngo bo dang phyi rol dag ni so so ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa'i ngo bo dang phyi rol dag ni so so ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is applied because the nature of cognition and external objects are not distinct,

original: so so ba ma yin na phyi'i dngos po don du gnyer ba rnams ches shin tu yang mi 'jug pa'i phyir de gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: so so ba ma yin na phyi'i dngos po don du gnyer ba rnams ches shin tu yang mi 'jug pa'i phyir de gsal ba yin no //
translated: then it is clear that those who seek external things would not apply it at all, because they are not distinct.

original: snang ba dang rnam par rtog pa dag gcig tu byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa de kho na nyid du 'dod pa de las byung ba nyid kyi yul can rnams de bzhin du bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: snang ba dang rnam par rtog pa dag gcig tu byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa de kho na nyid du 'dod pa de las byung ba nyid kyi yul can rnams de bzhin du bshad par bya'o //
translated: The statement beginning with Having made appearances and conceptual thoughts one... should be explained in the same way, as arising from that which is asserted as reality.

original: rtogs pa tsam yang tshad ma nyid yin na ni sgra las byung ba la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa tsam yang tshad ma nyid yin na ni sgra las byung ba la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If mere understanding were valid cognition, then it would also be so for what arises from words.

original: sgra las byung ba yang phyi rol shes par byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba yang phyi rol shes par byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: And is not the sound that arises from it also not a means of understanding external objects?

original: shes bya dang shes byed las gzhan pa la ni 'brel pa med do //
analyzed: shes bya dang shes byed las gzhan pa la ni 'brel pa med do //
translated: There is no connection with anything other than the object of understanding and the means of understanding.

original: de lta ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: shes bya dang shes byed kyi dngos po nyid de dang 'brel pa yin gyi de'i shes pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shes bya dang shes byed kyi dngos po nyid de dang 'brel pa yin gyi de'i shes pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: The object of understanding and the means of understanding are themselves connected, not just the understanding of that.

original: dngos po yang shes pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: dngos po yang shes pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: And is not the object also just understanding?

original: nye bar dmigs @23b pa ni yod pa zhes brjod do zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar dmigs @23b pa ni yod pa zhes brjod do zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is said that what is apprehended is said to exist.

original: phrad par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo'i nyams su myong ba ni dmigs pa yin gyi shes pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo'i nyams su myong ba ni dmigs pa yin gyi shes pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: The experience of the nature of the object to be apprehended is the object, not just the understanding.

original: rig byed la ni phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu'i rig pa yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rig byed la ni phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu'i rig pa yod pa ma yin la /
translated: In the Vedas, there is no knowledge of the result to be obtained.

original: yod na yang de don du gnyer ba rnams 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod na yang de don du gnyer ba rnams 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if there were, those who seek it would not engage in it.

original: rig par byed pa ni yod la /
analyzed: rig par byed pa ni yod la /
translated: There is the means of knowing,

original: rig par bya ba ni med pa des na rig par bya ba don du gnyer ba rnams 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: rig par bya ba ni med pa des na rig par bya ba don du gnyer ba rnams 'jug pa yin no //
translated: but not the object of knowing. Therefore, those who seek the object of knowing would not engage in it.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: rig par bya ba dang 'brel pa mi shes na 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rig par bya ba dang 'brel pa mi shes na 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, if one does not know the connection with the object of knowledge, there is no engagement.

original: 'dis ni nges par sbyor ba tsam las 'jug pa gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni nges par sbyor ba tsam las 'jug pa gsal ba yin no //
translated: This clarifies that engagement is merely the connection.

original: nges par sbyor ba yang de nyid kyi tshe yod pa'i phyir 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nges par sbyor ba yang de nyid kyi tshe yod pa'i phyir 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: And because the connection exists at that time, there is no engagement.

original: nges par sbyor ba ni bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi de'i tshe ni med pa yin no //
analyzed: nges par sbyor ba ni bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi de'i tshe ni med pa yin no //
translated: The connection is what is to be established, but at that time it does not exist.

original: de lta na shes pa dang 'brel pa mi shes pa'i phyir de'i shes pa las 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na shes pa dang 'brel pa mi shes pa'i phyir de'i shes pa las 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, because one does not know the connection with consciousness, engagement does not arise from the consciousness of that.

original: des na phrad par bya ba la nges pa can nyid kyi shes pa ni de kho na yid la nges pa can gyi tshad ma yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na phrad par bya ba la nges pa can nyid kyi shes pa ni de kho na yid la nges pa can gyi tshad ma yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the consciousness that is certain with regard to contact is the valid cognition that is certain only with regard to that, not from anything else.

original: dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba nyid du thal bar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba nyid du thal bar yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor does it follow that it is the object of apprehension of the sense faculties,

original: rang gi ngo bo la de kho na nyid du sgro 'dogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo la de kho na nyid du sgro 'dogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not the object of superimposition in reality with regard to its own nature.

original: 'bras bu tsam nyid la rgyu'i thams cad nyid du sgro gdags par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu tsam nyid la rgyu'i thams cad nyid du sgro gdags par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: The mere effect should not be reified as the totality of the cause.

original: 'dra ba nyid ni gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid ni gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: Similarity is the basis for the designation.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de med pa yin yang gzugs dang reg pa dag gis reg pa'i 'bras bu gzugs yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de med pa yin yang gzugs dang reg pa dag gis reg pa'i 'bras bu gzugs yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Even though it does not exist, form is the effect of contact because of the contact of form and touch.

original: rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo la de kho na nyid du sgro btags pa'i yul yin te /
analyzed: rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo la de kho na nyid du sgro btags pa'i yul yin te /
translated: The object of reification is the essence of the cause itself.

original: de yang rgyu ma yin pa yul ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de yang rgyu ma yin pa yul ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The object of the noncause is taught.

original: rigs pa shes pas shes pa'i rnam pa 'jog nus pa'i rgyu nyid la gzung bar shes kyang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pa shes pas shes pa'i rnam pa 'jog nus pa'i rgyu nyid la gzung bar shes kyang gsungs pa'o //
translated: The cause itself is grasped as the cause of the ability to posit the aspect of consciousness by the knowledge of reality.

original: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo la rang gi rnam pa ste /
analyzed: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo la rang gi rnam pa ste /
translated: The aspect of consciousness is posited as the essence of consciousness.

original: bdag nyid kyi ngo bor 'jog pa ste sgro 'dogs par ni rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi ngo bor 'jog pa ste sgro 'dogs par ni rigs pa yin te /
translated: It is reasonable to reify it as the essence of itself.üîΩThe object of reification is the cause itself, the object of contact, which is the effect.

original: phrad par bya ba ste rgyu la 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid du sgro btags pa'i yul zhes bstan to zhes bya ba'i don yin gyi /
analyzed: phrad par bya ba ste rgyu la 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid du sgro btags pa'i yul zhes bstan to zhes bya ba'i don yin gyi /
translated: This is the meaning of the explanation.

original: shes pa la rang gi rnam pa ste rang dang 'dra bar 'dogs par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa la rang gi rnam pa ste rang dang 'dra bar 'dogs par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it does not designate the aspect of consciousness as being like itself.

original: 'bras bu nyid la de kho na nyid du sgro 'dogs pa yang kha cig la mthong ba las thams cad la ni ma yin par bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid la de kho na nyid du sgro 'dogs pa yang kha cig la mthong ba las thams cad la ni ma yin par bshad zin to //
translated: Also, it has been explained that the superimposition of reality on the effect is seen in some, but not in all.

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur gyi bdag nyid kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i bde ba @24a * //
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur gyi bdag nyid kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i bde ba @24a * //
translated: It is taught in this way: ‚ÄúThe pleasure that is included in one‚Äôs own continuum is known by oneself.‚Äù

original: ji ltar rigs pa de bzhin du sngon po yang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs pa de bzhin du sngon po yang ngo //
translated: Blue is known in the same way.

original: bde ba ni gzhan rig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bde ba ni gzhan rig pa ma yin te /
translated: But pleasure is not known by another,

original: gzhan rigs pas ni rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan rigs pas ni rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not known by another.

original: sngon po la ni bde ba nyid yod pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon po la ni bde ba nyid yod pa yin no //
translated: But pleasure exists in blue.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it does not.

original: de ni sngon po bzhin du rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni sngon po bzhin du rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is to be known like blue.

original: de rig pa la yang sngon por sgro 'dogs pa ma yin pas bdag nyid rig pa ma yin pa nyid du mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rig pa la yang sngon por sgro 'dogs pa ma yin pas bdag nyid rig pa ma yin pa nyid du mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because it is not known that the knowledge of that is not the superimposition of blue on the knowledge of that, it is not known that it is not known by itself.

original: gnyi ga la yang tshogs pa yod na sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du cig car 'byung ba'i phyir phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga la yang tshogs pa yod na sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du cig car 'byung ba'i phyir phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro //
translated: If both were to exist in the collection, then like blue, etc., it would arise simultaneously, and so it would not be erroneous.

original: zhen pa yang goms pa la ltos pa yin gyi bde ba bzhin du sngon po ni dus der yul la 'jug pa ma yin zhing phrad par bya ba yang ngo //
analyzed: zhen pa yang goms pa la ltos pa yin gyi bde ba bzhin du sngon po ni dus der yul la 'jug pa ma yin zhing phrad par bya ba yang ngo //
translated: Moreover, attachment depends on habituation, but blue, like pleasure, does not engage its object at that time, nor is it to be contacted.

original: rtogs pa las ni phrad par bya ba dang der 'brel pa ni gzhan nyid las shes par bya ba yin gyi de tsam las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa las ni phrad par bya ba dang der 'brel pa ni gzhan nyid las shes par bya ba yin gyi de tsam las ni ma yin te /
translated: From the understanding, the object to be contacted and the connection with it are to be known from something other than that,

original: the tshom yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is doubt about that.

original: de nyid kyis na nges pa yang yin no zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na nges pa yang yin no zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that it is ascertained by that itself, no,

original: rang gi ngo bo la nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo la nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because it is ascertained in its own nature.

original: / dbang po dang yul la sogs pa rnams kyi rgyu mtshan las skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'brel pa gang yin pa las yul gyi rjes su byed pa yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: / dbang po dang yul la sogs pa rnams kyi rgyu mtshan las skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'brel pa gang yin pa las yul gyi rjes su byed pa yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin te /
translated: Consciousness that arises from the causal signs of the sense faculties, objects, etc., conforms to its object from whatever connection, but not from another,üîΩbecause it is ascertained in its own nature.

original: de nyid las de 'dzin pa yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid las de 'dzin pa yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the cognition itself that apprehends itself, not something else.

original: de ltar na gcig las gcig tu brgyud pas dub pa yongs su 'dor bar 'gyur ba yin zhes gang smras pa de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na gcig las gcig tu brgyud pas dub pa yongs su 'dor bar 'gyur ba yin zhes gang smras pa de ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, it is not the case that the continuum of consciousness is exhausted by the passing on of fatigue from one to another.

original: 'bras bu ni rang gi rgyud las byung bas de'i rnam pa'am gzhan du yang 'byung ba yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni rang gi rgyud las byung bas de'i rnam pa'am gzhan du yang 'byung ba yin la /
translated: The effect arises from its own continuum, and so it arises in the form of that or something else.

original: shes pa ni rang nyid rig pa yin gyi gzhan las kyang ni ma yin pa'i phyir de dang 'dra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa ni rang nyid rig pa yin gyi gzhan las kyang ni ma yin pa'i phyir de dang 'dra ba ma yin no //
translated: But consciousness is not like that, for it is self-aware, not something else.

original: de dang 'dra ba la yang rang nyid rig pa yang bdag nyid sngon por rig pa rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba la yang rang nyid rig pa yang bdag nyid sngon por rig pa rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no //
translated: And in the case of something similar, it is not difficult for self-awareness to find itself, as in the case of the cognition of blue.

original: de ltar yang de tsam thams cad la yang yod pas thob zin pa'i phyir yang 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang de tsam thams cad la yang yod pas thob zin pa'i phyir yang 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: And since that is the case, since all of that is already established, it is not an object of engagement.

original: de'i thabs nyid kyis ni rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams ltos pa yin par gzhan nyid las shes par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i thabs nyid kyis ni rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams ltos pa yin par gzhan nyid las shes par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: But those who are wise know that it is dependent on the method itself, and that it is to be known from something else.

original: rang nyid las ni ma yin pa'i phyir gzhan las the tshom ldog pa tsam ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid las ni ma yin pa'i phyir gzhan las the tshom ldog pa tsam ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not merely the reversal of doubt about another that is not from itself.

original: rnam pa la sngon po'o zhes rjes su dpog pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa la sngon po'o zhes rjes su dpog pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is an inference of the form ‚Äúblue,‚Äù

original: phrad par bya ba las gzhan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phrad par bya ba las gzhan pa ma yin te /
translated: it is not from that which is to be contacted,

original: sngon por ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon por ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because blue is not observed.

original: ldog pa las 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la @24b sogs pa gsungs pa ni gal te mtshungs pa de ma thag rkyen las nges pa mi smra ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ldog pa las 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la @24b sogs pa gsungs pa ni gal te mtshungs pa de ma thag rkyen las nges pa mi smra ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is established from the reversal, etc., it is said: ‚ÄúIf you do not speak of ascertainment from the similar immediately preceding condition,‚Äù

original: de lta na yang yul mtshungs pa'i de ma thag pa yul du 'gyur ro zhes kyang ngo //
analyzed: de lta na yang yul mtshungs pa'i de ma thag pa yul du 'gyur ro zhes kyang ngo //
translated: then in that case, the similar immediately preceding object would be the object.

original: phrad par bya ba nyid dang rigs mthun pa la gzhan gyis bar du mchod pa 'di'i de ma thag pa ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i shes pa zhes kyang bstan to //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba nyid dang rigs mthun pa la gzhan gyis bar du mchod pa 'di'i de ma thag pa ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i shes pa zhes kyang bstan to //
translated: The immediately preceding of this, which is not obstructed by another of the same type as that to be contacted, is also taught as the similar immediately preceding consciousness.

original: de lta yin na rang gi ngo bo bzhin du thams cad la yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta yin na rang gi ngo bo bzhin du thams cad la yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If that is so, then like its own nature, it would be for all.

original: tshad ma ma yin pa mi srid par 'gyur ro ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa mi srid par 'gyur ro ma yin te /
translated: It is impossible that it is not a valid cognition.

original: 'das pa'i de ma thag pa ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: 'das pa'i de ma thag pa ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: The immediately preceding past [moment of consciousness] is not a valid cognition.

original: gzhan las bzlog pa zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan las bzlog pa zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: The phrase the opposite of the other indicates a division of action.

original: rgyu ma yin pa yul ma yin zhes bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: rgyu ma yin pa yul ma yin zhes bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't it that what is not a cause is not an object?

original: bde ba la sogs pa rang gis rig pa ji ltar yul nyid yin te rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa rang gis rig pa ji ltar yul nyid yin te rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: How can pleasure, etc., which are self-aware, be objects, since they are not causes?

original: rang nyid grub pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni phrad par bya ba dang tha dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang nyid grub pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni phrad par bya ba dang tha dad pa'i phyir /
translated: One's own established nature is not an object, because it is not different from that which is to be contacted.

original: ji ltar yul yin zhes ltos pa dang bcas pa la rgyu nyid la de kho na nyid du sgro btags pa'i phyir zhes bstan to //
analyzed: ji ltar yul yin zhes ltos pa dang bcas pa la rgyu nyid la de kho na nyid du sgro btags pa'i phyir zhes bstan to //
translated: How can it be an object? This shows that the cause itself is imputed to be reality, since it is dependent.

original: rang nyid rig pa las de'i bdag nyid yin pa 'dis tshad ma ma yin par gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid rig pa las de'i bdag nyid yin pa 'dis tshad ma ma yin par gsal ba yin no //
translated: By this, that it is of the same nature as self-awareness, it is clear that it is not a valid cognition.

original: bar ma chad par smras pas chog go //
analyzed: bar ma chad par smras pas chog go //
translated: Enough of this interruption!

original: phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu nyid rang gi ngo bo yin pa ni de med na med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: phrad par bya ba'i 'bras bu nyid rang gi ngo bo yin pa ni de med na med pa'i phyir te /
translated: The effect of contact is the very nature of the object, because it does not exist without that.

original: du ba ni me'i 'bras bu nyid yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: du ba ni me'i 'bras bu nyid yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, smoke is the effect of fire.

original: sngar gang mthong ba nyid yod pa las phyis mthong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni de'i 'bras bu yin te /
analyzed: sngar gang mthong ba nyid yod pa las phyis mthong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni de'i 'bras bu yin te /
translated: That which is seen later, after it exists, is the effect of that which was seen earlier.

original: des drangs pa'i phyir me'i du ba lta bu ma yin nam /
analyzed: des drangs pa'i phyir me'i du ba lta bu ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that it is drawn by that, like smoke by fire?

original: du ba mthong ba dag ldan pa tsam las ji ltar me dmigs par 'gyur /
analyzed: du ba mthong ba dag ldan pa tsam las ji ltar me dmigs par 'gyur /
translated: How can fire be apprehended from the mere presence of smoke?

original: de la 'das pa'i dus kyi me rjes su dpog par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la 'das pa'i dus kyi me rjes su dpog par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that fire in the past is inferred.

original: slu ba yin pas tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: slu ba yin pas tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is deceptive, it is not a valid means of knowledge.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba las mi slu ba yin gyi 'das pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba las mi slu ba yin gyi 'das pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not deceptive with regard to what will occur, but not with regard to what has passed.

original: de nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: That very thing will occur.

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it is contradictory.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la 'byung bar 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la 'byung bar 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: What will occur does not exist in what will occur.

original: de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yang de la mi bslu ba can ma yin te //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yang de la mi bslu ba can ma yin te //
translated: Nor is it non-deceptive with regard to what is not its effect.

original: thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is too broad.

original: de dag gcig pa nyid du zhen pa las yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gcig pa nyid du zhen pa las yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is because of the adherence to their identity,

original: de lta byung bar gyur pa la yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du zhen pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de lta byung bar gyur pa la yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du zhen pa kho na yin no //
translated: then even in the case of what has arisen, there is the adherence to the arising of what has arisen.

original: rgyu la nye bar sbyor ba ma yin pa can ni mthar thug gi bar du yang nye bar sbyor ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu la nye bar sbyor ba ma yin pa can ni mthar thug gi bar du yang nye bar sbyor ba can ma yin te /
translated: That which is not applied to the cause is not applied even up to the end,

original: @25a * // skad cig kyang rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'jug pa la nye bar sbyor ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @25a * // skad cig kyang rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'jug pa la nye bar sbyor ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not applied to the uninterrupted engagement in the stream of moments.

original: phrad par bya ba yang rang gi ngo bo yod na de mi zad pa yin te /
analyzed: phrad par bya ba yang rang gi ngo bo yod na de mi zad pa yin te /
translated: And that which is to be contacted, if it exists by its own nature, is not exhausted.

original: de yang rgyu la rgyu'i chos rjes su 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang rgyu la rgyu'i chos rjes su 'jug pa yin te /
translated: And that is the engagement of the attribute of the cause in the cause.

original: thams cad rgyu yin par thal bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad rgyu yin par thal bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it follows that everything is a cause,

original: de lta bu ni 'das pa la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de lta bu ni 'das pa la yang mtshungs so //
translated: that is the same for the past.

original: de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te /
translated: It is not so.

original: 'di yod na 'di 'byung zhes bya bar bye brag tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'di yod na 'di 'byung zhes bya bar bye brag tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is specifically understood that when this exists, that arises.

original: de la yang mtshungs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de la yang mtshungs pa nyid yin te /
translated: But that is the same for us.

original: rgyu tshogs pa yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang /
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang /
translated: The statement ‚Äúby the assembly of causes‚Äù and so on,

original: de ni rang bzhin yin par brjod //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin yin par brjod //
translated: is said to be the nature of things.

original: ces bya ba ste 'byung bar byed pas 'byung ba ste rgyu'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ste 'byung bar byed pas 'byung ba ste rgyu'o //
translated: Since it causes arising, it is arising, that is, the cause.

original: rang gi 'byung byed ni rang gi rgyu zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi 'byung byed ni rang gi rgyu zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The cause of itself is the cause of itself.

original: tshogs pa nyid ni rung ba nyid du rjes su dpag pa yin par gsungs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: tshogs pa nyid ni rung ba nyid du rjes su dpag pa yin par gsungs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it said that the assembly itself is inferred to be the proper cause?

original: bden te / gang la gags byed pa med pa'i nges pa med na'o //
analyzed: bden te / gang la gags byed pa med pa'i nges pa med na'o //
translated: That is true, but only if there is no certainty that there is no obstruction.

original: de'i dgos pa ni de ltar 'das dus gcig rnams kyi ste ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig las so //
analyzed: de'i dgos pa ni de ltar 'das dus gcig rnams kyi ste ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig las so //
translated: The purpose of that is to show that it is so for past things, but not for future things, as the text says.

original: de med par nges pa yin na ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang byung ba las rgyu nyid shes pa yin te /
analyzed: de med par nges pa yin na ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang byung ba las rgyu nyid shes pa yin te /
translated: If there is certainty that it does not exist, then the effect in the future and the cause in the present are known.

original: du ba las me lta bu'o //
analyzed: du ba las me lta bu'o //
translated: It is like fire from smoke.

original: des na yang /
analyzed: des na yang /
translated: Therefore,

original: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la sogs pa mthong ba las /üîΩ'jig rten pha rol du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sems la sogs pa 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la sogs pa mthong ba las / 'jig rten pha rol du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sems la sogs pa 'grub pa yin no //
translated: The mind that arises in another world is seen to be the cause of the mind that is accompanied by defilement, etc.

original: 'di las 'jig rten gzhan dpog pa'ang zhes gang 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di las 'jig rten gzhan dpog pa'ang zhes gang 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe path of insight, etc., is seen to be the cause of the absence of obstacles, because it is not absent at the time of death, even though it is accomplished through the great effort of listening, reflecting, etc.

original: thos pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa shin tu 'bad pa chen pos bsgrub par bya ba mthong ba'i lam la sogs par 'chi ba'i dus na med pa'i phyir gags byed pa med par nges pa yin no //üîΩnyid mtshams sbyor nus ldan mthong gang //üîΩde phyir gyur na phyis gang med //üîΩgang gis mtshams sbyor ldan med yin //üîΩzhes gang 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: thos pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa shin tu 'bad pa chen pos bsgrub par bya ba mthong ba'i lam la sogs par 'chi ba'i dus na med pa'i phyir gags byed pa med par nges pa yin no // nyid mtshams sbyor nus ldan mthong gang // de phyir gyur na phyis gang med // gang gis mtshams sbyor ldan med yin // zhes gang 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The path of insight, etc., is seen to be the cause of the absence of obstacles, because it is not absent at the time of death, even though it is accomplished through the great effort of listening, reflecting, etc.

original: 'di la yang /üîΩdes na sgra las rgyu nyid du //üîΩdus gsum du yang shes bya min //
analyzed: 'di la yang / des na sgra las rgyu nyid du // dus gsum du yang shes bya min //
translated: The other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred from this.

original: zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: The other world is inferred from this.üîΩThe other world is inferred

original: rung ba nyid du rjes su dpag pa la de'i rgyu nyid kyis nges pa med na gzhan gyi rgyu nyid kyis nges pa yod kyang dgos pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rung ba nyid du rjes su dpag pa la de'i rgyu nyid kyis nges pa med na gzhan gyi rgyu nyid kyis nges pa yod kyang dgos pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: If there is no certainty about the cause of that by inference of suitability, then even if there is certainty about the cause of another, it is not necessary.

original: du ba ni me mthong ba na grub pa ma yin nam /üîΩrang nyid yod na yod pa'i rang bzhin can gyi me la nye bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: du ba ni me mthong ba na grub pa ma yin nam / rang nyid yod na yod pa'i rang bzhin can gyi me la nye bar byed pa yin la /
translated: Isn‚Äôt smoke established when fire is seen?üîΩWhen it exists by itself, it is the nature of approaching fire.

original: rang gi ngo bo la yang phrad par bya ba grub pa yin @25b kyi ;
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo la yang phrad par bya ba grub pa yin @25b kyi ;
translated: And it is established as contacting its own nature.

original: de la rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not its own nature.

original: ji ltar rang gi ngo bo yin pa der 'brel par nges pa yin /
analyzed: ji ltar rang gi ngo bo yin pa der 'brel par nges pa yin /
translated: How is it certain that it is related to that as its own nature?

original: bden te / phrad par bya ba bzhin du de yang phrad par bya ba la ma 'khrul pa can nyid du gang gis ma shes pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bden te / phrad par bya ba bzhin du de yang phrad par bya ba la ma 'khrul pa can nyid du gang gis ma shes pas shes par bya'o //
translated: It is true, but like that which is to be contacted, it is also non-erroneous in relation to that which is to be contacted. By what is it not known? It should be known.

original: shes pa yin kyang rang gi ngo bo la phrad par bya bar zhen pa las /
analyzed: shes pa yin kyang rang gi ngo bo la phrad par bya bar zhen pa las /
translated: Even though it is known, from the conception of contacting its own nature,

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid de kho na nyid du zhen pa'i rgyu mtshan du bstan te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid de kho na nyid du zhen pa'i rgyu mtshan du bstan te /
translated: the result of that is taught as the reason for the conception of reality.

original: dung la ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa ni dbyibs la sogs pa'i cha la tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: dung la ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa ni dbyibs la sogs pa'i cha la tshad ma yin no //
translated: The cognition of yellow in a conch is valid with regard to the aspect of shape, etc.

original: kha dog ser pos don byed pa med na de'i sgo nas dbyibs kyis don byed pa med pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: kha dog ser pos don byed pa med na de'i sgo nas dbyibs kyis don byed pa med pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: If the yellow color does not perform a function, then a fortiori, the shape does not perform a function.

original: de'i tshe ser po med pa ni ma yin te snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe ser po med pa ni ma yin te snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: At that time, the yellow color is not absent, because it appears.

original: gzhan du na sngon po yang med pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du na sngon po yang med pa kho na yin no //
translated: Otherwise, the blue color also would be completely absent.

original: ci ste sngon po gcig pu phrad par bya bar 'dod pa yin na 'di la yang dbyibs gcig pu 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: ci ste sngon po gcig pu phrad par bya bar 'dod pa yin na 'di la yang dbyibs gcig pu 'dod pa yin te /
