analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang dad pa tsam @31a * // gyi rtsa ba can yin gyi /
translated: and so on, are rooted in mere faith.

original: 'dir yang dang yang bzlas par 'os pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang dang yang bzlas par 'os pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, it is not appropriate to repeat them again and again,

original: gnas skabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas skabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not the right occasion.

original: 'di ltar yang shes pa gsum pa la gnod pa can du dogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang shes pa gsum pa la gnod pa can du dogs pa yin gyi /
translated: Thus, the third cognition is suspected of being invalid.

original: re zhig rang nyid ma skyes pa'i 'bras bu la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig rang nyid ma skyes pa'i 'bras bu la ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the case that the effect is not produced at first,

original: dang po ma skyes pa ni dang po shes pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po ma skyes pa ni dang po shes pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the first cognition also exists at first, when it is not yet produced.

original: 'dir ni phyis skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni phyis skyes pa yin no //
translated: Here, it is produced later.

original: de la yang phyis skye par mi 'gyur pa ji ltar yin /
analyzed: de la yang phyis skye par mi 'gyur pa ji ltar yin /
translated: And how is it that it is not produced later?

original: 'o na ni bye brag mthong ba las yin no //
analyzed: 'o na ni bye brag mthong ba las yin no //
translated: Then it is due to seeing a particular.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no particular.

original: de dag tsam gyi the tshom dang bral ba nyid ni dang por bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang / don la mi bslu bar yang khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag tsam gyi the tshom dang bral ba nyid ni dang por bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang / don la mi bslu bar yang khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the mere absence of doubt about that is to be established first, and because one does not accept that it is nondeceptive with regard to the object.

original: the tshom ma skyes pa zhes bya ba 'di yang rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i yul la mi srid pa'i phyir dang / bye brag ma mthong na dgag par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir the tshom skyes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: the tshom ma skyes pa zhes bya ba 'di yang rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i yul la mi srid pa'i phyir dang / bye brag ma mthong na dgag par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir the tshom skyes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúwhen doubt has not arisen‚Äù means that when one has knowledge, it is impossible for there to be an object of doubt, and when one does not see a distinction, there is nothing to be doubted.

original: rang gi ngo bo yang gzhan la mi ltos par nyams su myong ba la cis the tshom med pa yin /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo yang gzhan la mi ltos par nyams su myong ba la cis the tshom med pa yin /
translated: How can there be no doubt about the experience of something that does not depend on anything else?

original: de nyid kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of that very thing.

original: phyi rol la yang gzhan la ltos pas nyams su myong ba yang de nyid kyi ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol la yang gzhan la ltos pas nyams su myong ba yang de nyid kyi ngo bo yin te /
translated: Even in the case of external objects, the experience that depends on something else is the nature of that very thing.

original: phyi rol gyi shes pas go bar bya ba nyid las gzhan pa'i ngo bo yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi shes pas go bar bya ba nyid las gzhan pa'i ngo bo yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no nature of an external object that is other than what is understood by consciousness.

original: yin du chug kyang de dag tsam gyis phyi rol nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: yin du chug kyang de dag tsam gyis phyi rol nyid yin gyi /
translated: Even if we grant that there is an external object, it is external just because of that,

original: de dag tsam gyis tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag tsam gyis tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
translated: but it is not a means of valid knowledge just because of that.

original: de dag tsam ni tshad ma yin pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag tsam ni tshad ma yin pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that alone can exist even when there is no means of valid knowledge.

original: phyi rol tsam gyi don 'dis ni rtsa ba brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol tsam gyi don 'dis ni rtsa ba brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is the root of the matter.

original: phyi rol gyi don du smra ba la tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye ba mi srid pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i gzhi yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don du smra ba la tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye ba mi srid pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i gzhi yin no //
translated: The basis of the dispute is that for the proponents of external objects, it is impossible to distinguish valid and nonvalid cognitions.

original: rang gi ngo bo dang phrad par bya ba dag gi rang nyid rig pa'i nges pa dag gi 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa las rnyed par sla ba yin par yang bstan zin to //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo dang phrad par bya ba dag gi rang nyid rig pa'i nges pa dag gi 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa las rnyed par sla ba yin par yang bstan zin to //
translated: We have already shown that it is easy to find a valid cognition that is nonerroneous with respect to itself and that is in contact with its object.üîΩThe cognition of yellow in a conch and so on is not valid with respect to all of itself because it is not nondeceptive with respect to what appears.

original: dung la ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa ni ji ltar snang ba la mi bslu ba ma yin pa'i phyir rang nyid thams cad kyis tshad ma nyid ma yin pa kho na'o zhes bya ba de nyid bstan pa ni dung la ser po zhes bya ba laüîΩsogs pa ste /
analyzed: dung la ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa ni ji ltar snang ba la mi bslu ba ma yin pa'i phyir rang nyid thams cad kyis tshad ma nyid ma yin pa kho na'o zhes bya ba de nyid bstan pa ni dung la ser po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: This is what is being shown by the phrase ‚Äúthe cognition of yellow in a conch and so on.‚Äù

original: gang yang tha snyad la 'jug pa po gang zhig ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa las /
analyzed: gang yang tha snyad la 'jug pa po gang zhig ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa las /
translated: The opponent may say, ‚ÄúThe person who engages in conventional activity, on the basis of the cognition of yellow and so on,

original: lan cig min par mthong ba 'khrul pa can 'di snyam du spyod de /
analyzed: lan cig min par mthong ba 'khrul pa can 'di snyam du spyod de /
translated: This is the error of those who see this more than once.

original: gang du @31b 'di lta bur snang ba der dbyibs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i byed pa dang phrad par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gang du @31b 'di lta bur snang ba der dbyibs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i byed pa dang phrad par byed pa yin te /
translated: In the place where it appears in this way, the shape is the instrument that accomplishes the action of contact.

original: de kho na bzhin du sngar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du sngar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen in exactly the same way as before.

original: de bzhin du rab tu bsgrub pa yang rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid las 'das pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rab tu bsgrub pa yang rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid las 'das pa ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, the proof also does not go beyond being an object of inference.

original: de yang rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid yin pas rtogs pa po la ltos nas tshad ma dang cig shos nyid du rnam par gzhag pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de yang rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid yin pas rtogs pa po la ltos nas tshad ma dang cig shos nyid du rnam par gzhag pa kho na yin no //
translated: Because that also is an object of inference. Therefore, it is only in dependence on the cognizer that it is posited as valid knowledge or otherwise.

original: de nas khas blang ba bya ba 'di ni tha na slob ma'i rnam par rtog pa tsam yod pa tsam la mi bslu ba yang rtogs pa med pa 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nas khas blang ba bya ba 'di ni tha na slob ma'i rnam par rtog pa tsam yod pa tsam la mi bslu ba yang rtogs pa med pa 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Then, this acceptance is also the apprehension of non-cognition, because it is the mere non-deception with regard to the mere existence of the student's mere conception.

original: rnam par rtog pa dga' yang bdag nyid thams cad kyis ni tshad ma ma yin par khas blangs pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dga' yang bdag nyid thams cad kyis ni tshad ma ma yin par khas blangs pa yin la /
translated: Even though the conception is delighted, it is accepted that it is not valid knowledge in all respects.

original: de bzhin du ma 'khrul pa 'dzin pa las rtogs pa po la ltos nas ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa yang tshad ma la sogs pa'i shes pa nyid du rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du ma 'khrul pa 'dzin pa las rtogs pa po la ltos nas ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa yang tshad ma la sogs pa'i shes pa nyid du rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: Likewise, in relation to the cognizer, the consciousness of yellow and so on is posited as valid knowledge and so on, in contrast to the consciousness that apprehends what is not there.

original: ci ste gang zhig dngos po nyid la dbye ba gnyis med pa de ni tshad ma yin na /
analyzed: ci ste gang zhig dngos po nyid la dbye ba gnyis med pa de ni tshad ma yin na /
translated: But if there is no difference in the nature of valid knowledge,

original: de ltar na rjes su dpag pa ji ltar yin /
analyzed: de ltar na rjes su dpag pa ji ltar yin /
translated: how can there be inference?

original: rjes su dpag pa ni 'khrul pa yin na yang 'brel pa yod pa las tshad ma yin no //üîΩmngon sum yang sngon po'i yul can ni ser po la sogs pa la tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni 'khrul pa yin na yang 'brel pa yod pa las tshad ma yin no // mngon sum yang sngon po'i yul can ni ser po la sogs pa la tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Although inference is mistaken, it is valid knowledge because it is related to its object.

original: de yang / gzhan sgrub byed pa gzhan nyid la //üîΩsgrub byed ltar snang yin par bshad //
analyzed: de yang / gzhan sgrub byed pa gzhan nyid la // sgrub byed ltar snang yin par bshad //
translated: Also, the direct perception that has a blue object is not valid knowledge in regard to yellow and so on.

original: ces 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: ces 'byung ba'o //
translated: And it is said:üîΩThat which proves another is said to be a semblance of a proof.

original: des na yang tshad ma dang cig shos kyi tha snyad chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na yang tshad ma dang cig shos kyi tha snyad chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus the conventions of valid knowledge and the other are severed.

original: des na gang zhig 'dod pa'i cha la 'khrul pa can ma yin pa de ni ma 'khrul pa yin la /
analyzed: des na gang zhig 'dod pa'i cha la 'khrul pa can ma yin pa de ni ma 'khrul pa yin la /
translated: Therefore that which is nonmistaken in regard to the part that is desired is nonmistaken.

original: gang zhig de la 'khrul pa yod pa de 'khrul pa can yin pa ni rnam par dbye ba yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig de la 'khrul pa yod pa de 'khrul pa can yin pa ni rnam par dbye ba yin no //
translated: The one who is mistaken about it is the one who is mistaken.

original: des na mngon sum yang ;
analyzed: des na mngon sum yang ;
translated: Thus, even perception

original: dung la ser po la sogs pa'ang shes pa cha shas kyis yin no zhes gzhan du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dung la ser po la sogs pa'ang shes pa cha shas kyis yin no zhes gzhan du bstan pa yin no //
translated: is mistaken, because it is a cognition that has parts, as in the case of the cognition of yellow in a conch shell. This is explained elsewhere.

original: 'dir yang rjes su dpag pa yin pa'i phyir rtsod pa med do //
analyzed: 'dir yang rjes su dpag pa yin pa'i phyir rtsod pa med do //
translated: And here, there is no dispute, because it is an inference.

original: tshad ma ni dngos po yul la ma yin nam /
analyzed: tshad ma ni dngos po yul la ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't valid cognition about real things?

original: dbyibs nyid ni dngos po ma yin te /
analyzed: dbyibs nyid ni dngos po ma yin te /
translated: But shape is not a real thing.

original: du ma rnams la gcig tu snang ba'i shes pa ni shes pa'i bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa ste dbyibs yin la /
analyzed: du ma rnams la gcig tu snang ba'i shes pa ni shes pa'i bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa ste dbyibs yin la /
translated: The cognition that appears as one in many is a cognition that follows the action of cognition, and that is shape.

original: kha dog la 'khrul pa yin na de yang 'khrul pa can yin no //
analyzed: kha dog la 'khrul pa yin na de yang 'khrul pa can yin no //
translated: And if there is error about color, that is also erroneous.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dbyibs ni so sor snang ba'i chos so zhes smos so //
analyzed: dbyibs ni so sor snang ba'i chos so zhes smos so //
translated: Shape is a phenomenon that appears individually.

original: bden mod kyi dbyibs ni kha dog las tha dad pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: bden mod kyi dbyibs ni kha dog las tha dad pa can ma yin te /
translated: True, but shape is not different from color.

original: kha dog gi bye brag nyid @32a * //
analyzed: kha dog gi bye brag nyid @32a * //
translated: It is just a particular color.

original: yin no // kha dog ces bya ba tsam ni shes pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin /
analyzed: yin no // kha dog ces bya ba tsam ni shes pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin /
translated: Yes, but the mere color is not the object of the cognition,

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the differences of pot, etc., are perceived.

original: de ltar yang rtsod pa'i rigs par yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang rtsod pa'i rigs par yang /
translated: Thus, in the NyƒÅyamukha,

original: sor mo rnams brkyang ba las khu tshur gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs bas rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sor mo rnams brkyang ba las khu tshur gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs bas rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúThe fist is not different from the extended fingers,‚Äù and so on.

original: de ni 'dus pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ni 'dus pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But the shape is the collection of the parts.

original: de nyid dbyibs yin par kho bo cag gis go ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid dbyibs yin par kho bo cag gis go ba yin no //
translated: We understand that the shape is the collection.

original: dung ser po'i dbyibs las dkar po'i dbyibs gzhan yin pas des na mi bslu ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dung ser po'i dbyibs las dkar po'i dbyibs gzhan yin pas des na mi bslu ba ma yin no //
translated: But the shape of the yellow conch is not different from the shape of the white conch, so it is not nondeceptive.

original: sngon po'i skad cig 'dzin pa can gyi shes pa'i skad cig gzhan dang phrad pa la mi bslu bar med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon po'i skad cig 'dzin pa can gyi shes pa'i skad cig gzhan dang phrad pa la mi bslu bar med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition that apprehends the moment of the blue would not be nondeceptive with regard to the other moment that it contacts.

original: sngon po ma yin pa las log pa'i phyir gcig nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sngon po ma yin pa las log pa'i phyir gcig nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is one because it is the opposite of what is not blue.

original: 'di la yang dung gi dbyibs ma yin pa las log pa'i gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'di la yang dung gi dbyibs ma yin pa las log pa'i gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir mtshungs so //
translated: In this case, too, it is similar, because it is the same as the shape of the conch, which is the opposite of not being the shape of the conch.

original: ser po med pa nyid ces bya ba yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: ser po med pa nyid ces bya ba yang mi rigs te /
translated: It is also not correct to say that it is the absence of yellow,

original: dmigs pa ni yod pa yin no zhes bstan pa dang 'gal pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa ni yod pa yin no zhes bstan pa dang 'gal pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it contradicts the explanation that the object exists.

original: kha dog las ldog pa can ni dbyibs kyang ma yin la 'dus pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: kha dog las ldog pa can ni dbyibs kyang ma yin la 'dus pa yang ma yin no //
translated: The shape is not the opposite of color, nor is it a collection.

original: ljang gu la sogs pa'i kha dog tsam gyi dngos po yin no //üîΩde ltar na sngon po ni sngon po gzhan las tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur la /
analyzed: ljang gu la sogs pa'i kha dog tsam gyi dngos po yin no // de ltar na sngon po ni sngon po gzhan las tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur la /
translated: It is a thing that is just the color green, and so on.üîΩIn that case, blue would not be different from another blue,

original: ser po yang ser po gzhan las so //
analyzed: ser po yang ser po gzhan las so //
translated: and yellow would not be different from another yellow.

original: shes pa gcig gi yul mang po rnams la shes pa'i bya ba gcig yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes pa gcig gi yul mang po rnams la shes pa'i bya ba gcig yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because many objects of a single cognition are the object of a single cognition.

original: de'i rjes su 'jug pa tsam ni dbyibs yin la /
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'jug pa tsam ni dbyibs yin la /
translated: The mere engagement with that is the shape.

original: rjes su 'jug pa la bye brag med pa'i phyir dbyibs la bye brag med pas 'gro ba rnams kyi sna tshogs par snang ba'i yul med par gyur ba'i phyir kha dog gi bdag nyid 'dus pa'i snang ba ni dbyibs yin la /
analyzed: rjes su 'jug pa la bye brag med pa'i phyir dbyibs la bye brag med pas 'gro ba rnams kyi sna tshogs par snang ba'i yul med par gyur ba'i phyir kha dog gi bdag nyid 'dus pa'i snang ba ni dbyibs yin la /
translated: Because there is no difference in the shape of the subsequent engaging consciousnesses, the various appearing objects of beings would not exist. Therefore, the appearance of the collection of the nature of color is shape.

original: de yang kha dog gi bye brag 'dus bzhin pa yin no zhes de dag thams cad bstan pa ni gang gis nam yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang kha dog gi bye brag 'dus bzhin pa yin no zhes de dag thams cad bstan pa ni gang gis nam yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Moreover, it is the collection of the particulars of color. All of that is indicated by ‚Äúat any time.‚Äù

original: 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa'i tha snyad kyi dbye ba las /
analyzed: 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa'i tha snyad kyi dbye ba las /
translated: From the division of the conventions of engagement and nonengagement,üîΩit is known that valid knowledge and other are different.

original: tshad ma dang cig shos pa tha dad pa yin pa de ltar ci las shes par bya ba snyam pa la /
analyzed: tshad ma dang cig shos pa tha dad pa yin pa de ltar ci las shes par bya ba snyam pa la /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúHow is that known?‚Äù

original: ji ste 'di ni zhes bya ba ste rna ba'i rnam shes ni shes pa bzhin nam /
analyzed: ji ste 'di ni zhes bya ba ste rna ba'i rnam shes ni shes pa bzhin nam /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThis is the ear consciousness‚Äù is like consciousness.

original: ser po'i shes pa bzhin du phrad par bya ba dad tha dad pa med kyang mngon par 'dod pa la 'jug pa'i mtshams su nges pas nyams su myong ba de'i tshe yod pa yin pa'i phyir ma khyab pa ma yin par bstan pa @32b ni sgra'i yul canüîΩgyi zhes bya ba ste /üîΩde lta nyid ni 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la dpyod pa dang mthun pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ser po'i shes pa bzhin du phrad par bya ba dad tha dad pa med kyang mngon par 'dod pa la 'jug pa'i mtshams su nges pas nyams su myong ba de'i tshe yod pa yin pa'i phyir ma khyab pa ma yin par bstan pa @32b ni sgra'i yul can gyi zhes bya ba ste / de lta nyid ni 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la dpyod pa dang mthun pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that it is not the case that there is no pervasion is shown by the phrase ‚Äúthe object of sound.‚Äù

original: glur blangs zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: glur blangs zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The statement that this is in accord with the analysis of worldly conventions is shown by the phrase ‚Äúsung in song.‚Äù

original: drug ldan la sogs pa glu thos pa dang / rol mo la sogs pa mthong ba can gyis mnyan pa dang lta bar mngon par 'dod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: drug ldan la sogs pa glu thos pa dang / rol mo la sogs pa mthong ba can gyis mnyan pa dang lta bar mngon par 'dod pa yin gyi /
translated: Those who hear the song of the six-part music and see the dance and so on desire to listen and to see.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not otherwise.

original: rnam par gnas par smra ba po gnas pa'i sgra smos pas thug pa med pa gsal ba bzhin du ma khyab pa gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: rnam par gnas par smra ba po gnas pa'i sgra smos pas thug pa med pa gsal ba bzhin du ma khyab pa gsal ba yin te /
translated: Just as the statement ‚Äúthe sound of abiding‚Äù by the proponent of the theory of abiding clarifies the infinite regress, the statement ‚Äúit is not the case that there is no pervasion‚Äù clarifies the nonpervasion.

original: dngos su na khyab pa can yin par bstan pa ni 'di rang gi ngo bo rig pa las gzhan pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos su na khyab pa can yin par bstan pa ni 'di rang gi ngo bo rig pa las gzhan pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin reality, it is the possessor of the pervasion‚Äù indicates that it is not different from self-awareness.

original: sngon po la sogs pas bsgos pa la sogs pas bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pas bsgos pa la sogs pas bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni /
translated: The conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis like the truth, is it not self-awareness?üîΩNo, it is not.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.

original: bden pa bzhin du rang rig pa'i mthar thug pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: bden pa bzhin du rang rig pa'i mthar thug pa ma yin nam /
translated: is not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: is not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.

original: rang gi ngo bo ni rang rig pa'i mthar thug pas dmigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni rang rig pa'i mthar thug pas dmigs pa yin gyi /
translated: The conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: is not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.

original: rim gyis gzhan gyi mthar thug pa yin yang zhes bya ba 'di la mngon sum ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rim gyis gzhan gyi mthar thug pa yin yang zhes bya ba 'di la mngon sum ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.

original: gzugs la sogs pa la yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa la yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.üîΩis not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue, etc.

original: gzhan la nges pa med na rang gi ngo bo rig pa tsam gyis ni mgu ba ma yin pa'i phyir tha snyad 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan la nges pa med na rang gi ngo bo rig pa tsam gyis ni mgu ba ma yin pa'i phyir tha snyad 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: is not like the truth.üîΩThe conclusion of the action of being colored by blue

original: tha snyad ma nyams par mthong ba nyid kyi phyir don dam pa'i tha snyad la gzhan du mi 'thad pas don dam pa pa'i bya ba'i mthar thug pa nyid 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad ma nyams par mthong ba nyid kyi phyir don dam pa'i tha snyad la gzhan du mi 'thad pas don dam pa pa'i bya ba'i mthar thug pa nyid 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Because it is seen without the conventional being damaged, it is not tenable that the ultimate is different from the conventional. Therefore, it is the ultimate that is the final object of action.

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo rang rig pa las zhes bya bas gzhan shes bzhin du gzhan la 'jug pa yin na ni thal ches par 'gyur ro snyam du dogs pa la lan du /
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo rang rig pa las zhes bya bas gzhan shes bzhin du gzhan la 'jug pa yin na ni thal ches par 'gyur ro snyam du dogs pa la lan du /
translated: If it were the case that the object of action of direct perception is other than itself, then it would be too much.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, the object of action of direct perception is its own nature.

original: mngon sum gyi bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo rig pa kho na yin la gzhan du nges pa'i rtogs pa ni de nyid la gnod pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo rig pa kho na yin la gzhan du nges pa'i rtogs pa ni de nyid la gnod pa can ma yin no //
translated: The action of direct perception is the awareness of its own nature alone. The ascertainment of something else is not impaired in that.

original: tha snyad ni so sor snang ba ma yin pa la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs la sogs pa dad /
analyzed: tha snyad ni so sor snang ba ma yin pa la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs la sogs pa dad /
translated: The conventional arises in the absence of individual appearances, such as in the case of form and so on.

original: reg pa la sogs pa'i yul gzhan la yang rtogs pa'i ngo bo'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa las /
analyzed: reg pa la sogs pa'i yul gzhan la yang rtogs pa'i ngo bo'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa las /
translated: It is also the cause of the nature of the realization of other objects, such as contact and so on, because it is dependent on a single collection.

original: gcig pa nyid du zhen pa ni shes pa kho na de'i shes pa yin te /
analyzed: gcig pa nyid du zhen pa ni shes pa kho na de'i shes pa yin te /
translated: The attachment to identity is that consciousness itself is the consciousness of that.

original: rjes su dpag pa dang mthun pa'i tha snyad 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa dang mthun pa'i tha snyad 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Because the convention arises in accordance with inference,

original: don gyi shugs kyis zad pa yin zhing /
analyzed: don gyi shugs kyis zad pa yin zhing /
translated: the meaning is exhausted by implication.

original: thal ches pa yang ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //üîΩsngar shes pa nyid phyis shes @33a * //
analyzed: thal ches pa yang ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o // sngar shes pa nyid phyis shes @33a * //
translated: It is not the case that there is an overextension of the meaning.

original: par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it that consciousness itself is later the consciousness of that?

original: dus kyi dbye bas ngo bo'i dbye bar snang ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus kyi dbye bas ngo bo'i dbye bar snang ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the difference in time does not appear as a difference in nature.

original: de bzhin du mthong ba nyid reg par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du mthong ba nyid reg par byed pa yin te /
translated: In the same way, seeing itself is the agent of contact,

original: mthong ba dang reg pa dag don gcig la 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba dang reg pa dag don gcig la 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because seeing and contact are the same thing.

original: de lta ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ni ma yin no //
translated: That is not so.

original: 'das pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'das pa yin no zhe na /
translated: It is past.

original: rtogs par 'gyur bzhin pa la 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs par 'gyur bzhin pa la 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that which is engaged in the process of being understood,

original: so sor snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: so sor snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the individual appearances are different.

original: ji lta bur mthong ba la de lta bur reg par snang ba ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ji lta bur mthong ba la de lta bur reg par snang ba ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that it is not the case that contact appears in the same way that it is seen.

original: 'byung 'gyur don zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung 'gyur don zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The object of future contact is the object of the present.

original: de lta na reg pa'i yul la lhag par sgro btags pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta na reg pa'i yul la lhag par sgro btags pa yin gyi /
translated: Thus, the object of contact is a superimposition.

original: gzugs la ni ji ltar mthong ba phrad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs la ni ji ltar mthong ba phrad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But the object of seeing is the form that is seen, because it is the object of contact that is seen.

original: don dam pa pa nyid kyi tshad ma kho na yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa pa nyid kyi tshad ma kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object of seeing is the ultimate object.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.üîΩThe difference in the experience of the object is due to the difference in the appearance of the object, which is due to the difference in the seeing.üîΩThe difference in the appearance of the object is due to the difference in the seeing.üîΩThe difference in the seeing is due to the difference in the object.üîΩThe difference in the object is due to the difference in the thing.

original: mthong ba tha dad pas snang ba tha dad pa las nyams su myong ba tha dad pa yang dngos po rnams kyi dbye ba yin par bstan pa ni /üîΩji ltar yang zhes bya ba ste /üîΩmthong ba kho na la lta ba yin no zhes bya ba'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la ni gcig pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: mthong ba tha dad pas snang ba tha dad pa las nyams su myong ba tha dad pa yang dngos po rnams kyi dbye ba yin par bstan pa ni / ji ltar yang zhes bya ba ste / mthong ba kho na la lta ba yin no zhes bya ba'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la ni gcig pa nyid yin la /
translated: The difference in the thing is due to the difference in the object.üîΩThus, the difference in the experience of the object is due to the difference in the thing.üîΩThe difference in the thing is due to the difference in the object.üîΩThe difference in the object is due to the difference in the thing.

original: gzugs dang reg pa dag la yang mthong ngo reg go zhes bya bar shes par mtshungs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gzugs dang reg pa dag la yang mthong ngo reg go zhes bya bar shes par mtshungs pa yin gyi /
translated: The difference in the thing is due to the difference in the object.

original: yan lag can la de bzhin du shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yan lag can la de bzhin du shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the difference in the experience of the object is due to the difference in the thing.üîΩThe difference in the thing is due to the difference in the object.üîΩThe difference in the object is due to the difference in the thing.üîΩThe difference in the thing is due to the difference in the object.üîΩThus, the difference in the experience of the object is due to the difference in the thing.üîΩThe difference in the thing is due to the difference in the object.üîΩThe difference in the object is due to the difference in the thing.üîΩThe difference in the thing is due to the difference in the object.üîΩThus, the difference in the experience of the object is due to the difference in the thing.üîΩThe difference in the thing is due to the difference in the object.üîΩThe difference in the object is due to the difference in the thing.üîΩThe difference in the thing is due to the difference in the object.üîΩThus, the difference in the experience of the object is due to the difference in the thing.üîΩThe difference in the thing is due to the difference in the object.üîΩThe difference in the object is due to the difference in the thing.üîΩThe difference in the thing is due to the difference in the object.üîΩThus, the difference in the experience of the object is due to the difference in the thing.

original: de dag nyid la de ltar dran pa las /
analyzed: de dag nyid la de ltar dran pa las /
translated: The difference in

original: gzhan dang gzhan dran pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni lhag par sgro btags pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan dran pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni lhag par sgro btags pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúdue to the recollection of one thing and another‚Äù is explained by the phrase ‚Äúdue to the superimposition of one thing on another.‚Äù

original: da ni lhag par sgro btags pa'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa ni /üîΩde la 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: da ni lhag par sgro btags pa'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa ni / de la 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Now, the reason for the superimposition of one thing on another is stated:üîΩ‚ÄúThe cause of that which will arise‚Äù is the cause of the appearance of that thing.

original: so sor snang ba 'di'i rgyu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid ni de'i rgyu yin pa des na de'i ngo bo nyid ni de nyid de /
analyzed: so sor snang ba 'di'i rgyu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid ni de'i rgyu yin pa des na de'i ngo bo nyid ni de nyid de /
translated: That cause is the nature of that thing.üîΩThe collection that produces form arises together with contact, and the collection that produces contact arises together with form.

original: gzugs skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa reg pa dang lhan cig pa dang / reg pa skyed par byed pa yang gzugs dang lhan cig pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs skyed par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gzugs skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa reg pa dang lhan cig pa dang / reg pa skyed par byed pa yang gzugs dang lhan cig pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs skyed par byed pa yin la /
translated: The cause of the production of form is the cause of the production of contact.

original: des na gzugs bzhin du reg pa'i yang 'bras bu yin no zhes tshogs pa cig la rag las pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na gzugs bzhin du reg pa'i yang 'bras bu yin no zhes tshogs pa cig la rag las pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, like form, contact is the effect of that cause.

original: gcig pa nyid du sgro btags pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gcig pa nyid du sgro btags pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are dependent on the same collection, they are superimposed as being the same.

original: 'dir rig pa ni de rig pa kho na yin no zhes tha snyad pa la rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa gcig pa nyid la mi bslu ba yin pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir rig pa ni de rig pa kho na yin no zhes tha snyad pa la rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa gcig pa nyid la mi bslu ba yin pa ni /
translated: Here, awareness is just the awareness of that.

original: du ba la sogs pa thal ches par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa thal ches par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: The non-deceptiveness of the identity of the object of awareness and the agent of awareness in conventional terms is not an overextension,

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu dag @33b tha dad par mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu dag @33b tha dad par mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the effect and the cause are conceived of as different.

original: rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba dag la tha dad par mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba dag la tha dad par mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: In the case of inference and the inferred, there is no conception of them as different.

original: snga ma bzhin du gcig pa nyid kho na yin no //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du gcig pa nyid kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are just the same as before.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa la sogs pa de'i bdag nyid la da ltar gyi reg pa la sogs pa de'i bdag nyid du sgro btags pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa la sogs pa de'i bdag nyid la da ltar gyi reg pa la sogs pa de'i bdag nyid du sgro btags pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The future contact, etc. are superimposed as having the identity of the present contact, etc.

original: da ltar gyi shes pa de'i shes par 'gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: da ltar gyi shes pa de'i shes par 'gyur pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the future consciousness is the consciousness of the present.

original: rig pa gang yin pa kho na rgyu yin par 'byung bar 'gyur ba la sgro btags pa'i shes pa de la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i shes pa brjod do //
analyzed: rig pa gang yin pa kho na rgyu yin par 'byung bar 'gyur ba la sgro btags pa'i shes pa de la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i shes pa brjod do //
translated: The consciousness that is superimposed on the cause that is just the awareness is called the consciousness that will arise.

original: des na de ltar sngon por ston pa'i tshig ni nges par mngon par bsams pa'i dngos po rig pa yin na rang gi ngo bo rig pa mi bslu ba 'thob pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na de ltar sngon por ston pa'i tshig ni nges par mngon par bsams pa'i dngos po rig pa yin na rang gi ngo bo rig pa mi bslu ba 'thob pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, if the word that indicates blue is the awareness of the thing that is definitely intended, then it is nondeceptive with regard to the awareness of its own nature.

original: gal te don rig pa tsam mi bslu ba yin pa de lta na /
analyzed: gal te don rig pa tsam mi bslu ba yin pa de lta na /
translated: If mere nondeceptive awareness of an object is valid cognition,

original: smig rgyu la chur shes pa yang tshad mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smig rgyu la chur shes pa yang tshad mar 'gyur ro //
translated: then the consciousness that apprehends a mirage as water would be valid cognition.

original: 'on te rgyu tha dad pa skyed par byed pa'i don rig pa yin na ni snam bu'i rigs pa las bum pa'i shes pa tshad mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te rgyu tha dad pa skyed par byed pa'i don rig pa yin na ni snam bu'i rigs pa las bum pa'i shes pa tshad mar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is the awareness of an object that generates a different effect, then the consciousness of a pot would be valid cognition of a woolen cloth.

original: 'on te rgyu tha dad pa ma yin pa skyed par byed pa yang /
analyzed: 'on te rgyu tha dad pa ma yin pa skyed par byed pa yang /
translated: But if it is the awareness of an object that generates an effect that is not different,üîΩthen the consciousness of a pot would be valid cognition of a pot.

original: nya phyis la dngul gyi shes pa phyi ma'i rgyun gyis skye bzhin pa ji snyed pa mi bslu ba can yin pa'i phyir tshad mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nya phyis la dngul gyi shes pa phyi ma'i rgyun gyis skye bzhin pa ji snyed pa mi bslu ba can yin pa'i phyir tshad mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the consciousness of a silver oyster shell is the cause of the future continuity of consciousness, it is undeceiving and therefore valid knowledge.

original: 'chi kha ma'i dngos po'i shes pa yul de la rig pa phyi ma med pa la mi bslu ba can ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chi kha ma'i dngos po'i shes pa yul de la rig pa phyi ma med pa la mi bslu ba can ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: But the consciousness of the state of death is not undeceiving with regard to the future nonexistence of the object, and therefore it is not valid knowledge.üîΩAnd also:

original: de yang / lan cig skyes nas rnam 'jig pa'ang //
analyzed: de yang / lan cig skyes nas rnam 'jig pa'ang //
translated: Even if it arises once and then ceases,

original: don la tshad ma nyid min 'gyur //
analyzed: don la tshad ma nyid min 'gyur //
translated: it would not be valid knowledge with regard to the object.üîΩAlso, the auditory consciousness would not be valid knowledge,

original: rna ba'i shes pa'ang gzhan rnams dang // 'brel pa med pas tshad min 'gyur //üîΩ'di ni rna ba'i shes gzhan la //
analyzed: rna ba'i shes pa'ang gzhan rnams dang // 'brel pa med pas tshad min 'gyur // 'di ni rna ba'i shes gzhan la //
translated: because it is not related to others.üîΩIf you say that it is established as valid knowledge

original: mi bslu bas na tshad mar grub //
analyzed: mi bslu bas na tshad mar grub //
translated: because it is undeceiving with regard to other auditory consciousnesses,

original: ce na des bskyed reg byed kyang //
analyzed: ce na des bskyed reg byed kyang //
translated: then the tactile object produced by it

original: rnam shes gzhan dang 'brel phyir ro //üîΩzhes smos pa'o zhes pha rol pos gang smras pa de bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam shes gzhan dang 'brel phyir ro // zhes smos pa'o zhes pha rol pos gang smras pa de bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: would also be related to other consciousnesses.üîΩIn response to the opponent‚Äôs statement, Candrakƒ´rti writes,

original: gang la don byed pa tha dad par mngon par 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: gang la don byed pa tha dad par mngon par 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: ‚ÄúThat which is asserted to be a different object producer . . .‚Äù

original: mngon par 'dod pa la mi bslu ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa la mi bslu ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan pa yin no //
translated: because it is nondeceptive with regard to what is desired.

original: mngon par bsam pa'i dngos po reg par rig pa ni mi bslu ba yin gyi rig pa tsam ni ma yin la /
analyzed: mngon par bsam pa'i dngos po reg par rig pa ni mi bslu ba yin gyi rig pa tsam ni ma yin la /
translated: The contact of the object of the desire is nondeceptive, not merely the awareness of it.

original: rigs mthun pa dang rigs mi mthun pa'i rgyu skyed par byed pa rig pa tsam yang ma @34a * //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa dang rigs mi mthun pa'i rgyu skyed par byed pa rig pa tsam yang ma @34a * //
translated: And it is not merely the awareness that generates a cause of the same or different type.

original: yin no // 'chi kha'i shes pa ni rang gi ngo bo rig pa tsam la tshad ma nyid yin te /
analyzed: yin no // 'chi kha'i shes pa ni rang gi ngo bo rig pa tsam la tshad ma nyid yin te /
translated: The consciousness at death is a valid cognition in the mere awareness of its own nature.

original: de tsam gyi kho na rig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tsam gyi kho na rig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the awareness of just that.üîΩIt is not a valid cognition in regard to contact, because it does not exist at that time.

original: phrad par bya ba la ni de med pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i bsam pa ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba la ni de med pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i bsam pa ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is the intention of the verse on the summary.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur na mi bslu ba can nyid ni tshad ma nyid yin la /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur na mi bslu ba can nyid ni tshad ma nyid yin la /
translated: This is how it is. Nondeceptiveness is a valid cognition.

original: de yang kha cig tha dad pa ma yin pa la yang ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa yod la /
analyzed: de yang kha cig tha dad pa ma yin pa la yang ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa yod la /
translated: And some say that even though it is not different, it is different by the difference of its function.

original: tha dad pa la yang mngon par 'dod pas byas pa'i tha dad pa med pa yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tha dad pa la yang mngon par 'dod pas byas pa'i tha dad pa med pa yod pa'i phyir /
translated: But since difference is also accepted, there is no difference in the existence of nonexistence.

original: khung bu du ma 'gegs pas nyam thag pa yin no //
analyzed: khung bu du ma 'gegs pas nyam thag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is a mere quibble to say that many holes are blocked.

original: gnod pa med pa'i rtogs pa nyid ni gzhan la ltos pa ma yin pa'i phyir skyon 'di med do //
analyzed: gnod pa med pa'i rtogs pa nyid ni gzhan la ltos pa ma yin pa'i phyir skyon 'di med do //
translated: But this fault does not apply to the nonerroneous cognition, because it does not depend on another.üîΩAnd this is stated:

original: de yang / tshad ma 'dzin pa'i sngon rol du //
analyzed: de yang / tshad ma 'dzin pa'i sngon rol du //
translated: Prior to the apprehension of valid cognition,

original: rang gi ngo bos rab tu gnas //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos rab tu gnas //
translated: it is established by its own nature.

original: rang don de la ltos bcas min //üîΩdpag bya dpags pas go ba yin //
analyzed: rang don de la ltos bcas min // dpag bya dpags pas go ba yin //
translated: Its own object is not dependent on another.

original: zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes smos pa'o //
translated: The object of inference is understood by inference.

original: ci ste gnod pa can nyid ni tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste gnod pa can nyid ni tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
translated: But if you say that the erroneous is not valid cognition,

original: de yang gzhan la ltos pa yin no //üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: de yang gzhan la ltos pa yin no // ma yin te /
translated: then that also depends on another.

original: the tshom dang shes pa dag ni gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom dang shes pa dag ni gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because doubt and knowledge do not depend on another.

original: 'on te log pa'i shes pa yin na de la yod pa ni bden mod kyi /
analyzed: 'on te log pa'i shes pa yin na de la yod pa ni bden mod kyi /
translated: But if it is a wrong consciousness, then it is true that it exists.

original: 'on kyang don gzhan shes pa yin gyi de nyid shes pa kho na ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang don gzhan shes pa yin gyi de nyid shes pa kho na ni ma yin te /
translated: However, it is a consciousness of another object, not a consciousness of that itself.

original: dngos po med pa'i shes pa'am /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i shes pa'am /
translated: It is a consciousness of a nonexistent object.

original: rgyu la rkyen yod pa'i shes pa yang rung ste ltos par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rgyu la rkyen yod pa'i shes pa yang rung ste ltos par bya ba yin no //
translated: The consciousness that has a cause and a condition is also suitable to be dependent.

original: de yang rang nyid kho na las yin pa'i phyir mi mthun pa med pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de yang rang nyid kho na las yin pa'i phyir mi mthun pa med pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Or, if you think that the cognition that a cause has conditions is tenable, then that also must rely on itself, and so there is no contradiction.üîΩIn response to this, Aryadeva says:

original: gnod pa can gyi shes pa yang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gnod pa can gyi shes pa yang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Even the cognition that is not underminedüîΩmust rely on another cognition that is not undermined.

original: 'dir don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The point here is as follows.

original: dang po gnod pa med pa ni shes pa thams cad la yin la /
analyzed: dang po gnod pa med pa ni shes pa thams cad la yin la /
translated: First, all cognitions are not undermined.

original: dus phyis gnod pa med pa yin na gnod pa med pa'i shes pa de la yang dus phyis gnod pa med pa'i shes pa gzhan la ltos par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: dus phyis gnod pa med pa yin na gnod pa med pa'i shes pa de la yang dus phyis gnod pa med pa'i shes pa gzhan la ltos par bya ba yin la /
translated: Later, if they are not undermined, then that cognition that is not undermined must rely on another cognition that is not undermined.

original: de yang gzhan la yin pa'i phyir dang / 'jug pa'i mthar thug pa khas mi len pa'i phyir thug pa med pa nyid yin par bshad zin to //
analyzed: de yang gzhan la yin pa'i phyir dang / 'jug pa'i mthar thug pa khas mi len pa'i phyir thug pa med pa nyid yin par bshad zin to //
translated: Since that also relies on another, and since you do not accept an ultimate limit to the process, it is explained that this process is endless.

original: 'di ltar yang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: gnod par mi bya ba nyid ni gnod par bya ba ma yin pa yin la /
analyzed: gnod par mi bya ba nyid ni gnod par bya ba ma yin pa yin la /
translated: not being undermined is not being refuted.

original: gnod par bya ba nyid kyang gzhan la ltos pa yin zhing /
analyzed: gnod par bya ba nyid kyang gzhan la ltos pa yin zhing /
translated: Being refuted relies on another.

original: gzhan yang don gzhan shes pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang don gzhan shes pa kho na yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is only the cognition of another object.

original: skyon med pa dang shes pa dag gi bdag nyid thob pa @34b yang de la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyon med pa dang shes pa dag gi bdag nyid thob pa @34b yang de la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the attainment of the nature of the faultless and the cognition also depend on it.

original: de nyid kyis na gang kho na shes pa snga ma yul log par 'dzin pa can la de thams cad gnod pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na gang kho na shes pa snga ma yul log par 'dzin pa can la de thams cad gnod pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: By that very fact, whatever previous cognition apprehends the object as reversed, all of that becomes invalidated.

original: de bzhin du bum pa'i shes pa la yul la log par 'dzin pa can gyi snam bu'i shes pa dang / nya phyis la dngul du 'dzin pa'i shes pa bzhin du bum par 'dzin pa la yang gnod pa can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bum pa'i shes pa la yul la log par 'dzin pa can gyi snam bu'i shes pa dang / nya phyis la dngul du 'dzin pa'i shes pa bzhin du bum par 'dzin pa la yang gnod pa can du 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, the cognition of a cloth that apprehends the object as reversed in the cognition of a pot, and the cognition that apprehends mother-of-pearl as silver, just like the apprehension of a pot, would become invalidated.

original: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no distinction.

original: 'on te gnod par bya ba nyid du mngon par 'dod pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te gnod par bya ba nyid du mngon par 'dod pa yin na /
translated: But if it is asserted that it is to be invalidated,

original: yul gcig nyid gnod par bya ba nyid yin gyi thams cad la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gcig nyid gnod par bya ba nyid yin gyi thams cad la ni ma yin no //
translated: only one object is to be invalidated, not all.

original: yul gcig nyid dam gnod par bya ba la mngon par 'dod pa can yin pa de lta na /
analyzed: yul gcig nyid dam gnod par bya ba la mngon par 'dod pa can yin pa de lta na /
translated: If it is asserted that only one object or what is to be invalidated is so,üîΩthen

original: de la ltos pa yang gnod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid yin la de dang mthun pa yin pa'i phyir de ji ltar don dam pa pa yen /
analyzed: de la ltos pa yang gnod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid yin la de dang mthun pa yin pa'i phyir de ji ltar don dam pa pa yen /
translated: Moreover, that which is dependent is not what is harmed, and it is in accordance with that, therefore how could it be ultimate?

original: 'di ni de lta ma yin zhes bya ba'i shes pa dang lhan cig pa ni log par 'dzin pa la gnod pa can ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'di ni de lta ma yin zhes bya ba'i shes pa dang lhan cig pa ni log par 'dzin pa la gnod pa can ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the cognition that thinks ‚Äúthis is not like that‚Äù concomitant with the apprehension of error?

original: thams cad ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not all.

original: des na gal te min ces bya ba bas thal ches pa ma yin la /
analyzed: des na gal te min ces bya ba bas thal ches pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, if it is not so, then it is not over-pervading,

original: don dam pa pa ma yin pa yang ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: don dam pa pa ma yin pa yang ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: and it is not non-ultimate.

original: lan du min no snyam du shes pa de nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan du min no snyam du shes pa de nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: In response to the thought that it is not so, it is said, ‚Äúthat very cognition that thinks it is not so.‚Äù

original: men ces pa 'di yang log par 'dzin pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan yin gyi /
analyzed: men ces pa 'di yang log par 'dzin pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan yin gyi /
translated: This ‚Äúit is not so‚Äù is the reason for mere apprehension of error,

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: but it is not another.

original: / dngos po med pa'i tshad ma las 'di ni de lta ma yin no zhes 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: / dngos po med pa'i tshad ma las 'di ni de lta ma yin no zhes 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it the case that from the valid cognition of non-entity, it is said ‚Äúthis is not so‚Äù?

original: log par 'dzin pa las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: log par 'dzin pa las ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not from the apprehension of error,üîΩand that is also:

original: de yang / tshad ma rnams kyis ma skyes pa //
analyzed: de yang / tshad ma rnams kyis ma skyes pa //
translated: Not produced by valid cognitions.

original: dngos po med pa'i tshad mar bstan //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i tshad mar bstan //
translated: Non-entity is taught to be a valid cognition.

original: de bdag nyid yongs su gyur pa'am //
analyzed: de bdag nyid yongs su gyur pa'am //
translated: It is a transformation of that

original: rnam shes kyang rung dngos gzhan la //
analyzed: rnam shes kyang rung dngos gzhan la //
translated: or else it is a different entity from consciousness.

original: zhes pa'o // de yang 'di ni de lta ma yin zhes bya ba thams cad la skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de yang 'di ni de lta ma yin zhes bya ba thams cad la skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, this is not so, that is, it is not a producer of everything,üîΩbut rather,

original: 'on kyang / yod pa nyid kyi dngos bzung bas //
analyzed: 'on kyang / yod pa nyid kyi dngos bzung bas //
translated: Having apprehended an entity as existent,

original: dran nas rab tu sbyor ba can //üîΩde la gnod pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: dran nas rab tu sbyor ba can // de la gnod pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: one remembers and applies it.üîΩThere is no fault of overextension,üîΩbecause it is only that which is impaired,

original: gzhan la ni ma yin pa'i phyir thal ches pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: gzhan la ni ma yin pa'i phyir thal ches pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: not the other.

original: dngos med mtshan nyid ces smos te /
analyzed: dngos med mtshan nyid ces smos te /
translated: Non-entity is the characteristic.

original: pha rol po'i 'dod pa 'di ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: pha rol po'i 'dod pa 'di ni mi rigs te /
translated: This assertion of the opponent is unreasonable.

original: dngos po med pa ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Non-entity is not a valid cognition,

original: shes pa ma bskyed pa tsam bdag nyid yongs su gyur pa'i sgra'i brjod pa bya ba ni /
analyzed: shes pa ma bskyed pa tsam bdag nyid yongs su gyur pa'i sgra'i brjod pa bya ba ni /
translated: because the mere non-production of consciousness is the transformation of the expression of the word itself,

original: gnyid mthug po la sogs pa'i gnas @35a * //üîΩskabs na yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyid mthug po la sogs pa'i gnas @35a * // skabs na yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: which exists even in states such as deep sleep.

original: dngos po ni gzhan gyi shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po ni gzhan gyi shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: An entity is not the consciousness of another.

original: de yang / gzhan ni dngos po gzhan las yin la /
analyzed: de yang / gzhan ni dngos po gzhan las yin la /
translated: Moreover, the other is from another thing.

original: de shes pa ni dngos po med pa'i tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de shes pa ni dngos po med pa'i tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: The cognition of that is not a valid cognition of non-existence,

original: dngul gyi shes pa la nya phyis kyi shes pa bzhin du bye brag med par bum pa'i shes pa la yang de las gzhan pa'i shes pa gnod pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngul gyi shes pa la nya phyis kyi shes pa bzhin du bye brag med par bum pa'i shes pa la yang de las gzhan pa'i shes pa gnod pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because, like the cognition of silver in the cognition of mother-of-pearl, the cognition of the absence of a pot would be invalidated by the cognition of something else, the pot.

original: dgag pa yang dgag par bya ba dang 'brel pa shes par bya ba'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: dgag pa yang dgag par bya ba dang 'brel pa shes par bya ba'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: And negation is not a valid cognition because it is to be understood as connected to what is to be negated.

original: 'di na bum pa med ces bya ba yang /
analyzed: 'di na bum pa med ces bya ba yang /
translated: Here, it is said, There is no pot.

original: sa phyogs 'di na bum pa yod par gyur pa gang yin pa de med pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sa phyogs 'di na bum pa yod par gyur pa gang yin pa de med pa yin gyi /
translated: This is because whatever pot there was in this place no longer exists.

original: 'di na med ces sa phyogs dang 'brel pa can nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di na med ces sa phyogs dang 'brel pa can nyid ma yin te /
translated: But it is not connected to the place, as in It does not exist here.

original: 'di sa phyogs kyi dgag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di sa phyogs kyi dgag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: This is not a negation of the place.

original: yang na dgag par bya ba de nyid 'di na med do zhes yul gyi bye brag nyid kyi shes pa ni tshad ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: yang na dgag par bya ba de nyid 'di na med do zhes yul gyi bye brag nyid kyi shes pa ni tshad ma yin pa'o //
translated: Or, the cognition of the particular place itself, That which is to be negated does not exist here, is a valid cognition.

original: re zhig dgag par bya ba la dang pos phyogs kyi mthar thug pa ma yin la /
analyzed: re zhig dgag par bya ba la dang pos phyogs kyi mthar thug pa ma yin la /
translated: First, the object of negation is not the limit of the directions.

original: yul gyi bye brag nyid kyis ma yin te 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul gyi bye brag nyid kyis ma yin te 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is it the particular object, because there is no connection.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gis phrad pa 'am 'du ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gis phrad pa 'am 'du ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there contact or conjunction of things and non-things,

original: de dag gi rdzas dang yon tan la sogs pa yul yin pa'i phyir dang gzhan yang med pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: de dag gi rdzas dang yon tan la sogs pa yul yin pa'i phyir dang gzhan yang med pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because their substance, quality, etc. are the object, and because there is nothing else.

original: / bye brag la sogs pa nyid kyang dmigs pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pa phrad pa la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan las yin gyi /
analyzed: / bye brag la sogs pa nyid kyang dmigs pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pa phrad pa la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan las yin gyi /
translated: Particularity, etc. are also due to the reason of contact, etc., such as being perceived, etc.

original: 'brel pa las ni bye brag nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa las ni bye brag nyid yin te /
translated: But particularity is due to connection,

original: phrad pa la sogs pa mtshan nyid mi mthun pa de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phrad pa la sogs pa mtshan nyid mi mthun pa de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no such dissimilar characteristic of contact, etc.

original: yod du zin kyang phrad pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa la don med pa'i phyir bye brag dang 'brel pa med pa'i dngos po yod pa la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yod du zin kyang phrad pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa la don med pa'i phyir bye brag dang 'brel pa med pa'i dngos po yod pa la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if it existed, it would be a thing that exists without connection to particularity, because there is no purpose in the cognition of contact, etc.

original: brjod par 'dod pa yang rgyu mtshan yod na yin te /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa yang rgyu mtshan yod na yin te /
translated: And the object of expression exists when there is a reason for it,

original: de tsam las byung ba ni dngos su ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tsam las byung ba ni dngos su ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not arise from that alone.

original: 'on te dngos po dang 'brel pa las yin na de'i dngos po med pa las kyang yin te /
analyzed: 'on te dngos po dang 'brel pa las yin na de'i dngos po med pa las kyang yin te /
translated: But if it is from the connection with the thing, then it is also from the non-existence of that thing,

original: pha dang 'brel pa ni bu las yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: pha dang 'brel pa ni bu las yin pa bzhin no //
translated: just as the connection with the father is from the son.

original: de ni bden mod kyi nye bar btags pa tsam yin la /
analyzed: de ni bden mod kyi nye bar btags pa tsam yin la /
translated: That is true, but it is merely a designation.

original: 'di ni don dam pa'i tshad ma'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni don dam pa'i tshad ma'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
translated: This is from the perspective of ultimate valid cognition.

original: grags pa ni gzhan du yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grags pa ni gzhan du yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Renown is otherwise, as will be explained.

original: dgag par bya ba'i yang ma @35b yin te /
analyzed: dgag par bya ba'i yang ma @35b yin te /
translated: Nor is it the object of negation,

original: dgag pa'i dus su de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgag pa'i dus su de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not exist at the time of negation.

original: 'brel pa can med na 'brel pa de nyid med pa yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa can med na 'brel pa de nyid med pa yin te /
translated: When there is no related thing, that very relation does not exist,

original: so sor snang ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: so sor snang ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: because it does not appear separately, that is the intention.

original: bum pa med do zhes dran bzhin pa na bum pa dang 'brel pa can dgag par shes par bya ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la ;
analyzed: bum pa med do zhes dran bzhin pa na bum pa dang 'brel pa can dgag par shes par bya ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la ;
translated: When thinking the pot does not exist, is the object of negation not understood to be that which is related to the pot?

original: dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe nature of non-entity‚Äù is used.

original: bum pa dran pa na gal te rang gi ngo bo shes pa yin pa de lta na /
analyzed: bum pa dran pa na gal te rang gi ngo bo shes pa yin pa de lta na /
translated: When one recalls a pot, if one knows its nature,

original: de dang 'brel pa can nyid bkag pa ma yin par 'gyur te 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa can nyid bkag pa ma yin par 'gyur te 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then it would not be the case that its relation is negated, because that is contradictory.

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa med na yang de dang 'brel pa nyid med pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa med na yang de dang 'brel pa nyid med pa yin la /
translated: If one does not understand its nature, then it would not be the case that it is related.

original: de rtogs pa ni yod la /
analyzed: de rtogs pa ni yod la /
translated: But its understanding exists.

original: de ni med pa de lta na yang de dang 'brel pa can nyid ma yin la med pa las yod pa rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni med pa de lta na yang de dang 'brel pa can nyid ma yin la med pa las yod pa rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: Even though it is not that, it is not related to it, and it is not the case that one understands an existent from a nonexistent.

original: de ni yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not its object.

original: 'on te bdag nyid kyis nyams su myong ba'i spyi dran pa yin na des 'phangs pa'i bye brag dngos po med pa'i tshad ma dang lhan cig tu dgag par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te bdag nyid kyis nyams su myong ba'i spyi dran pa yin na des 'phangs pa'i bye brag dngos po med pa'i tshad ma dang lhan cig tu dgag par byed pa yin no //
translated: But if it is the recollection of a universal that is experienced by itself, then the particular that is projected by that is negated together with the valid cognition of nonentity.

original: de la ni ma rtogs pa las ni zhes smos te /
analyzed: de la ni ma rtogs pa las ni zhes smos te /
translated: In that case, it is said, ‚Äúfrom what is not understood.

original: re zhig rang gi ngo bo bye brag 'phen par nus pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: re zhig rang gi ngo bo bye brag 'phen par nus pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: ‚Äù First, the nature of a particular is not able to project a particular.

original: spyir ni yin no //
analyzed: spyir ni yin no //
translated: In general, that is so.

original: de'i tshe yang na dngos po med pa ni dngos po dang 'brel pa can nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang na dngos po med pa ni dngos po dang 'brel pa can nyid ma yin te /
translated: But even at that time, a non-entity is not related to an entity,

original: ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not perceived.

original: rtog pa yin du chug kyang snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtog pa yin du chug kyang snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if it were conceived, the same consequence would follow as before.

original: bden mod kyi so sor snang ba can ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: bden mod kyi so sor snang ba can ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin pa nyid yin te /
translated: To be sure, but that which appears individually is not related to an entity or a non-entity,

original: kun rdzob tu 'bras bu dang rgyu nyid lta bu yin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu 'bras bu dang rgyu nyid lta bu yin no //
translated: like a result and a cause in the conventional.

original: ji ltar yang /
analyzed: ji ltar yang /
translated: Even though

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yang rung /
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yang rung /
translated: past or future,üîΩa result that arises in dependence is perceived. In the same way, even though an entity is a non-entity,

original: rten 'brel las 'byung ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa yin pa de bzhin du dngos po la dngos po med pa yin par yang sems pa la /
analyzed: rten 'brel las 'byung ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa yin pa de bzhin du dngos po la dngos po med pa yin par yang sems pa la /
translated: if one thinks,

original: ji ste rgyu dang 'bras bu yi //
analyzed: ji ste rgyu dang 'bras bu yi //
translated: ‚ÄúHow is it that a non-entity is related to an entity?‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: he says,üîΩ‚ÄúLike a result and a cause.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa bzhin du dngos po med pa dang 'brel pa yang dngos po med par nges pa yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa bzhin du dngos po med pa dang 'brel pa yang dngos po med par nges pa yin te /
translated: Just as a result and so on are related to a cause and so on, a non-entity is related to an entity, and a non-entity is ascertained.

original: cig car ma yin ba nyid du 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cig car ma yin ba nyid du 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no contradiction in not being simultaneous.

original: lan ni gtan med pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni gtan med pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response is ‚Äúutterly nonexistent.‚Äù

original: yod pa'i dngos po med pa ni zhig nas med pa yin la /
analyzed: yod pa'i dngos po med pa ni zhig nas med pa yin la /
translated: A nonexistent thing is something that existed but then became nonexistent.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po ni snga nas med pa yin pas /üîΩ'bras bu nyid dang mtshungs par dmigs pa yin na yang gtan med par @36a * //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po ni snga nas med pa yin pas / 'bras bu nyid dang mtshungs par dmigs pa yin na yang gtan med par @36a * //
translated: A thing that will come into existence is something that did not exist previously.

original: ji ltar yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar yin te /
translated: Even if it is observed to be the same as the effect, how can it be utterly nonexistent?

original: de shes pa la yang rig ba gzhan btsal bar bya ba yin la /üîΩdes na zhig nas med pa la sogs pa la yang de nyid kyis chog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de shes pa la yang rig ba gzhan btsal bar bya ba yin la / des na zhig nas med pa la sogs pa la yang de nyid kyis chog pa'i phyir /
translated: Even in the cognition of that, another awareness must be sought.

original: 'bras bu nyid kyi rigs pa khyab par byed pa ma yin pas ci sogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid kyi rigs pa khyab par byed pa ma yin pas ci sogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, since it is sufficient to use that very reason in the case of something that existed but then became nonexistent, the reason of being the same as the effect does not pervade.

original: gtan med pa yang gcig la gcig med pa nges pa yin gyi 'di nye bar btags pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan med pa yang gcig la gcig med pa nges pa yin gyi 'di nye bar btags pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúand so on‚Äù is that utter nonexistence is ascertained as the mutual absence of things, but it is not a mere designation.

original: thams cad nye bar btags par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad nye bar btags par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it would follow that everything would be a mere designation.

original: nye bar btags pa las gzhan pa nyid du ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar btags pa las gzhan pa nyid du ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not just a nonpervading factor that is not different from what is nominally ascribed to it, because it is the primary factor.

original: mi srid pa yang ngo bo zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mi srid pa yang ngo bo zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The impossibility of the nature of a nonentity is taught:

original: gzhan yang rgyu 'bras dag gi zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyu 'bras dag gi zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Moreover, with regard to cause and effect, etc.

original: me dang du ba dag la rim gyis dmigs pa la rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa las 'bras bu la sogs par rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: me dang du ba dag la rim gyis dmigs pa la rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa las 'bras bu la sogs par rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Fire and smoke are observed in sequence, and from the observation of the effect, the cause is inferred, and vice versa.

original: tshad ma'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is the basis of valid cognition.

original: dngos po med pa dang 'brel pa rig pa ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dang 'brel pa rig pa ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: The cognition of the relation to a nonentity is not valid cognition,

original: dngos po med par rig pa'i rtogs pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po med par rig pa'i rtogs pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because it arises from the cognition of a nonentity.üîΩJust as there is a relation to an entity, the nature of a nonentity is also cognized as a nonentity.

original: dngos po dang 'brel pa bzhin du dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo yang dngos po med pa rtogs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: dngos po dang 'brel pa bzhin du dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo yang dngos po med pa rtogs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If you think that,üîΩthen NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: gal te / de la dngos po med pa yi ;üîΩ/ zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te / de la dngos po med pa yi ;üîΩ/ zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is a nonentity,

original: 'bras bu ni gzhan du mi 'thad pa yin par rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyis mig la sogs pa la snang ba yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni gzhan du mi 'thad pa yin par rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyis mig la sogs pa la snang ba yin la /
translated: The effect is the eye, etc., which is perceived as the cause of the understanding that the effect is not tenable as something else.

original: de bzhin du dngos po med pa yang 'brel pa can yin pa kho nar dngos po med pa'i tshad mas rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po med pa yang 'brel pa can yin pa kho nar dngos po med pa'i tshad mas rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the same way, the non-existence of something is only related to the valid cognition of the non-existence of something.

original: lan du gang gi dngos med ces bya ba la sogs pa ni bzhad gang du byed pa ste /
analyzed: lan du gang gi dngos med ces bya ba la sogs pa ni bzhad gang du byed pa ste /
translated: In response, he says, ‚ÄúHow can the non-existence of something be a cause? ‚Äù and so on, which is a joke.

original: gzugs kyi shes pa ni rgyu ma gtogs par mi 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs kyi shes pa ni rgyu ma gtogs par mi 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Because the consciousness of form does not occur apart from its cause,

original: mig ni de nyid la rjes su dpog par byed pa yin par ni rigs te /
analyzed: mig ni de nyid la rjes su dpog par byed pa yin par ni rigs te /
translated: it is reasonable that the eye is inferred from it.

original: 'bras bu ni de la mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni de la mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the effect is not mistaken with respect to it.

original: dngos po med pa ni de ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni de ltar ma yin te /
translated: But the non-existence of something is not like that.

original: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no valid cognition.

original: nges pa med pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan las byung ba ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa med pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan las byung ba ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that the cause of a non-ascertaining consciousness arises from a sign.

original: tshad ma 'jug pa na don yod pa nyid du shes par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: tshad ma 'jug pa na don yod pa nyid du shes par byed pa yin la /
translated: When a valid cognition engages, it makes known the existence of an object.

original: de ldog pa ni med pa nyid du shes par byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de ldog pa ni med pa nyid du shes par byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it that the cessation of that [perception] causes one to understand non-existence?

original: 'di ni de bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni de bsal ba yin te /
translated: This is the refutation of that:

original: tshad ma yod pas @36b gzhal bya yod pa khyab pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma yod pas @36b gzhal bya yod pa khyab pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the existence of the object of comprehension is not pervaded by the existence of the valid cognition.

original: tshad ma thams cad log pa ni med par rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: tshad ma thams cad log pa ni med par rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it that the cessation of all valid cognitions does not cause one to understand non-existence?

original: 'on kyang gang la med do zhes bya ba'i shes pa skye ba de ni dngos po med pa'i tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gang la med do zhes bya ba'i shes pa skye ba de ni dngos po med pa'i tshad ma yin no //
translated: However, that [cessation of valid cognition] is the valid cognition of non-existence, in regard to which there arises the cognition ‚Äúit does not exist.‚Äù

original: gnyid log pa la sogs pa la ni de med pa yin te /üîΩde yang / dngos po med pa 'dzin pa ni //
analyzed: gnyid log pa la sogs pa la ni de med pa yin te / de yang / dngos po med pa 'dzin pa ni //
translated: But that [cessation of valid cognition] does not exist in sleep, etc.

original: zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes smos pa'o //
translated: And that is stated [in the verse]:üîΩThe apprehension of non-existenceüîΩis not a valid cognition.

original: de dang gnyid log pa la sogs pa la bye brag ci yang med do //
analyzed: de dang gnyid log pa la sogs pa la bye brag ci yang med do //
