translated: There is no difference at all between that [apprehension of non-existence] and sleep, etc.

original: dgag par bya ba dran pa dang dngos po las gzhan pa 'dzin pa dag dor ba ste /
analyzed: dgag par bya ba dran pa dang dngos po las gzhan pa 'dzin pa dag dor ba ste /
translated: [The opponent:] The abandonment of the memory of the object to be negated and the apprehension of something other than the object

original: de dag ni de'i bye brag ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag ni de'i bye brag ma yin te /
translated: are not particular cases of that [apprehension of non-existence].üîΩBecause they are not without intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ;
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ;
translated: This is taught [in the verse]:

original: de ni dngos po'i rigs med par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni dngos po'i rigs med par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That [apprehension of non-existence] is not a valid cognition of the non-existence of a type of entity.

original: rang bzhin med pa nyid kyang tshogs pa can nyid yin pas de dag gi bye brag yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa nyid kyang tshogs pa can nyid yin pas de dag gi bye brag yin te /
translated: Since the absence of intrinsic reality is also a collection, it is a type of them.

original: de la rtogs pa skyed par byed pa can gyi tshad ma ldog pa la lhan cig byed pa de dag yin pa de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de la rtogs pa skyed par byed pa can gyi tshad ma ldog pa la lhan cig byed pa de dag yin pa de bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that those are the co-producing factors of the reversal of valid knowledge that generates understanding is as follows.

original: gal te de 'dir tshogs ba can zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te de 'dir tshogs ba can zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is a collection here,

original: yul la sogs pa'i dngos po gzhan 'dzin pa'i lhan cig pa yang tshad ma ldog pa ni de dang mthun pa'i yul yin gyi /
analyzed: yul la sogs pa'i dngos po gzhan 'dzin pa'i lhan cig pa yang tshad ma ldog pa ni de dang mthun pa'i yul yin gyi /
translated: then the co-producing factors of the reversal of valid knowledge are the other things that apprehend the object and so on. The object is similar to that, but

original: bskal pa pa'i yul la ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: bskal pa pa'i yul la ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: it is not an object that is dissimilar.üîΩMoreover,

original: de yang / yod pa nyid kyi dngos bzung nas //
analyzed: de yang / yod pa nyid kyi dngos bzung nas //
translated: Having apprehended an existent thing,

original: dran nas rab tu sbyor ba la //
analyzed: dran nas rab tu sbyor ba la //
translated: one remembers it and applies it.

original: med pa nyid ces rtogs pa ni //üîΩdbang po la ltos min par skye //
analyzed: med pa nyid ces rtogs pa ni // dbang po la ltos min par skye //
translated: The understanding of nonexistence

original: zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes smos pa'o //
translated: arises without relying on the sense faculties.

original: de lta bu'i tshad ma log pa ni shes pa gzhan nyid yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshad ma log pa ni shes pa gzhan nyid yin te /
translated: The reversal of such valid knowledge is another consciousness,

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has a different character.

original: de'i bum pa med pa nyid kyang de las gzhan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yang ma yin gzhal bya yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i bum pa med pa nyid kyang de las gzhan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yang ma yin gzhal bya yang ma yin no //
translated: Since the non-existence of the pot is also different from that, it is neither a valid cognition nor an object of valid cognition.

original: de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught:

original: dngos po med par nges pa yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med par nges pa yin zhes bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe ascertainment of non-existence.‚Äù

original: bum pa med pa nyid ni sa phyogs nyid ma yin pa la yin nam /
analyzed: bum pa med pa nyid ni sa phyogs nyid ma yin pa la yin nam /
translated: Is the non-existence of the pot not just the place?

original: de ni bum pa yod kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'ba' zhig pa nyid kyang sa phyogs las tha mi dad pa'i phyir de las tha dad pa yod pa ma yin pa nyid du rang gi shes pas 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: de ni bum pa yod kyang yod pa'i phyir ro // 'ba' zhig pa nyid kyang sa phyogs las tha mi dad pa'i phyir de las tha dad pa yod pa ma yin pa nyid du rang gi shes pas 'dzin pa yin /
translated: Because it exists even when the pot exists.üîΩAnd the mere place is not apprehended as the non-existence of that, because it is not different from the place.

original: shes pa ldog pa ni shes pa gzhan las tha dad pa can du 'dis smras pa la /
analyzed: shes pa ldog pa ni shes pa gzhan las tha dad pa can du 'dis smras pa la /
translated: When the cognition of the place ceases, it is apprehended by one‚Äôs own cognition as the non-existence of that, which is different from another cognition.

original: 'di med ces bya ba'i shes pa ni zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'di med ces bya ba'i shes pa ni zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: This is stated: ‚ÄúThe cognition that says ‚Äòit does not exist.‚Äô‚Äù

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshad ma ni gzhal bya bum pa med pa nyid yin te /üîΩrang rang gi tshad ma ji lta ba rnams kyis @37a * //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshad ma ni gzhal bya bum pa med pa nyid yin te / rang rang gi tshad ma ji lta ba rnams kyis @37a * //
translated: The valid cognition of non-apprehension is the object of valid cognition, the non-existence of the pot.

original: nges par byed do //
analyzed: nges par byed do //
translated: It ascertains it as it is by its own valid cognition.

original: dang po ni mngon sum las yin la /
analyzed: dang po ni mngon sum las yin la /
translated: The first is from direct perception.

original: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //üîΩphyi rol nyid kyis ni shes pa dang shes bya dag ldog par nges pa'am /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o // phyi rol nyid kyis ni shes pa dang shes bya dag ldog par nges pa'am /
translated: The second is from non-observation of a pervader.üîΩBy external means, one ascertains the cessation of consciousness and the object of consciousness, or one ascertains the permanent consciousness.

original: gtan du ba'i shes par 'gyur ba yin gyi dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'i yul can mngon du bya ba ni 'ga' yang med pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gtan du ba'i shes par 'gyur ba yin gyi dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'i yul can mngon du bya ba ni 'ga' yang med pa nyid yin te /
translated: But there is no object of non-existence whatsoever that is directly perceived.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: de la ni tshad ma ldog par nges par bya ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la ni tshad ma ldog par nges par bya ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one ascertains the cessation of valid cognition in regard to that.

original: mngon sum gyi bya ba'i rjes su 'gro ba can 'di ni sngon po'o zhes bya ba dang / rjes su dpag pa ste rnam par rtog pa rnam pa gnyis ni gzhan gyi bag chags tsam las 'byung ba nyid la tshad ma nyid yin grang na /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi bya ba'i rjes su 'gro ba can 'di ni sngon po'o zhes bya ba dang / rjes su dpag pa ste rnam par rtog pa rnam pa gnyis ni gzhan gyi bag chags tsam las 'byung ba nyid la tshad ma nyid yin grang na /
translated: This is the two types of conceptual thought that follow after the activity of direct perception, such as ‚Äúthis is blue,‚Äù and inference.

original: re zhig rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But first, it is not inference.

original: dngos po med pa ma mthong ba la khyab pa 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma mthong ba la khyab pa 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because one does not apprehend the pervasion in regard to the non-seeing of non-existence.

original: dngos po med pa dang dngos po dag gi mngon sum gyis khyab pa 'dzin pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dang dngos po dag gi mngon sum gyis khyab pa 'dzin pa yin la /
translated: It is the direct perception of nonthings and things that apprehends their pervasion.üîΩ

original: de dag gi dngos po med pa dag gi yang khyab pa shugs kyis grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gi dngos po med pa dag gi yang khyab pa shugs kyis grub pa yin no //
translated: The non-existence of the thing and the thing are apprehended by direct perception, and the non-existence of those is established by implication.

original: des na rjes su dpag pa'i shugs kyis kyang mi dmigs pa las dngos po med par rtogs pa ni de las gzhan pa dag kho na yin te /
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pa'i shugs kyis kyang mi dmigs pa las dngos po med par rtogs pa ni de las gzhan pa dag kho na yin te /
translated: Therefore, the non-existence of a thing is understood from non-apprehension, by the implication of inference, but not by direct perception.

original: de dang bral ba dag dmigs pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po med pa yin no ;
analyzed: de dang bral ba dag dmigs pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po med pa yin no ;
translated: The non-existence of the nature of that is due to the apprehension of that which is free from it.

original: / de dang bral yang mngon sum yin pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: / de dang bral yang mngon sum yin pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: And even though it is free from that, it is not a non-apprehension of a pervader, because it is direct perception.

original: de lta yin na rtsod pa'i rig pa las /
analyzed: de lta yin na rtsod pa'i rig pa las /
translated: If that were so, how could the NyƒÅyamukha state:

original: de mthong ba rnams la shes pa yod pas khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ji ltar yin /
analyzed: de mthong ba rnams la shes pa yod pas khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ji ltar yin /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause the existence of the cognition of those who see it is pervaded by it‚Äù?

original: tshad ma rnam par nges pa las kyang /
analyzed: tshad ma rnam par nges pa las kyang /
translated: And the Prama·πáavini≈õcaya states:

original: kho bos 'di ni ma dmigs pa 'am zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa yang dag 'byung zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: kho bos 'di ni ma dmigs pa 'am zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa yang dag 'byung zhes smos pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúI have stated the correct understanding of non-apprehension.‚Äù

original: dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis mngon sum ni byed pa dang bcas par bstan pa yin gyi /
analyzed: dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis mngon sum ni byed pa dang bcas par bstan pa yin gyi /
translated: The existence of direct perception is taught by the concepts of the object and non-apprehension,

original: 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di med do zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di med do zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni ma yin no //
translated: but not by the words ‚Äúbecause this exists, that does not exist.‚Äù

original: smras pa / dmigs pa ni yod pa yin par bstan pa ni yod pa dang dmigs pa dag ni gcig pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //üîΩkho bos dmigs kho bo sa ma dmigs zhes bya ba'i skyes bu chog gi tshig gis ni rang nyid kho na'i dmigs pa yin yang rung /
analyzed: smras pa / dmigs pa ni yod pa yin par bstan pa ni yod pa dang dmigs pa dag ni gcig pa nyid du bstan pa yin no // kho bos dmigs kho bo sa ma dmigs zhes bya ba'i skyes bu chog gi tshig gis ni rang nyid kho na'i dmigs pa yin yang rung /
translated: Objection: The existence of the object is taught, and the existence of the object and the existence of apprehension are taught to be the same.üîΩThe words ‚ÄúI apprehend, I do not apprehend‚Äù teach that the existence of the object is established by direct perception,

original: ma yin yang rung ba'i mngon sum las grub pa @37b yin gyi /üîΩgzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: ma yin yang rung ba'i mngon sum las grub pa @37b yin gyi /üîΩgzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: whether it is oneself or another who apprehends.

original: yod pa dang shes pa dag gi khyab pa yang mi rtag pa dang byas pa bzhin du ldog pas byas pa ni skyes bu mchog bzhin du rgyud gzhan gyis dmigs pa'i ngo bo'i yod pa rnam par bcad pa'i don du dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i snang ba
analyzed: yod pa dang shes pa dag gi khyab pa yang mi rtag pa dang byas pa bzhin du ldog pas byas pa ni skyes bu mchog bzhin du rgyud gzhan gyis dmigs pa'i ngo bo'i yod pa rnam par bcad pa'i don du dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i snang ba
translated: The pervasion of existence and consciousness is like impermanence and being produced.  The meaning of ‚Äúproduced‚Äù is ‚Äúthe object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream,‚Äù like a supreme being.üîΩThe meaning of ‚Äúthe object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream‚Äù is the meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream,‚Äù like a supreme being.üîΩThe meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream‚Äù is the meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream,‚Äù like a supreme being.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bye brag kyang 'di'i don nyid du dngos po mi snang ba mi shes pa'i ngo bo rnam par gcad par yin la /üîΩde yod pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //üîΩgzhan la snang ba ji ltar yin //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bye brag kyang 'di'i don nyid du dngos po mi snang ba mi shes pa'i ngo bo rnam par gcad par yin la / de yod pa ni tshad ma ma yin no // gzhan la snang ba ji ltar yin //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream‚Äù is the meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream,‚Äù like a supreme being.

original: mi snang ba ni yul gzhan la sogs pa'i mthong bkag pa'i phyir ro ;üîΩ/ de'i phyir med pa las log pa'i yod pa dang mi shes pa las log pa ni shes pa yin la /
analyzed: mi snang ba ni yul gzhan la sogs pa'i mthong bkag pa'i phyir ro ; / de'i phyir med pa las log pa'i yod pa dang mi shes pa las log pa ni shes pa yin la /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream‚Äù is the meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream,‚Äù like a supreme being.

original: de bzhin du sngon po ma yin pa las log pa ni sngon po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du sngon po ma yin pa las log pa ni sngon po ste /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream‚Äù is the meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream,‚Äù like a supreme being.üîΩThe meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream‚Äù is the meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream,‚Äù like a supreme being.üîΩThe meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream‚Äù is the meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream,‚Äù like a supreme being.üîΩThe meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream‚Äù is the meaning of ‚Äúthe appearance that is the object of observation that is the opposite of the entity observed by a different mindstream,‚Äù like

original: mi shes pa las log pa dang shes pa zhes bya ba gcig pa nyid yin pa 'di ni ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi rnam par rtog pas tha dad pa'i de nyid bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: mi shes pa las log pa dang shes pa zhes bya ba gcig pa nyid yin pa 'di ni ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi rnam par rtog pas tha dad pa'i de nyid bstan pa yin la /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThe opposite of the non-cognizant and the cognizant are the same‚Äù is the teaching of reality differentiated by the conceptual thought of the reason of the opposite.

original: de yang ma rmongs pa la ni de kho na bzhin du ste /
analyzed: de yang ma rmongs pa la ni de kho na bzhin du ste /
translated: Moreover, for the non-deluded, it is just as it is,

original: byas pa dang mi rtag pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: byas pa dang mi rtag pa lta bu'o //
translated: like the produced and the impermanent.

original: sa phyogs nyid la ni ldog pa las shes pa dang shes bya yang mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: sa phyogs nyid la ni ldog pa las shes pa dang shes bya yang mngon sum yin no //
translated: In the case of the very place, the cognizant and the cognized are also direct perception by way of the opposite.

original: de nyid ni bum pa dang de'i shes pa dang bral ba ni bum pa med pa dang / de'i shes pa med pa yang yin pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni bum pa dang de'i shes pa dang bral ba ni bum pa med pa dang / de'i shes pa med pa yang yin pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: That is not non-apprehension, because the very place is both the absence of the pot and the absence of the cognition of that pot, and is also free from the pot and its cognition.

original: de ltar rtogs par mi nus pa'i rmongs pa la ni de yang mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs par mi nus pa'i rmongs pa la ni de yang mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: For the deluded who are unable to understand in that way, that is also non-apprehension.

original: de yang rang bzhin kho na yin gyi khyab par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin kho na yin gyi khyab par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, that is only the nature and not the pervader.

original: gzhan pa'i dngos po'i sa phyogs dang de'i shes pa dag gis de mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo dag la dbye ba med pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan pa'i dngos po'i sa phyogs dang de'i shes pa dag gis de mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo dag la dbye ba med pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the place occupied by another thing and the cognition of that are undifferentiated in the nature of non-apprehension.

original: grub kyang tha snyad du rung ba nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: grub kyang tha snyad du rung ba nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: But even if it is established, there is no fault, because it is established as being suitable conventionally.

original: khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ni khyad par bya ba mngon sum nyid yin na ste /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa ni khyad par bya ba mngon sum nyid yin na ste /
translated: The non-apprehension of the pervader is the direct perception of the pervaded,

original: khyab pa yod pa tsam las ni thams cad la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyab pa yod pa tsam las ni thams cad la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: but it would follow for everyone if it were merely the existence of the pervasion.

original: de ni bum pa'i sa phyogs dang de'i shes pa dag las ni med do zhes bya bar 'gyur ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni bum pa'i sa phyogs dang de'i shes pa dag las ni med do zhes bya bar 'gyur ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that it is non-existent in the place occupied by the pot and its cognition.üîΩIt is only the cognition of the place that is not apprehended.

original: sa phyogs kyi shes pa 'ba' zhig ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu'i bsam pas /
analyzed: sa phyogs kyi shes pa 'ba' zhig ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu'i bsam pas /
translated: With this in mind,

original: de ni gang las skyes pa yin //
analyzed: de ni gang las skyes pa yin //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúWhat is it that arises from that?‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: and so on, up to

original: de ltar min na mi dmigs @38a * //
analyzed: de ltar min na mi dmigs @38a * //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it were not so, it would not be called non-apprehension.‚Äù

original: pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is explained.

original: rmongs pa ma yin pa'i mngon sum ni cig shos kyis mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: rmongs pa ma yin pa'i mngon sum ni cig shos kyis mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Non-deluded perception is the non-apprehension of the other.

original: 'ba' zhig pa nyid kyang sa phyogs la sogs pa'i med pa bzhin du med pa gzhan med kyang rang nyid kho na las grub par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig pa nyid kyang sa phyogs la sogs pa'i med pa bzhin du med pa gzhan med kyang rang nyid kho na las grub par bstan pa ni /
translated: The fact that the mere is established from itself alone, like the non-existence of the place, etc., even though the other non-existence does not exist, is taught:

original: 'ba' zhig gang las zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig gang las zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: From what is the mere?

original: thug pa med do zhes bya ba'i bar yin no //
analyzed: thug pa med do zhes bya ba'i bar yin no //
translated: up to there is no infinite regress.

original: de ltar 'gyur na ni gal te gzhan mi dmigs pa gzhan gyi dngos po med par sgrub par byed pa yin na bye brag med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur na ni gal te gzhan mi dmigs pa gzhan gyi dngos po med par sgrub par byed pa yin na bye brag med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were so, if the non-apprehension of the other establishes the non-existence of the other, there would be no distinction.

original: nya phyis kyi shes pa ni dngul kho na'i med pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nya phyis kyi shes pa ni dngul kho na'i med pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The consciousness of mother-of-pearl does not establish the non-existence of silver alone.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i khams gsum po'i'o zhes bya ba'i bsam pas de nyid dran pa'i zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i khams gsum po'i'o zhes bya ba'i bsam pas de nyid dran pa'i zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The three realms with dissimilar characteristics, thinking this, he says just that is remembered.

original: dmigs par bya ba la mtshan nyid mi mthun pa med pa zhes bya ba nyid mtshan ma 'jug par byed pa ni bden mod kyi dngul du 'dzin par 'dod pa'i phyir med pa yin par gsal bar byed pa yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dmigs par bya ba la mtshan nyid mi mthun pa med pa zhes bya ba nyid mtshan ma 'jug par byed pa ni bden mod kyi dngul du 'dzin par 'dod pa'i phyir med pa yin par gsal bar byed pa yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: But it is clear that the object of apprehension is non-existent, because it is desired to apprehend silver.

original: dngul gyi shes pa yang nya phyis med do zhes gsal bar byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: dngul gyi shes pa yang nya phyis med do zhes gsal bar byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The thought is that the consciousness of silver is also non-existent, like the mother-of-pearl.

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: To that, he says, ‚ÄúThe non-existence of the thing.‚Äù

original: bden mod kyi /
analyzed: bden mod kyi /
translated: It is true.

original: 'di yang don dam pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: 'di yang don dam pa yin mod kyi /
translated: This is indeed the ultimate.

original: 'on kyang tha snyad du dngul med pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on kyang tha snyad du dngul med pa yin gyi /
translated: But conventionally, the silver is non-existent.

original: nya phyis med pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir nya phyis kyi shes pa mi dmigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: nya phyis med pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir nya phyis kyi shes pa mi dmigs pa yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the mother-of-pearl is non-existent. Therefore, the consciousness of mother-of-pearl is non-apprehension.

original: cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not the other. This is the meaning.

original: tha snyad pa bstan nas don dam pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: tha snyad pa bstan nas don dam pa bstan pa ni /
translated: Having taught the conventional, he teaches the ultimate:

original: de'i phyir 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is called ‚Äúthe apprehension of the mere.‚Äù

original: gnod par bya ba nyid kyang tha snyad pa nyid yin gyi dngos po nyid la ni ma yin pas /
analyzed: gnod par bya ba nyid kyang tha snyad pa nyid yin gyi dngos po nyid la ni ma yin pas /
translated: The object of refutation is only a conventional object, not an actual object.

original: de bkag pa'i ngo bo ni gnod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyang dngos po la ma yin par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de bkag pa'i ngo bo ni gnod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyang dngos po la ma yin par bstan pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the nature of the refutation is not an actual object.

original: tha snyad pa nyid kyis ni mi bslu ba can nyid dang / gnod bya ma yin pa nyid dag la bye brag med kyang /
analyzed: tha snyad pa nyid kyis ni mi bslu ba can nyid dang / gnod bya ma yin pa nyid dag la bye brag med kyang /
translated: Although conventional objects and nondeceptive objects are not distinguished in terms of being nondeceptive and nondeceptive, respectively,

original: ci'i phyir mi bslu ba can nyid kho na tshad ma nyid du bstan gyi /üîΩgnod pa med pa nyid ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /üîΩphrad par bya ba la 'jug pa'i mthar thug par 'dod pa ni khas ma blangs pa'i phyir dang / gnod pa med pa nyid tsam 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi bslu ba can nyid kho na tshad ma nyid du bstan gyi / gnod pa med pa nyid ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la / phrad par bya ba la 'jug pa'i mthar thug par 'dod pa ni khas ma blangs pa'i phyir dang / gnod pa med pa nyid tsam 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: why is only nondeceptive cognition taught to be valid knowledge?üîΩWhy is nondeceptive cognition taught to be valid knowledge, but nondeceptive cognition is not taught to be valid knowledge?üîΩBecause we do not assert that the ultimate purpose of engaging in the object of refutation is to be nondeceptive, and because we do not assert that mere nondeceptiveness is valid knowledge,

original: 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid dang / tha snyad pa ma yin pa nyid du @38b 'dod pas thug pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid dang / tha snyad pa ma yin pa nyid du @38b 'dod pas thug pa med pa yin te /
translated: it is not the case that there is an infinite regress of assertions of nondeceptiveness and nondeceptiveness.

original: dang po la gnas pa med par ni bye brag med pa yin zhing phyi ma la ni the tshom za ba yin la /
analyzed: dang po la gnas pa med par ni bye brag med pa yin zhing phyi ma la ni the tshom za ba yin la /
translated: The first is not a basis, because it is not differentiated. The second is a basis, because it is doubted.

original: de las kyang de'i phyi ma la yang de bzhin yin pa'i phyir gang du yang gnas pa med do //
analyzed: de las kyang de'i phyi ma la yang de bzhin yin pa'i phyir gang du yang gnas pa med do //
translated: And because the latter is also like that, there is no basis anywhere.

original: phrad par bya ba la yang gang gi stobs kyis thug pa med pa sel bar byed pa ni cung zad kyang med do zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas nye bar bsdus pa'o //üîΩde phyir sgra las byung ba yang //
analyzed: phrad par bya ba la yang gang gi stobs kyis thug pa med pa sel bar byed pa ni cung zad kyang med do zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas nye bar bsdus pa'o // de phyir sgra las byung ba yang //
translated: And in the case of contact, there is nothing whatsoever that, by its power, removes the infinite regress. This is the intended meaning of the summary.üîΩTherefore, even that which arises from sound

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the second chapter, the chapter on the benefits of bodhicitta.

original: mngon par 'dod pa la mi bslu ba ni tshad ma nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa la mi bslu ba ni tshad ma nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: That is, because non-deception with regard to what is desired is itself valid cognition,

original: khyab pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i sun 'don gsal ba nyid yin par nye bar mtshon par byed pa ni de bsal ba yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyab pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i sun 'don gsal ba nyid yin par nye bar mtshon par byed pa ni de bsal ba yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is indicated that the refutation of over-pervasion, etc. is itself the removal of that.
